Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan. Home to 6.6 milion people, it is a popular tourist destination with a strong tradition in textiles – above all, block printing.

Shari Keller is an American who has found her second home in India. She holds a PhD in anthropology and, as Fulbright scholar, undertook research in the slums of Hyderabad for a year. In short, she has direct and extensive experience of the difficult reality of the destitute in the country she first visited in 1975.

It is very telling, therefore, that Shari has chosen to found a clothing social enterprise in Jaipur, as a way to make a living and contribute to the community. Entering Mehera Shaw’s facilities, the collegial atmosphere quickly denotes this company’s true socially conscious culture – a lingering feeling that goes over and above her Fairtrade certification hung on the office wall. In fact, the staff, hired regardless of caste and economic background, are Shari’s extended family.

Jaipur, like the rest of India, is a difficult destination for any first-timer Westerner traveller. It is difficult to assimilate the misery of families living under bridges in cardboard boxes and seeing destitute children eat out of the garbage while life, overcrowded and drowned in the noise of seemingly chaotic traffic, goes on all around.

Rajasthan is home to a strong heritage in artisan industry such as jewelry and textiles. In the garment industry, it is particularly known for its traditional block printing. Carvers repeatedly hammer nails as chisels on a block of wood, slowly creating intricate patterns that can take up to two days of labour to complete. These are then charged with garment dye and carefully placed on extended fabrics to create Rajasthani traditionally artisan fabrics. The whole process is part of our human heritage to be preserved.

Growth, however, is in tourism. The Pink City of India is well-known to foreigners as it is home to the Amber Fort and Hawa Mahal among its many sights – all part of the golden triangle tourist routeI. Tourism provides opportunities to individuals and families from elsewhere in the Rajasthani region and is a big draw for internal migration – adults and children who upon arriving to Jaipur typically settle by under the bridges around the train station. There is a clear need to provide opportunities to disadvantaged individuals and families, regardless of background and caste.

Tadó is a small town in Chocó, Colombia’s poorest region in the Pacific rainforest. The National Liberation Army (ELN), a Marxist guerrilla, continues to wrestle with state forces in one of the last active areas of Colombia’s armed conflict.

Beatriz is a good example of what is untrue in the usual poor and lazy stereotypical portrait of the people of Chocó. She is full of energy and strives to make things better around her. She is the director of La Platina, a dance group designed to keep the local folkloric heritage alive and, at the same time, offer a positive pastime to youth that would otherwise be in danger. For years, she has sewn the dance group’s costumes.

Astrid’s eyes light up when she tells the story of her first times behind her mother’s sewing machine as a child. She was not allowed to touch it, lest she break it. In hiding, she would use any opportunity to have a go at the machine. One time the needle went through her nail and, in fear of being found out, she did not utter a sound. That's passion.

Alexander is a professional tailor. He does not have children of his own but is proud to support his extended family. Not a small feat for a physically handicapped individual in this part of the world. And it is proof that sewing is, in his own words, “my destiny”.

Silvia’s story is the most touching. Raised by an aunt who did not want her niece to do better than her own children, Silvia was held back from school. She married, and the story repeated itself: the husband restricted her to the house in his need to fill in the shoes of breadwinner. Unable to cope with the role, the husband shot himself in the living room in front of their children. Silvia was left with no education, no skills and three children to care for, the youngest just a baby. With Beatriz’s support along with that of the community, she “empirically” learned the clothes-making trade and, not short of pain and strife, over the years she has been able to put food on the table, a roof over their heads and put her eldest through university. Her youngest is doing well in school at 15. It is not all rosy: her middle child is an alcoholic at 18. But her story is a tremendous inspiration to overcoming obstacles.

Tadó is a town of some 10,000 people nested in the thick of the Pacific rainforest and almost exclusively populated by black decedents of former slaves. Until recently, the lack of decent roads kept this town relatively isolated, which is evident in the apparent slow pace of life as people great each other incessantly. But the slow pace is also an ingrained consequence of the lack of jobs. There are no official figures, but we were told that maybe 35% of people have employment. The town traditionally made do sifting for gold, a back-breaking but sustainable lifestyle. However, more recently, outsiders with machinery offered the locals to do the work in exchange of a minimal proportion of the exploit. And exploit they did. They left the overturned soil barren and polluted the pristine rivers with diesel and mercury.

Today, the gold is gone and the town is paying a heavy price, not only environmentally but also socially as the gold rush brought drugs, prostitution and, most notably, the guerillas. For the National Liberation Army (ELN, in Spanish) is present and active in the area. Tadosanos refer to their security situation as the “public order issue”. The ELN often kidnaps Tadosanos for ransom, has laid out mines in the outskirts and even bombed the local police station in late 2014. The military and special forces are since involved in what can be described as a low-intensity conflict zone. It should not be a surprise that this town is out-of-bounds according to US, Canadian and UK official travel advisories.
The Fabric of Humanity is a team of three. Nahuel is our visionary
column2: an avid traveller as well as an economist and business consultant, he was the first to understand the profound impact that clothing can have to connect us to the human stories of the makers and to bring about opportunities in the places where they live. Wendy is our know-how girl, with 30+ years of detailed industry experience including product development, manufacturing and technical skill building. Mauricio is our storyteller with 15+ years of videography and documentary-making experience around the world. So, from us to you: Hello!

column1: This campaign comes at a key moment for us. The funds we raise will allow us to undertake two equally important tasks.

Deliver, for the first time, on the projects you pick. This will allow us to tell the stories of people and communities that you actually change for the better with our clothing. A living proof that The Fabric walks the walk. We are looking forward to building on the links we established with grassroots groups and community organizations in India and Nepal - and learn from the experience so that we can better roll out projects in other communities in the future.

Grow. Grow. Grow. Our first crowdfunding campaign was a successful test of concept. We have delivered on what we committed ourselves to and then some more. Now it is time to take The Fabric to the next level. We will use the funds we raise to implement more ideas that will make our altruistic shopping experience more comprehensive, invest in the necessary resources and bring more communities under our umbrella.
We have a great team at The Fabric of Humanity. Not only do we have the qualifications and experiences to pull this off, we actually think this is what we are meant to do!

Like all startups, The Fabric has its risks and challenges, and we are conscious of them. Money is the bloodline to any business, and we are no exception. Overall, we are extremely excited to find awesome people like you to help us fund The Fabric and to help us get it to the next level.

Once we get the support we are looking for, we feel there is little risk in providing you with your very-well-deserved Perks. Our X'MAS early bird Perks are ready to ship as soon as we get your survey responses. And we have dependable and ethical production ready for the job for our April batch.
We are fully transparent at The Fabric, as the trust that you place on us is of upmost importance to us. There are a few things that you should keep in mind in contributing to our project.

The availability of our inventory for the X'MAS early bird Perks assumes customary demand patterns. That is, if it turns out that everybody is ordering M-sized units and no-one wants S's or L's, we may run out of M's before we are able to fulfil your Perk. We are keeping extra units at hand to try to minimize the likelihood of this scenario. Should it happen nonetheless, we will contact you as soon as possible and ask you how you'd like to proceed.

We will be placing a dedicated order for the Perks to be shipped in April. This timing works well with production lead times. In the event of an extraordinary demand for our Perks, it may be the case that we need to divide our production into two or more batches. If this were the case, we will do our best to minimize wait times and to process Perks in the order the contributions were received.

Our Indian Heritage shirts make use of upcycled trims for the inside collar, cuff, button placket and sleeve tab. Depending on the level of demand for these Perks, it may be the case that the exact trim may not be available. If this were the case, we would contact you as soon as possible and give you more trim options at the time.
And now, it's up to YOU!
That's all folks! So, take a look at our Perks again and start by choosing the item you'd like. Together we can make incredible things happen.",43.0,4,"1 Campaign

I am Josephine Dahouyo, I was born in Ivory Cost.
At the age of 4 I emigrated with my mother to Italy, the country of beauty.
The aim of my work is to base production in Ivory Coast primarily in order to contribute to the growth and wealth of the locals.
Akwa utilizes handmade fabrics from craftsmen to create an elegant and trendy, yet simple clothing line.
There are many traditional fabrics and each region has its own particular styles and techniques.
They are part of popular history, and a precious heritage, which should be preserved, enhanced and shared.
With your campaign contributions we aim to accomplish the following goals:
•Providing manufacturing and shipping for all the reserved perks from a trusted network of local craftsmen

•Writing a statute and a fair contract model for local workers
•Renting a small manufactory for Akwa
•Design &
column2:
Implementation of the Akwa website and web shop
•Producing the first Akwa collection
•Traveling expenses to Côte d'Ivoire for business trips 
•Making a video documentary about the network

column1: If we do not achieve full funding we will use the accumulated resources with the primary goal to create the perks for our supporters and the web shop.

The Ivory Coast is a strategic trade center in West Africa. Migrants from Ghana, Burkina Faso, Mali, and Senegal, are moving to Ivory Coast, to find work. Ivory Coast is a place where you can meet the culture and traditions of many West African tribes.
There are lots of people who produce handmade goods and who are willing to offer their craftsmanship at an affordable price.
We wish to see a reevaluation of handmade and custom-made fashion in Europe and we are dedicated to create a connection between the buyers and craftsmen through the Akwa network.

We are aware that the uncertainty of crowdfunding can discourage buyers to buy foreign textiles online, but we hope to be able to solve this problem through a communications campaign which enables the supporters to get in touch with the suppliers, and keep track of the progress.
If you do not have $_$, you can easily follow our project °|Ç|°
For more information about the project visit our website: https://akwacouture.com

My name is Tito Rosado. I am the founder of Transverse and creator of the very first boxers that hold your pants up. I am a husband and a father. I've been skateboarding for more than half of my life and I've been in retail management for over 15 years. I have always dreamed of starting my own company and wanted my brand to mean something more while creating something innovative to bring to the industry.

I came up with the idea over 5 years ago and it has been a side project I've worked on after work and weekends. After struggling with finding the right manufacturer, I was able to lock down a solid partner. I received so much positive feedback during our prototype testing that I knew I needed others to experience the comfort Transverse can bring.

While my initial Kickstarter campaign was not as successful as I'd hope, I was still fortunate enough to fund the first minimum purchase order to launch our product and get it into your hands.   Our product is ready to be shipped and sold as soon as our campaign comes to an end.

This has been a long journey and I cannot thank you enough for your support. After this campaign ends and all Indiegogo orders are fulfilled, I will open up the shop on our website to begin taking orders.
As this is our first product, I am always open for feedback and ways to improve. I look forward to hearing about your experience with Transverse!

Our straps on both sides are strategically placed at the bottom of the waistband so they can loop through your belt loops and snap back in place. They are designed to evenly hold the weight of your pants (including anything in your pockets) without you feeling any extra pressure (like a belt would) or pull on your boxers.

Our straps on both sides are strategically placed at the bottom of the waistband so they can loop through your belt loops and snap back in place. They are designed to evenly hold the weight of your pants (including anything in your pockets) without you feeling any extra pressure (like a belt would) or pull on your boxers.

column10: >Meet Daniel Williams: entrepreneur, filmmaker, and founder of MYST. As a business owner with a passion for adventure, scuba-diving, and the gym, his lifestyle is fast-paced. He struggled to find a watch that could keep up with him and make a great first impression, without costing a fortune.
column12: >We are celebrating purposeful living with a collection of rugged, elegant essentials.
column13:
>

the ELEMENT watch

Our flagship design. Basically the perfect wingman. Combining minimalist black with the beauty of wood. 

- 44 mm face with an adjustable band. 

- Water-resistant (3BAR)

That means you can go from the job to the gym (heck, maybe climb a mountain or do some kayaking) take a shower, then bring it all in with a classy date night ...

...without taking ELEMENT off your wrist. 

- Miyota quartz movement 

- durable hardlex mirror 

- illuminated hands

- battery life up to 3 years

- chronograph 

Band width: 23mm/ Case diameter 44mm / Case thickness 10.8 mm

column2: >Feeling cold is now a thing of the past
column4: >Experience heat at the touch of button with the Heated T-Shirts
column5: >A life changing product for the cold
column6:
>

The POLAR SEAL brand has been featured in hundreds of international news publications, please feel free to write about us. Get our press kit.

If you have any questions / comments or you wish to place a bulk order please do not hesitate to contact us at information@polarseal.me
column8:
Sizes

The Heated T-Shirt is available in a range of styles, colors, and sizes. Choose the one that's best for you and benefit from discounts if you order multiple.
column9:
>Key Features

The Heated T-Shirts are packed full of features. Below are some of the important ones.

Effortlessly activate heating in your upper back at the touch of the button and get warm within 10 seconds. Our new and improved heating elements are the product of years of research, consumer feedback, and manufacturing experience, designed to give you heat that permeates throughout your body.

Using the control button, adjust the heating to the temperature level that feels best. POLAR SEAL's color coded temperature control buttons allow you to tell what heating level you are on at a glance, and make adjustments in seconds. The heating levels range from 104°F to 122°F (40°C to 50°C).

Using your POLAR SEAL at the highest setting, you will enjoy heat for the following periods of time depending on your power bank's capcity.

column1: (Data subject to variation depending on the quality &
column2:
age of the power bank)

POLAR SEAL is compatible with standard USB power banks (not included). This gives you the freedom to choose the power bank that suits your needs and taste, or use USB power banks you already might own. 

Unlike most smart textiles, the POLAR SEAL Heated T-Shirts are machine washable making them easy to clean and ideal for everyday use just like traditional clothes.

The Heated T-Shirts are great for the outdoors. Specially designed, the POLAR SEAL control button is engineered to endure shocks and hits without changes to the settings.
column3:
>Detail Driven Design

Our team of engineers has taken great care to design a product that is versatile and suitable for many use cases. Learn more about the details that make our customers love our products.

POLAR SEAL fabrics are composed of polyester and elastane, making the garment warm, breathable, comfortable, and flexible, ideal for most outdoor sports and activities. 

The Heated T-Shirt temperature control button is reactive enough to be operated with gloves on.

With 12,000 units sold, our range of heated clothes have been tried and tested by skiers, adventurers, explorers, extreme sports athletes, and many others. Our clothes have kept their owners warm even in the coldest climates.

Over the past 12 months, we received a ton of feedback and interest from potential clients who have expressed the need for a heated smart garment suitable for professional settings. The short sleeve heated V-neck T-shirts, available in Black and White for Men and Women, are perfect to be worn under shirts or other garments.

The heated T-shirts won't get in the way of your golf swing or restrict your mobility. They're also perfect for cycling in cold weather.
column4:
>Size Charts

The dimensions below are suggested body dimensions by size. Sizes are based on the USA sizes and are similar to those of most other sports and urban wear brand names.
column8:
>Worried About Pre-Order?

We offer Free Size Exchanges

If you find that you did not select the right size, we will happily exchange the heated t-shirt (same gender and color) for a more suitable size. All you have to do is send us the heated t-shirt back within 10 days of receipt, unused, complete, with its tags, and packed in its original packaging. We will send you a replacement at our cost.

You are covered by our Warranty

We provide a ninety days warranty on the components and workmanship of the heated t-shirt’s heating element. Should it stop working within ninety days upon receipt, and once we have determined that these elements are defective solely as a result of a manufacturing defect, we will supply you with a replacement at no charge (including dispatch), or refund you.

We have already produced, sold, and shipped over twelve thousand heated garments

We have been selling our heated zip-tops for over a year, and have happy customers in over 60 countries.
column9:
>Existing Polar Seal Collection

POLAR SEAL has been selling heated clothes for over a year. We have various collections of existing products ranging from our sporty zip top to our luxurious white down parka.
column12:
>The Team

The POLAR SEAL Team members are passionate about design, smart textiles, and creating products that improve people’s lives and create an enjoyable user experience. We are also avid skiers and mountaineers, and our team members have trekked around the Annapurna and scaled Glaciers. We started the POLAR SEAL brand as we wanted to create comfortable and desirable smart garments to keep us warm on snow capped mountains and throughout our adventures. 

Feeling cold is a universal problem in the winter months, and for thousands of years, mankind has sought to stay warm by wearing layers of clothing to prevent cold from leaving the body. We thought to ourselves that there must be a better way. Why not create garments that can deliver heat on demand, and without having to compromise on style, comfort, or flexibility.

Our team has over 30 years of experience in designing, manufacturing, and distributing consumer electronic products throughout the world, ranging from IoT products to GPS devices and other smart appliances. We have recently ventured into the new and exciting smart textile space. 

The heated t-shirts are our third generation smart textile product. We have shipped over 12,000 units of our first generation smart textile, the heated zip top. The heated t-shirt is the product of months of experience, research and development, and iterative product improvements. We are confident that with our complimentary set of skills and years of experience, that the new POLAR SEAL collection will be produced and shipped on time. 

All the POLAR SEAL heated garments are put through rigorous testing, in the lab and in the field. POLAR SEAL has kept adventurers, athletes, and explorers warm on the top of snow capped peaks, in the arctic, and on transatlantic ocean crossings.

Our new and improved heating elements are the product of years of research, consumer feedback, and manufacturing experience, designed to give you heat that permeates throughout your body.Using the control button, adjust the heating to the temperature level that feels best. POLAR SEAL's color coded temperature control buttons allow you to tell what heating level you are on at a glance, and make adjustments in seconds. The heating levels range from 104°F to 122°F (40°C to 50°C).Using your POLAR SEAL at the highest setting, you will enjoy heat for the following periods of time depending on your power bank's capcity.

column1: (Data subject to variation depending on the quality & age of the power bank)POLAR SEAL is compatible with standard USB power banks (not included). This gives you the freedom to choose the power bank that suits your needs and taste, or use USB power banks you already might own. Unlike most smart textiles, the POLAR SEAL Heated T-Shirts are machine washable making them easy to clean and ideal for everyday use just like traditional clothes.The Heated T-Shirts are great for the outdoors. Specially designed, the POLAR SEAL control button is engineered to endure shocks and hits without changes to the settings.Detail Driven DesignOur team of engineers has taken great care to design a product that is versatile and suitable for many use cases. Learn more about the details that make our customers love our products.POLAR SEAL fabrics are composed of polyester and elastane, making the garment warm, breathable, comfortable, and flexible, ideal for most outdoor sports and activities. The Heated T-Shirt temperature control button is reactive enough to be operated with gloves on.With 12,000 units sold, our range of heated clothes have been tried and tested by skiers, adventurers, explorers, extreme sports athletes, and many others. Our clothes have kept their owners warm even in the coldest climates.Over the past 12 months, we received a ton of feedback and interest from potential clients who have expressed the need for a heated smart garment suitable for professional settings. The short sleeve heated V-neck T-shirts, available in Black and White for Men and Women, are perfect to be worn under shirts or other garments.The heated T-shirts won't get in the way of your golf swing or restrict your mobility. They're also perfect for cycling in cold weather. Size ChartsThe dimensions below are suggested body dimensions by size. Sizes are based on the USA sizes and are similar to those of most other sports and urban wear brand names.MenWomen Worried About Pre-Order?We offer Free Size ExchangesIf you find that you did not select the right size, we will happily exchange the heated t-shirt (same gender and color) for a more suitable size. All you have to do is send us the heated t-shirt back within 10 days of receipt, unused, complete, with its tags, and packed in its original packaging. We will send you a replacement at our cost.You are covered by our WarrantyWe provide a ninety days warranty on the components and workmanship of the heated t-shirt’s heating element. Should it stop working within ninety days upon receipt, and once we have determined that these elements are defective solely as a result of a manufacturing defect, we will supply you with a replacement at no charge (including dispatch), or refund you.We have already produced, sold, and shipped over twelve thousand heated garmentsWe have been selling our heated zip-tops for over a year, and have happy customers in over 60 countries.  Existing Polar Seal CollectionPOLAR SEAL has been selling heated clothes for over a year. We have various collections of existing products ranging from our sporty zip top to our luxurious white down parka.  The TeamThe POLAR SEAL Team members are passionate about design, smart textiles, and creating products that improve people’s lives and create an enjoyable user experience. We are also avid skiers and mountaineers, and our team members have trekked around the Annapurna and scaled Glaciers. We started the POLAR SEAL brand as we wanted to create comfortable and desirable smart garments to keep us warm on snow capped mountains and throughout our adventures. Feeling cold is a universal problem in the winter months, and for thousands of years, mankind has sought to stay warm by wearing layers of clothing to prevent cold from leaving the body. We thought to ourselves that there must be a better way. Why not create garments that can deliver heat on demand, and without having to compromise on style, comfort, or flexibility.Our team has over 30 years of experience in designing, manufacturing, and distributing consumer electronic products throughout the world, ranging from IoT products to GPS devices and other smart appliances. We have recently ventured into the new and exciting smart textile space. The heated t-shirts are our third generation smart textile product. We have shipped over 12,000 units of our first generation smart textile, the heated zip top. The heated t-shirt is the product of months of experience, research and development, and iterative product improvements. We are confident that with our complimentary set of skills and years of experience, that the new POLAR SEAL collection will be produced and shipped on time. All the POLAR SEAL heated garments are put through rigorous testing, in the lab and in the field. POLAR SEAL has kept adventurers, athletes, and explorers warm on the top of snow capped peaks, in the arctic, and on transatlantic ocean crossings.If you have any question or comments, our team will be more than happy to answer you promptly.Like POLAR SEAL?Are you from the press? What our customers are sayingWhat the press is sayingThe POLAR SEAL brand has been featured in hundreds of international news publications.",25.0,0,"2 Campaigns
I've been a scribbler ever since I could hold a pencil. I spend a lot of time writing. I always will. I know there's something special about putting pen to paper.

I was tired of burning through expensive notebooks and their thin paper. So I turned to other options. I looked online. I searched far and wide. Dozens later, I was left frustrated. I couldn't find a solid refillable notebook with great paper. It was even harder to find something big enough for practical use.
Big ideas don't fit on tiny pages.
That's around where I met up with an old friend. That's Mark. Turns out he had some great ideas about design, leather, and how we could make the coolest notebooks possible.
So we put our heads together. In a few quick months we built something really special. And we're here to share that with you.

We start with locally sourced leather. We wanted something that would age and mark beautifully. It has to grow with your story and projects. You take pride in your own unique work. Your notebook should reflect that. So we cut and punch each piece by hand to make sure every notebook is as original as it's owner.

Then we add premium vellum paper. Well-reviewed and high performance notebooks have been using this stuff for a long time. It's a thicker paper at 100gsm. This means it has enough weight to hold heavier inks beautifully. We've sized it at A4, the international standard for paper. Each page measures 8.3"" x 11.7"" -- enough space for even your biggest ideas or designs. We're offering options in lined or blank for now.

We bind it all together with silver or brass hardware. The convenient binding makes it really easy to add or remove paper. You can keep your notebook going for years and years. Then we add a clip to keep it all sealed and looking sharp.
We're looking to secure orders and raise $1,500 USD. This is enough for us to get better rates on leather, paper, tools, and supplies we need to make this project a reality.

We're here to specialize on something. We aren't looking to create a notebook for everybody. We want to focus on an amazing experience for the creatives who need it. Each pledge takes us one step closer towards that goal.

Lets talk transparently. Our biggest flexible cost, believe it or not, is our paper. The larger quantity we can secure (that means the more notebook packages we pledge), the better price we can offer on our future refills. Our goal is to make great paper available at a fair price. Whenever you need it.

Putting your trust in us means a lot. We're just two guys who like to build and write and design. But if you stand beside us as a founding backer, you are sharing a commitment to authentic, hand-made goods. Why tell your story with anything less?
We're a two man team. There's only so much we can tackle at once. Cutting leather too quickly has dangerous consequences. Those knives are sharp.

We want to ensure each notebook is the highest quality we can produce. So we're going to release them in batches. If you take an early-bird perk, we're going to try our damnedest to deliver for December 2015. That means we'll make it on time for an amazing gift or surprise for someone special.
If you miss that perk, don't worry. We'll get our next batch out in early 2016 at the latest.

And, lastly, an important note: we value original products. Each piece of leather has its own handsome markings and character. Each cut is handled differently on each hide. No two notebooks will look the same. Don't hide your personality. Get excited about what makes yours unique.
[For any notebook perk, we will e-mail to confirm paper type (lined or blank)]

** Please note that due to overwhelming demand, and because we're just two guys, we are not able to guarantee December delivery unless previously stated. We're trying our best, and we don't want to let anyone down, but for orders made on or after Oct 8, shipping will likely be in early 2016.

Since you are being so great, helping us out, we're going to cut you a little piece of leather, sign it, and mail it to you anywhere in Canada or the continental USA. We'll even write something nice. Thanks for the support.

Support Northbound Notebooks and receive a $25.00 discount code towards a future notebook order. Great if you aren’t quite ready for a new notebook, but you are eager to support a new Canadian company. That’s us. Limit one code per order, and you can’t combine them with other promotions or discounts. Only valid through northboundnotebooks.com. Go ahead and gift 'em.

Congrats. You’re getting a killer notebook. These beauties are hand cut Canadian leather, wrapped around premium refillable vellum paper. Personalize yours with either silver or bronze hardware. Start telling your story. 'Hoff not included.

Now we’re talking. Not only are you getting an awesome notebook, we’re also sending you a bunch of the best paper you’ll ever write on. Included in this package is your authentic Northbound Notebook, and two additional premium refills in lined or blank vellum paper. We're also tossing in an awesome fountain pen. Nic possibly included.

This one's madness. You'll snag two great notebooks, six total packs of vellum paper however you like it, two fountain pens, and three codes for 50% off your next refill packages. Most importantly, Chris, our extremely talented and handsome artist friend, is going to make you a beautiful portrait like the ones featured above. He will personalize your notebooks with a not-quite-life-like illustration of whatever you like.

Perfect for your actual-family, work-family, or friends-family. Or you could just pool funds with some people you meet online and make your own family. With this perk, you get four authentic Northbound Notebooks, four fountain pens, and four extra refills.
Every notebook backer receives a handmade thank you. It's a custom leather piece signed by Adam and Mark as a genuine thanks for your support.
Every notebook backer receives our custom hardware in both silver and bronze options. This makes sure you can mix and match your own style.
With this much support, we can quickly roll out new paper types. We'd start with Grid, a great option for designers everywhere.
With even more support, we're going to add a dotted paper option. This will bring our total paper options to four, to make sure you get the perfect fit for you.

This is incredible. If we get to this level of funding, we're going to reach out personally to every notebook contributor. In half a year, we want to touch base and make sure you love your Northbound Notebook. And we're going to send a care package with some cool stuff your way. Including more paper to keep you going.

Options are good. To add even more customization to your new notebook, we're giving you an extra clip. That means you'll have options in both silver and gold. It'll look great with your matching hardware.
We want to give everyone a signed copy of our debut independent magazine, 'Northbound &
column2: Notable'. We want to showcase the writers, artists, and thinkers in our new community. Not only are we going to make sure every notebook backer gets a free issue mailed to them, we're also going to use a portion of the funds to compensate our talented authors and artists.

column1:
Free Canadian shipping on all refill orders. Add $4 USD for USA.  We know paying for shipping sucks, and especially for something you might order regularly. We want you to write, scratch, scribble, and create. So we’re eating this cost for you. Don’t worry about it. Our pricing for paper refills will be announced at the end of the campaign.

 

Our notebooks are made from authentic, locally sourced leather. That means they will wear with age and show their handsomeness with time. Because of the nature of untreated leather, each notebook will have its own story and imperfections. Get excited about yours.

 

Why vellum paper? A thicker paper holds fountain pen ink and marker beautifully. Lines are cleaner, the writing motion is more fluid, and the end result is beautiful and inspiring. We could absolutely sell cheaper paper, but we won’t. Once you feel the difference you’ll understand. And you’ll want some more.

 

How much will refills cost me? The short answer: We don’t know yet. The more we can manufacture and order at a time, the lower our paper costs will be. Refills will be sold in two or three packs, ranging from $5-10 per refill. Remember, our game plan is to guarantee free shipping for life on refills. Refills available only through northboundnotebooks.com.

 

Want some specs? Each notebook measures about 9” x 12” x .5”. The leather is about ⅛ of an inch thick. The paper refills are in international A4 standard size. There are 40 synthetic vellum sheets per refill (finalized sheet total may vary depending on design requirements). The paper measures 8.27 × 11.7 inches, boasting even more room for design and writing scenes. Each refill is bound to a simple thick backing to ensure rigidity and consistent lines. To refill, simply unscrew the binding, pop out the old paper, and throw in the new. Each notebook is hand cut, so expect slight variations between each.

 

Why don’t you sell a smaller size? Great question. Why didn't Michael Jordan try baseball? To be honest, we aren’t interested in ultra-portable sizes at the moment. There are lots of great alternatives for refillable tiny notebooks, but there isn’t anything for real designers, writers, and artists. People who need more space to work and think and create. We will think about more form factors in the future, but we don’t ever want to compromise the creative experience.
Hey, if you just can't go for a notebook right now, don't fret! We've got a variety of perks you might find cool.

If this product isn't a fit for you, but you like the idea or know someone who would, do us a favour and send them a referral. Use social media, e-mail, or yell it from your roof top. We're a small team. Your personal recommendation is the best we could ask for!
Find more details soon at www.northboundnotebooks.com
Contact us at northboundnotebooks@gmail.com for press kit information!

My intentions are to inspire women who feel broken, lost, or stuck. I am not the typical ""pageant-girl"". No women is perfect. But, I want to embrace all of my flaws, to assure women that they do not have to look, speak, or act a certain way to feel accepted. There are no rights and wrongs in being yourself. I believe 2014's Miss Manhattan Beach Pageant show is going to boost the confidence of those not only participating in it, but those watching. I believe I make a remarkable representation for my city, and even for the world. I wish to gain personal fulfillment in every aspect of my life, as it has already given me something to wake up and look forward to everyday.

I am asking for donations to fund my pageant show. To give me one chance to display my big heart and talents to the world. If you are unable to donate, I only ask that you help spread the word in my support! :)
Thank you so much for your time and consideration.

- Victoria Morgan

SKYE Footwear has been featured in:

 

 

 

The feedback so far has been great. We're launching with 3 ultra-comfy unisex models, each coming in 2 distinct colorways and a full range of sizes. We couldn't be more excited to bring great-looking comfort to your feet.

 

 

 

 

 

The Powll

The Powll is a lightweight heavyweight, a quiet showpiece, perfect for a subtle statement. Street walking, coffee shopping, diner hopping, or shop talking. Pairs well with stingy or generous pants, ups and downs, and definitely when looking smart.

Powll Beige

Powll Burgundy

 

 

The Rbutus

The Rbutus is great for the runner that sometimes has to walk, too. The urban-outdoors are calling. Great for hikes, bikes, and getting likes. Pairs well with anything showing a little ankle
column2:
good shorts, wild tights, superwide denim, and even rolled up slacks.

Rbutus White

 

Rbutus Black

 

 

The Lons

The Lons is a marine classic for modern urbanites. Cool and casual. Great for boardwalks, top decks, and beach indulgence. Pairs perfectly with your closet-country-club get-up, your yacht ensemble, or easily with casual high-ankle denim or dungarees.

Lons Storm Grey

Lons Black/White

 

Here's a universal sizing chart. If you're in between sizes, better to go up. 

 

 

 

 

 

We've spent the better part of 2 years engineering shoes that are designed to be better for your body, delivering uncompromising comfort, and never sacrificing style. The following 4 categories make-up the technology that gives SKYE Footwear the ultra-comfy promise.

 

SKYE Impact + Rebound Insole

It's like a gel bed with a rebounder. SKYE Impact is a built-in deep gel heel cup for impact absorption in the heel strike zone, for happy ankles. And SKYE Rebound is engineered with a springy gel to keep a natural bounce in your step, for happy walking.

 

 

The mid-arch is crafted for smart responsive anatomical support, making for stress-free feet and euphoric legs. And there’s an anti-stink layer to prevent the growth of odour-causing bacteria.

Nose and knee gratitude aplenty.

 

 

SKYE Foam Outsole

It's our ground warrior. The midsole is our ultra-soft, shock absorbing foam rubber base
column3:
our own patent pending design. The pillow-like EVA cushion compresses with every step and reforms back to full shape for seamlessly soft heel-to-toe movements.

And it’s super light. Like walking on air.

 

The Loop-Lok

Inspired by SUPing. Our patent-pending Loop-Lok means a snug laceless fit around your foot, inspired by West Coast watersports like stand-up paddleboarding. The bungee cables loop and gently lock across the upper mid-foot, like a good hug.

You never need to tie a knot.

 

4-way Stretch Upper

The form-fitter. The material-mix for the shape-fit upper gives true 4-way stretch for a premium form-fit feeling. The breezy breathable fabric feels like air to the toes, while the microfiber structure retains strength and support in its grip. 

Feet still think they’re naked.

 

SKYE shoe anatomy

Every single detail contributes to the smooth, comfortable feeling of SKYE shoes.

 

 

 

 

 

Our backers get an amazing limited time price on SKYE shoes. The Early Bird VIP price is for the first of the first backers, and all backers get the VIP discount price.

For the most dedicated individualistic SKYE lovers, we have custom color options and care kits in the higher tiers of perks. And of course, you can go right out and get the whole collection.

 

Custom Colorway

For the most individual of individualistic backers, the Custom Colorway perk gets you a personal consultation with our designer to select a completely unique color scheme for your pair. Yes, the only one in the world.

The heel loop, upper materials, and Loop-Lok laceless feature can all be customized. The EVA outsole can be specified in either black or white.

A few ideas...

 

 

 

As we mentioned, we've been at this for a while. Here's a quick look at everything we've done to date, and what lies ahead as we prepare the launch the shoes.

 

 

 

First of all, we love shoes. 

We’re mostly busy folks. Always travelling, working, bustling, and always on our feet. But we’re constantly left brokenhearted when our crazy little lifestyle doesn’t jive with our favorite pairs of shoes – great looks yet tired feet and sad knees. We were begging for stylish comfort.

We set out to make shoes that do comfort like we dreamed. A beautiful everyday shoe that pairs with every outfit (the mark of a true favorite), built for real comfort and long, long wearing.

​So comfy you feel like you never touch the ground.

 

 

So, we’ve spent 18 months designing and redesigning, searching and testing materials, never sacrificing comfort, never sacrificing style, never at the expense of poor labor conditions, and never at the cost of our precious planet.

And. Here. We. Are.

 

 

With the success of this project, we'll have the funding to create shoe molds for all sizes, order materials, and meet the factory minimum quantities. 

 

 

 

We’re not completely new to bringing a product to market.

We’ve been coordinating manufacturing and developing footwear, accessories, and toys for a collective 30+ years. But this is our biggest and most exciting leap.

We have been working on the lineup of SKYE products for over 18 months, iterating dozens of rounds of product development, finding and working with the best vendors for the perfectly calibrated shoe, for true comfort.

 

 

Our first small run of samples has been a great success. We’re thrilled to be bringing this idea to

life, and getting beautiful, ultra-comfy pairs of shoes into the hands of all our backers.

Don’t hesitate to let us know if you have any questions or concerns.

Email ForAlways@SKYEfootwear.com if you want to chat.

 

 

Domestic 
All shipping costs in the US and Canada* are a fixed additional cost depending on location. 

International 
We will ship internationally, using major carriers with tracking, so your new shoes get to you safely and as affordably as possible. 

 

 

 

 

For international backers, there can be import duties or taxes when your order arrives. 

It’s important to us that your order and experience is smooth and comfortable, so get in touch with us and we’ll be happy to update you on what we’ve uncovered for your region.

 

 

 

We’re only happy if you’re super-comfy and look amazing.

We’ll be sure to exchange your shoes so long as they are unworn, still have the tags attached, and you have the original receipt within 60 days of receiving the shoes.

Once our shoes are available for retail (a few months after backers receive the early-birds), you’ll need to purchase your correct size from us at retail, and we’ll refund the difference.

Email: MakeItComfy@SKYEfootwear.com and we’ll sort you out.

 

 

 

We are unbelievably grateful for your support in helping us reach our project goal, and in return we commit to your true comfort in SKYE Footwear.

If there’s a manufacturing issue with your shoes, no problem, we’ve got it covered. If it’s more of a preference thing, we’ll get you into another pair of SKYE Footwear better suited for you.

 

 

","SKYE Footwear has been featured in:   The feedback so far has been great. We're launching with 3 ultra-comfy unisex models, each coming in 2 distinct colorways and a full range of sizes. We couldn't be more excited to bring great-looking comfort to your feet.     The PowllThe Powll is a lightweight heavyweight, a quiet showpiece, perfect for a subtle statement. Street walking, coffee shopping, diner hopping, or shop talking. Pairs well with stingy or generous pants, ups and downs, and definitely when looking smart.Powll BeigePowll Burgundy  The RbutusThe Rbutus is great for the runner that sometimes has to walk, too. The urban-outdoors are calling. Great for hikes, bikes, and getting likes. Pairs well with anything showing a little ankle
column4: good shorts, wild tights, superwide denim, and even rolled up slacks.Rbutus White Rbutus Black  The LonsThe Lons is a marine classic for modern urbanites. Cool and casual. Great for boardwalks, top decks, and beach indulgence. Pairs perfectly with your closet-country-club get-up, your yacht ensemble, or easily with casual high-ankle denim or dungarees.Lons Storm GreyLons Black/White Here's a universal sizing chart. If you're in between sizes, better to go up.      We've spent the better part of 2 years engineering shoes that are designed to be better for your body, delivering uncompromising comfort, and never sacrificing style. The following 4 categories make-up the technology that gives SKYE Footwear the ultra-comfy promise. SKYE Impact + Rebound InsoleIt's like a gel bed with a rebounder. SKYE Impact is a built-in deep gel heel cup for impact absorption in the heel strike zone, for happy ankles. And SKYE Rebound is engineered with a springy gel to keep a natural bounce in your step, for happy walking.  The mid-arch is crafted for smart responsive anatomical support, making for stress-free feet and euphoric legs. And there’s an anti-stink layer to prevent the growth of odour-causing bacteria.Nose and knee gratitude aplenty.  SKYE Foam OutsoleIt's our ground warrior. The midsole is our ultra-soft, shock absorbing foam rubber base
column5: our own patent pending design. The pillow-like EVA cushion compresses with every step and reforms back to full shape for seamlessly soft heel-to-toe movements.And it’s super light. Like walking on air. The Loop-LokInspired by SUPing. Our patent-pending Loop-Lok means a snug laceless fit around your foot, inspired by West Coast watersports like stand-up paddleboarding. The bungee cables loop and gently lock across the upper mid-foot, like a good hug.You never need to tie a knot. 4-way Stretch UpperThe form-fitter. The material-mix for the shape-fit upper gives true 4-way stretch for a premium form-fit feeling. The breezy breathable fabric feels like air to the toes, while the microfiber structure retains strength and support in its grip. Feet still think they’re naked. SKYE shoe anatomyEvery single detail contributes to the smooth, comfortable feeling of SKYE shoes.     Our backers get an amazing limited time price on SKYE shoes. The Early Bird VIP price is for the first of the first backers, and all backers get the VIP discount price.For the most dedicated individualistic SKYE lovers, we have custom color options and care kits in the higher tiers of perks. And of course, you can go right out and get the whole collection. Custom ColorwayFor the most individual of individualistic backers, the Custom Colorway perk gets you a personal consultation with our designer to select a completely unique color scheme for your pair. Yes, the only one in the world.The heel loop, upper materials, and Loop-Lok laceless feature can all be customized. The EVA outsole can be specified in either black or white.A few ideas...   As we mentioned, we've been at this for a while. Here's a quick look at everything we've done to date, and what lies ahead as we prepare the launch the shoes.   First of all, we love shoes. We’re mostly busy folks. Always travelling, working, bustling, and always on our feet. But we’re constantly left brokenhearted when our crazy little lifestyle doesn’t jive with our favorite pairs of shoes – great looks yet tired feet and sad knees. We were begging for stylish comfort.We set out to make shoes that do comfort like we dreamed. A beautiful everyday shoe that pairs with every outfit (the mark of a true favorite), built for real comfort and long, long wearing.​So comfy you feel like you never touch the ground.  So, we’ve spent 18 months designing and redesigning, searching and testing materials, never sacrificing comfort, never sacrificing style, never at the expense of poor labor conditions, and never at the cost of our precious planet.And. Here. We. Are.  With the success of this project, we'll have the funding to create shoe molds for all sizes, order materials, and meet the factory minimum quantities.    We’re not completely new to bringing a product to market.We’ve been coordinating manufacturing and developing footwear, accessories, and toys for a collective 30+ years. But this is our biggest and most exciting leap.We have been working on the lineup of SKYE products for over 18 months, iterating dozens of rounds of product development, finding and working with the best vendors for the perfectly calibrated shoe, for true comfort.  Our first small run of samples has been a great success. We’re thrilled to be bringing this idea tolife, and getting beautiful, ultra-comfy pairs of shoes into the hands of all our backers.Don’t hesitate to let us know if you have any questions or concerns.Email ForAlways@SKYEfootwear.com if you want to chat.  Domestic All shipping costs in the US and Canada* are a fixed additional cost depending on location. International We will ship internationally, using major carriers with tracking, so your new shoes get to you safely and as affordably as possible.     For international backers, there can be import duties or taxes when your order arrives. It’s important to us that your order and experience is smooth and comfortable, so get in touch with us and we’ll be happy to update you on what we’ve uncovered for your region.   We’re only happy if you’re super-comfy and look amazing.We’ll be sure to exchange your shoes so long as they are unworn, still have the tags attached, and you have the original receipt within 60 days of receiving the shoes.Once our shoes are available for retail (a few months after backers receive the early-birds), you’ll need to purchase your correct size from us at retail, and we’ll refund the difference.Email: MakeItComfy@SKYEfootwear.com and we’ll sort you out.   We are unbelievably grateful for your support in helping us reach our project goal, and in return we commit to your true comfort in SKYE Footwear.If there’s a manufacturing issue with your shoes, no problem, we’ve got it covered. If it’s more of a preference thing, we’ll get you into another pair of SKYE Footwear better suited for you.",37.0,0,"3 Campaigns

column2:
Oak Travel Duffle

Do you ever worry about running out of battery when you’re on the go? Always keep your phone charged in style with the The Emery &
column3: Oak Travel Duffle. It has an internal battery to keep your phone and tablet charged during any situation, making it the perfect carry-on travel bag. It is also an all-in-one carry solution for both your office and gym essentials.
column39:
s=7d269d70cb2df4d4255d4fcf73d6302a"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

 

What makes the Emery &
column40:
Oak Duffle special?

We designed the Emery &
column41:
Oak Travel Duffle to be the perfect combination of fashion and function. Incorporating quality durable fabrics in a sleek, classic design, this bag fits into any modern lifestyle.

Classic design

column1: • Meets carry-on size limits - Length (48cm) Width (20cm) Height (25cm)

column7:
s=65b86f8e21c63222fa8033da0984762c"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

Available In Two Colors

The E&
column8: O Travel Duffle is available in Slate Black and Heather Gray. At the end of our Kickstarter campaign we will send you a survey to choose your color.
column13:
s=1c34754166b2aa102a98a5fdcbb09958"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

Easy Charge System

Each bag comes with a powerful 10,000mAh battery that can charge your phone up to three times. The lightning fast 2.4A output lets you quickly charge your smartphone or tablet at optimal speed. When the battery runs out, just charge it with the micro USB cable (included with the battery). It can also be charged over 500 times without the battery losing effectiveness and is engineered to automatically shut down if a short circuit or overload output occurs while the unit is charging.

The battery is compatible with all phones and tablets. As a benchmark, it can charge an iPhone 6 up to three times, a Galaxy S7 up to 2.5 times, and an iPad mini one full time.
column26:
s=db4356a4bedf81939cedf4f37b844185"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

Shoe Compartment

Nylon lining separates your shoes from the rest of your gear. Fits up to size 13 shoes.
column32:
s=cbc8fee1b3186b3b1654f42682b9b84e"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

Convenient Interior Features

The spacious main compartment is designed to effortlessly hold all of your essentials. The interior has a slip pocket and a large zipper pocket to keep your phone, wallet, passport, and everything else organized.
column39:
Oak Laptop Sleeve

Matching felt and leather sleeve keeps your laptop safe in the duffle bag. Fits up to a 15 inch laptop.
column51:
s=30eac9765d2462691eeda5d373e1e96d"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

 

Our Team

We wanted to make a bag for the mobile generation...

We created Emery &
column52: Oak for the person that is always on-the-go. Our goal is to create accessories for today's modern lifestyle, crossing fashion and tech in a seamless package. Our name is inspired by the contrasting cities that we live in: Emeryville (a busy tech hub) and Oakland (rich with history and character).

s=e13a4a7e2c1fa5d45cb0e00ff2b303b6"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

Project Timeline
column64:
s=0b6dbf99c8a88c77dc0eb53074efa9cc"" src="""" style=""""/>

Hello there! We are the design duo behind the SF based jewelry company Birds N Bones Jewelry, Ashley Lagasse and Zoe Cope. We met while attending the Academy of Art University for sculpture and metal art design. We became friends when we discovered we each had a box of specimens containing animal bones, minerals, and other nature related objects in our lockers. We launched Birds N Bones Jewelry on October 31st, 2013 and have had great success, feedback, and opportunities with our current collection. All of our pieces are hand made by the two of us using sterling silver castings of animal bones and parts to create our edgy and wearable fine jewelry. 


The reason we need your help is to jump start our next collection inspired by DRAGONS... and a certain Mother of Dragons on a certain HBO show...
column2:
) 

We want this collection to launch in the fall, since winter is coming. Our new collection will have around 15 designs, including ones like dragon eye taxidermy rings and sterling silver bat skull pendants
column3:
plus all sorts of dragon related pieces like silver dragon teeth and dragon toe earrings- even some mixed media pieces using leather tassels with sterling silver lizard heads.


Starting a multi piece fine jewelry collection is expensive. 

We have to purchase the bones, stones and other materials, make molds of said bones, get castings made from the molds, take time to work and explore with designs, finalize designs and then make final molds and do castings in sterling silver. After that process, we produce all of the final jewelry pieces ourselves, design and buy packaging, photograph product shots of the pieces as well as a full scale look-book with a model, and finally take time and effort to promote the dragon-poop out of what we just created. 

The pieces in this collection will range in price from $35 to upwards of $350 on select designs that include semi precious stones and diamonds, so donating now and using your perk in the future is a great way to get these killer pieces at a discount.

If you help us by donating you receive some awesome perks! Perks range from unique Birds N Bones merchandise not sold on our website, to getting 10-30% off on your next order from us.You'd be at the forefront for getting these new designs from us and we'd be ever grateful for your support and help. It's just us two who make everything for Birds N Bones Jewelry and we need more capital in order to continue expanding our collections. 

With the donations we receive, you grant us the ability to purchase materials to create awesome designs, time to finalize the designs, and moola so we can launch with product photos as well as a look-book. We love making jewelry and we love having it reach people all over the world... we are just in need of funds to keep on creating and growing.

Please donate if you can and share our campaign with friends and family. Thank you!!

P.S. We get our animal bones and parts from sources like Paxton's Gate, natural history museum stores, and sometimes Amazon and Ebay. We always make sure they were ethically sourced and are from naturally deceased animals. We only use one of the bones/skulls/series-of-claws to make a mold from it and do all of our castings from the mold. The mold is injected with wax and then we use those in the ""lost wax"" casting process. There isn't actually a bone in our finished product, it's all sterling silver.

column1:
0,"

Glamour You Can Feel Good About

Bling!Beauty is an all-natural luxury cosmetics company that offers more than just khaki, navy and beige – because life is a whole lot more fun with a healthy dose of glitter! 

Through its online shop and its unique Bling!Babe direct sales force, Bling!Beauty offers you dazzling all-natural Glitters, colour-shifting Pearls, shimmering Eyeshadows, luscious lip Glosses and much, much more – in hundreds of unique shades to help you express your inner diva!

All Bling!Beauty cosmetics are hand-crafted locally in Toronto, Ontario in small batches to maintain quality standards.  We only use high-quality, cosmetic grade ingredients, and all of our products are free from common allergens, harsh irritants and fillers, toxic parabens, harmful chemicals and dyes, and cruel animal by-products. Our complete cosmetics line is gluten-free, vegan, and safe for even the most sensitive skin because beauty should not hurt!

We are so proud of our all-natural, healthy cosmetic formulations, and we only support suppliers who share those same values.
column2:
/>

How You Can Help

Over the past year, we have been working tirelessly to build Bling!Beauty into a thriving business from the ground up, through raw ingredient formulating, colour mixing, product trialing, focus group studies, business development, legal set-up, marketing design, product photo shoots and Bling!Babe recruitment and we are so excited to begin now to share it with the world – that’s where you come in.

We need your help to officially launch Bling!Beauty this Winter.  Your contributions will allow us to purchase enough raw ingredients, packaging, labels and Bling!Babe kit materials to meet the demand  that Bling!Beauty has already started to generate.  We have just moved into a new location where we will have a dedicated Formulary Lab and Showroom – with your help, we want to fill those empty rooms with Bling!
column3:
/>

Every little bit helps – so regardless of whether or not we reach our funding goals, all proceeds will go directly into buying the supplies and materials needed to create initial operating inventory, as well as into creating some amazing perks for you!  

To thank you for your support, we are creating a Special Edition Colour Collection together with our supporters to share with you – as well as a host of other amazing, Glittery rewards!
column7:
/> 

AND, if we surpass our funding goals, Bling!Beauty be able to create even more products! So, the more money we raise, the more products we can produce and distribute – like lipsticks, moisturisers and creams, and high quality cosmetic brushes and cases – and of course, the more rewards we’ll give to you!


Our Difference

Here at Bling!Beauty, we believe that you deserve cosmetics as naturally fabulous as you are, and so we are committed to using only ingredients which we deem to be safe, effective and healthy for you.

Unfortunately, not every cosmetics company operates under these same guidelines. Despite the many claims of products that are “All-Natural”, “Healthy”, “Organic” etc., the cosmetics industry is shockingly unregulated and so very little stands in the way of cosmetic companies making false, misleading or erroneous claims.

Many popular companies are using a horrifying amount of harmful ingredients in their formulations, either to act as so-called performance-boosters, as preservatives, or merely just to add cheap filler to increase their profit margins. Surprisingly, this goes not just for the mainstream cosmetics companies, but also for an astonishingly large number of organic mineral make-up companies, who boast their healthy image despite the unnecessary inclusion of these types of ingredients. (Hint: Just because it’s “natural” doesn’t mean it’s healthy for you!)

Despite the incredible consumer interest in this market segment, the only options available for a conscientious fashionista before the establishment of Bling!Beauty were either products full of harmful ingredients masquerading as all-natural or – simply put – incredibly boring!  

There’s NO Glitter!

In an effort to provide healthier alternatives to mainstream cosmetics, Bling!Beauty founder Aleisha Bonin personally formulated and developed this extensive (and ever-growing) line of stunning high-impact colour cosmetics – from foundations and primers through to shadows and shimmers – creating a make-up line as naturally fabulous as you are!  


Our Values

We believe that cosmetics should be used for celebrating our beauty instead of covering our insecurities, and so we provide resources and products that will help you to become more informed and more self-confident.  Our cosmetics are designed to support you in celebrating your own natural beauty with courage, self-love and a healthy dose of self-esteem.

We are strongly against any beauty industry practices which – through presenting false or misleading claims, irresponsible or malevolent actions, or humiliation or shaming – aim to promote the development of insecurities, body image issues or otherwise unhealthy habits or activities.

Our differences are what make each of us so incredibly beautiful ~ much like the dazzling minerals we use in creating our products. All of our models are fiercely real Bling!Beauties just like you and are never made to look like someone or something they are not! They are actual consumers who are naturally beautiful and who truly love Bling!Beauty.


The Bling!Babe Opportunity

Through our Bling!Babe Opportunity, we also provide guidance and resources for driven individuals who want to launch their own healthy and empowering career! 

When Aleisha started Bling!Beauty, she wanted to do more than simply start a business, she wanted to create a means for helping people to positively transform their lives, so she developed the Bling!Babe Opportunity.
column10:
/> 

These dynamic and driven individuals will be able to earn money while promoting self-confidence and good health to their clients through the Bling!Beauty catalogue of products. Bling!Babes also receive ongoing support, business guidance, mentoring and inspiration from the Bling!Beauty team!


About the Founder

As a professional Life Strategies Coach, Aleisha works together with individuals to achieve fulfilling outcomes in many areas of their lives, utilising creative approaches and artistic media as tools for personal exploration and development.  

Her passion for cosmetics arose while working in theatre, where she not only performed in, wrote and directed stage performances and film, but where she also worked in Costume and Stage Make-up.  This passion was further encouraged when she began to seek out healthier options for her own sensitive skin – she not only suffers from eczema and rosacea, but is also sensitive to multiple chemicals and has a histamine intolerance – not to mention of course the wrinkles and age spots!  

Finding little that excited her in the natural cosmetics market, and even less that was truly as natural as it claimed to be (beauty SHOULD NOT hurt!),she began to study methods of formulating her own natural cosmetics and thus, Bling!Beauty was born.

Having more than a healthy flair for the dramatic, Aleisha has always enjoyed the transformative power of cosmetics – both as a mechanism for aesthetic expression and as a tool for personal empowerment.  Through Bling!Beauty, Aleisha seeks to provide healthy alternatives to the mainstream cosmetics while also encouraging that healthy flair for the dramatic in others.


Share the Love!

So help us to spread the word – through Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, your Blog or your words – and bring a little Bling! to someone else’s day! And thank you for sharing this time with us today, and helping us to share Bling!Beauty with an even greater market in the next year. Your support will have an impact on so many people, because everyone deserves make-up as naturally fabulous as they are!

(Hint: Just because it’s “natural” doesn’t mean it’s healthy for you!)Despite the incredible consumer interest in this market segment, the only options available for a conscientious fashionista before the establishment of Bling!Beauty were either products full of harmful ingredients masquerading as all-natural or – simply put – incredibly boring!  There’s NO Glitter!In an effort to provide healthier alternatives to mainstream cosmetics, Bling!Beauty founder Aleisha Bonin personally formulated and developed this extensive (and ever-growing) line of stunning high-impact colour cosmetics – from foundations and primers through to shadows and shimmers – creating a make-up line as naturally fabulous as you are!  Our ValuesWe believe that cosmetics should be used for celebrating our beauty instead of covering our insecurities, and so we provide resources and products that will help you to become more informed and more self-confident.  Our cosmetics are designed to support you in celebrating your own natural beauty with courage, self-love and a healthy dose of self-esteem.We are strongly against any beauty industry practices which – through presenting false or misleading claims, irresponsible or malevolent actions, or humiliation or shaming – aim to promote the development of insecurities, body image issues or otherwise unhealthy habits or activities.Our differences are what make each of us so incredibly beautiful ~ much like the dazzling minerals we use in creating our products. All of our models are fiercely real Bling!Beauties just like you and are never made to look like someone or something they are not! They are actual consumers who are naturally beautiful and who truly love Bling!Beauty.The Bling!Babe OpportunityThrough our Bling!Babe Opportunity, we also provide guidance and resources for driven individuals who want to launch their own healthy and empowering career! When Aleisha started Bling!Beauty, she wanted to do more than simply start a business, she wanted to create a means for helping people to positively transform their lives, so she developed the Bling!Babe Opportunity.   These dynamic and driven individuals will be able to earn money while promoting self-confidence and good health to their clients through the Bling!Beauty catalogue of products. Bling!Babes also receive ongoing support, business guidance, mentoring and inspiration from the Bling!Beauty team!About the FounderAs a professional Life Strategies Coach, Aleisha works together with individuals to achieve fulfilling outcomes in many areas of their lives, utilising creative approaches and artistic media as tools for personal exploration and development.  Her passion for cosmetics arose while working in theatre, where she not only performed in, wrote and directed stage performances and film, but where she also worked in Costume and Stage Make-up.  This passion was further encouraged when she began to seek out healthier options for her own sensitive skin – she not only suffers from eczema and rosacea, but is also sensitive to multiple chemicals and has a histamine intolerance – not to mention of course the wrinkles and age spots!  Finding little that excited her in the natural cosmetics market, and even less that was truly as natural as it claimed to be (beauty SHOULD NOT hurt!),she began to study methods of formulating her own natural cosmetics and thus, Bling!Beauty was born.Having more than a healthy flair for the dramatic, Aleisha has always enjoyed the transformative power of cosmetics – both as a mechanism for aesthetic expression and as a tool for personal empowerment.  Through Bling!Beauty, Aleisha seeks to provide healthy alternatives to the mainstream cosmetics while also encouraging that healthy flair for the dramatic in others.Share the Love!So help us to spread the word – through Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, your Blog or your words – and bring a little Bling! to someone else’s day! And thank you for sharing this time with us today, and helping us to share Bling!Beauty with an even greater market in the next year. Your support will have an impact on so many people, because everyone deserves make-up as naturally fabulous as they are!",12.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Sensory Health - Why I Believe in Aromatherapeutic Leather Watches

Personally, I have struggled with obesity since the age of 9.  For most of my adult life, I have been on a yo-yo diet roller coaster.  Undoubtedly, the stresses of life triggered and amplified the ups and downs.  My obesity went hand in hand with insomnia, migraines and hypertension.  In 2008, I had a Lap-Band surgically installed and have since lost over 160 lbs.

The process of losing so much weight has made me reconsider how each of the senses inform my health and behavior.  No matter how much weight I lose, my ears, eyes, tongue and nose do not seem to get much smaller.  Thankfully.
Smell, which is inextricably linked to taste and touch, not only signals when and where it is time to eat - but what is safe and clean to breathe in, drink and even kiss.
Just as the aroma of bergamot and fennel
column5: >can dampen cravings for sweets, lavender and vanilla fragrance can help some people fall asleep
column9: >.   For one of our family's dogs, the simple smell of my wife's hand helps him fall asleep.  On a primal level, her scent means he is safe and loved.  Her scent is his sleeping pill.

column1: At the same time, many humans (including myself) live and work in big, polluted megalopolises.  The words ""smell"" or ""odor"" to urbanites evoke memories of squalor, filth and decay.  We are trained to want no smell, just supermarket sterility. The supermarket experience itself has removed us farther from the hunting, gathering and gardening of our ancestors.  Everything has been air conditioned, hosed and sprayed to insulate us from disease and, unfortunately, from smells, flavors and textures.

column2: >This is a dog's supermarket, as far as his nose is concerned.

column1: The modern age means adaptation and accommodation to groups.  One of the first thing we've allowed ourselves to sacrifice for those groups are the joys of the senses.  We have tacitly accepted the idea that ""sniffing, snorting and smelling"" is now just for vagrants, criminals, hysterics, dogs, rodents and other critters.

I spent most of the last two years in China, where millions of pedestrians cover their face to protect themselves from contaminants in the air.  The simple pleasures of the nose are increasingly segregated to restaurants, massage parlors, spas, perfumeries and candle shops.  In Asia, there is still an association between scent and freshness.  This is precisely because food, water and air there has been polluted beyond the reach of even modern science's curative powers.  Chinese need to and do smell the things they buy, prepare and eat - to know if they are authentic and safe to consume.  We in the West have been spared this hassle, but at what cost?
This is my sad nose en route to some meeting in Beijing.
This is my energized nose refreshed by salty French sea breeze.

Why not just spray myself with aromatherapy air fresheners when I get hungry or cranky?
column7: >Certainly, there are a wide range of aromatherapy products already out there.  Some are even available in the supermarket.  So far, none of them are convenient to carry, none of them are fashionable, and none of them really get near my nose when I would need them (at the table or in bed).  They all have that chemical, factory after smell as well.  The standard aromatherapy delivery system is tainted by ozone or wax afterbirth.

column5: >A.Vera - A New Way to Transmit Aromatherapy

>The A. Vera delivery system is soft, Italian calf skin leather.  There is something almost food-like about the A.Vera strap leather even before it is soaked in the fragrant oil.  This makes it even more tempting to touch and wear than a bottle of air freshener or a can of Perriair.

column3:
/>

Since 2013, I have been working with traditional wristwatch makers, leather artisans and essential oil producers to craft A. Vera.  From the start, my vision has been of luxury timepieces with interchangeable, Italian leather straps infused in aloe vera and other essential oils that promote fullness, comfort and rest. A. Vera backers can choose from a range of styles and scents based on their wellness goals. The scents last at least 1 year. The timepiece itself comes with a Japanese movement and 3-year warranty.

column1: The idea is to have a living, breathing bouquet on your wrist - not a dead, lifeless machine. Those who eat, sleep, work and play with their personalized A. Vera will have something to savor that helps fights off fatigue, depression, anxiety and compulsiveness.

column5: >My team has already produced about 20 prototypes in three styles: white and black with Swarovski crystal elements on the case bezel (for ladies) and simple black with crystal elements on the face (for gentlemen).  Each of the Italian calf skin leather straps are perforated, interchangeable and contain an embedded layer soaked in aloe vera oil, hence the name ""A. Vera.""  Aside from its well known skin soothing properties, aloe vera oil itself is often used as a base in which to transmit additional scents.  I am looking to raise $1000 to expand the offering to include straps with more scent variations that address specific emotions, based on data from studies collected at the National Library of Medicine.  For example, ""A.Vera Peppermint"" for sugar cravings, ""A.Vera Sandalwood"" for insomnia, ""A.Vera Cucumber"" for stress, etc.

column2:
What You Get

Here is a break-down of how the $1000 will be used:

  • Creation of four blended aloe vera oil based scented leather straps that each specifically promote (1) relaxation, (2) satiety, (3) energy and (4) joy.  At the moment, that would be lavender, bergamot, eucalyptus and jasmine respectively.  If you look at our perks, we  offer a variety of aromatherapeutic deliverables, aside from A.Vera watches, including: (1) scented straps that can put on your other wristwatches, (2) scented ink, (3) scented paper and even (4) scented gloves.  
  • Creation of an A. Vera companion coffee table book that will help end users understand the value of how to incorporate wrist-worn aromatherapy into their overall wellness goals - weight loss, stress relief, pain management, etc.  (No guarantee the book itself will be scented, unless someone takes advantage of the Premier Enthusiast perk.)
  • Creation of additional watch face designs that can remind wearers of complimentary, aromatherapeutic activities such as gardening, wine tasting, cooking, hiking, attending farmers markets, fishing, hunting, etc.  So far, we only have the one face design.

column1: • If we only raise a portion of the $1000 dollars, we will focus on the development of the scented leather oils.  The A.Vera companion book would then have to be an e-book not available in printed format.  Our target is to deliver A.Vera kits by June and launch more broadly via Amazon and luxury boutiques by the end of the year.

column3: >In order to address what may go wrong with the scenting of the leathers, we will be warranting them for at least 1 year.  If a backer gets an A.Vera watch and hates the smell, we will replace it with a stronger/weaker scented strap.  Hopefully, after enough A.Vera backers have given us feedback, future A.Vera customers will find their timepieces to be therapeutic and something worth showing off.  As for the science itself, I can only guarantee that we will do our best to follow the literature - not that the watches or straps will ""definitely, every time, no matter what, for all people"" cause some direct change of condition, mood or behavior.  I see A.Vera aromatherapeutic effects being fairly benchmarked against Bath and Body Works consumer products, not against Pfizer and Merck medical devices and drugs.  The goal is to start now with Lavender, Bergamot, Eucalyptus and Jasmine, then expand to custom formulas based on end user feedback.
