0,"
The World of HUG - Help Us Give!
The World of HUG was founded to create high quality children’s apparel. HUG stands for Help Us Give. As passionate as we are about what we do, we are even more passionate about why we do it.
Through our One For All campaign we vow, that for every garment sold we will give out at least one to a child in need, this allows us to sustainably Dress The World one child at a time.
We are in the business of giving and we are relentlessly looking to transform lives and spread hope to those that need it the most. Help Us Give!

What comes first? As our collection is under way, we have decided to focus our efforts in building “The HUG Line” one garment at a time. Developing three items to launch our Indiegogo Campaign. These items are our Hugsie, Hugster Cover-all and the Hug Dress-all. Dressing Infants from NB (new born) to 24M (months).

Garment Production - Your donations and support will play a crucial part in the creation of this beautiful business concept. As we are in negotiation with our suppliers, we are in the need of this capital injection to process our first garment order.
The World of HUG Mission - Our mission is to create the first entity truly focused in much more than profit margins. Through our high quality children's apparel line HUG
column2: we simply look to dress the children of the world.

column1: What happens after Indiegogo - Our goal is to grow our HUG Line into a full Infant and children’s apparel collection but it does not end there. Many surprises are to be expected from an entity that will strive in being a trendsetter for others in corporate America to follow.

The Power of U - There is no HUG without U. You are the engine that moves our marketing. So go ahead and spread the word, tweet about us, like us on Facebook, pin one of our Pinterest pictures or simply add a beautiful image on Instagram and helps us give.
The Power of Purchase or Choice- When you support brands that prove to be invested in their consumer’s wellbeing at a personal level, you support change in our world.

The World of HUG was an inspiration of its founder Juan M Pimentel in search of creating the first entity solely focused on profit to maintain the growth of its charity and what we call giving margins.
The World of HUG located in Miami, FL was later founded by three individuals looking to make a difference in our future generation and set our footprint in the corporate world.

Our company looks to focus on giving as we have focused on profit margins in the past. While profit margins are important to keep us in business, our concept sustains our mission and helps thousands receive a product they need and cannot afford.
After coming together and experiencing the blessing of helping ninety-five children in different areas of Miami, FL we look to expand this venture and grow our concept into a new greater level.
""As passionate as we are about what we do, we are even more passionate about why we do it""- The World of HUG.

On Mother's Day (May 12, 2013), The World of HUG visited Leisure City, FL to give the mothers of South Dade Center and their children an unforgettable Mother's Day. The day was full of surprises with raffles, gifts, and games. For The World of HUG this was a day to remember and just the beginning of our journey to change our world.

On May 23, 2013 The World of HUG partnered with the Art Reach Program and donated clothing to children of Broward County, FL at the Young At Art Museum. The day was a great one full of smiles, hope, joy and gratitude.
","The World of HUG - Help Us Give!
The World of HUG was founded to create high quality children’s apparel. HUG stands for Help Us Give. As passionate as we are about what we do, we are even more passionate about why we do it.
Through our One For All campaign we vow, that for every garment sold we will give out at least one to a child in need, this allows us to sustainably Dress The World one child at a time.
We are in the business of giving and we are relentlessly looking to transform lives and spread hope to those that need it the most. Help Us Give!
Help Us Give = One for All

What comes first? As our collection is under way, we have decided to focus our efforts in building “The HUG Line” one garment at a time. Developing three items to launch our Indiegogo Campaign. These items are our Hugsie, Hugster Cover-all and the Hug Dress-all. Dressing Infants from NB (new born) to 24M (months).

Garment Production - Your donations and support will play a crucial part in the creation of this beautiful business concept. As we are in negotiation with our suppliers, we are in the need of this capital injection to process our first garment order.
The World of HUG Mission - Our mission is to create the first entity truly focused in much more than profit margins. Through our high quality children's apparel line HUG
column2: we simply look to dress the children of the world.

column1: What happens after Indiegogo - Our goal is to grow our HUG Line into a full Infant and children’s apparel collection but it does not end there. Many surprises are to be expected from an entity that will strive in being a trendsetter for others in corporate America to follow.

The Power of U - There is no HUG without U. You are the engine that moves our marketing. So go ahead and spread the word, tweet about us, like us on Facebook, pin one of our Pinterest pictures or simply add a beautiful image on Instagram and helps us give.
The Power of Purchase or Choice- When you support brands that prove to be invested in their consumer’s wellbeing at a personal level, you support change in our world.

The World of HUG was an inspiration of its founder Juan M Pimentel in search of creating the first entity solely focused on profit to maintain the growth of its charity and what we call giving margins.
The World of HUG located in Miami, FL was later founded by three individuals looking to make a difference in our future generation and set our footprint in the corporate world.

Our company looks to focus on giving as we have focused on profit margins in the past. While profit margins are important to keep us in business, our concept sustains our mission and helps thousands receive a product they need and cannot afford.
After coming together and experiencing the blessing of helping ninety-five children in different areas of Miami, FL we look to expand this venture and grow our concept into a new greater level.
As passionate as we are about what we do, we are even more passionate about why we do it""- The World of HUG.

We would like to thank each and every one of you for all of your support this month! It was a truly exciting campaign. We will be launching our official website this weekend.

It's the socially conscious t-shirt that blends positive causes with positive virtues. We wanted to make a tee that represented what YOU stand for... and stand UP for. That’s why every Selftee donates 20% of all sales to a specific cause, which was carefully matched with each design.
Positivity is contagious! When you wear a Selftee:

column2: >You're going to feel good, look good, and others will notice. Selftees are a natural conversation starter and morale booster.
>You're going to feel empowered knowing that you're doing your part to help those less fortunate than yourself in your community and worldwide.

column1: The design is made with clean typography and uses color theory to further enrich each tee's message. Every shirt is a modern slim fit and made in the USA.

column2: >What Does Your Selftee Mean To YOU?

column1: We asked our original Selfteem members what their favorite Selftee was, and what it meant to them. Here's what Yan had to say about it:

We hope to raise $200,000 in charity and increase awareness for the many difficulties we face and have personal attachments to over the next year. Going forward, we hope to inspire a movement of like-minded self empowered people and take our mission to even greater heights.

We paired each shirt with a charity that we felt aligned with the tee's concept and cause.  Many causes already have an established color, so we did our best to align the cause's color with our virtues and available color-ways.
For every sale, we’ll donate 20% straight to that cause. Check out the charity breakdown:

column7: >Selftees is about the people, and this journey starts with YOU. That's why, over the next 12 months, we are asking you to join us on a mission to raise $200,000 for our selected charities.

column2: >We believe Selftees will be an excellent promoter of awareness for many causes moving forward. We will be there supporting our communities, partnering with local organizations, and doing what we can the best way we know how.

column1: When our website launches on November 21, every contributor of our campaign will gain access to our exclusive member's area. When you grab your first Selftee, you're already a part of the Selfteem!
Hook 5 friends up with a 10% discount on their first purchase, and you will earn a free Selftee for yourself.
In the member's area of our new website, you'll be able to:
• Learn how to earn 20% off your next purchase for every new friend who uses your code (They get a nice 10% discount too!).
• If you've got enough credit, you can even redeem your Selftee for free!
• Or, just have us donate the money to any of our selected charities!

column3:

Use the perks on the right side of this page to place your order. If you want a different amount of t-shirts, just combine the perks to get the right number!

column3: >Even if you can't contribute monetarily, please spread the word about our campaign and Selftees mission to raise $200,000 for charity. Every dollar helps and every person counts!

column5: >We are aiming to have all orders shipped within the first 2 weeks of December. We will keep every contributor informed of the status of our first run and ETA.

column1:
How do I pick my size?
When the campaign is over, we will gather your sizing choices via a simple survey that will be sent to your email address. If there are any issues with your shipment, simply contact us at selftees@gmail.com and we'll provide you with assistance ASAP.

How will you know where to ship it?
All contributors' addresses are stored when a contribution is made. We know where you live! If there are any issues with your shipment, simply contact us at selftees@gmail.com and we'll provide you with assistance ASAP.

Who made that awesome song in your video?
The track found in our campaign video is done by our very own, Scott Bowman.

The vehicle safety belt as we know it today, was first patented in 1955. Since then, there has been little change as far as fit and comfort, and there have been no improvements to accommodate a pregnant woman and her growing fetus. Recent changes in family lifestyles have led to a significant increase in the number of miles that mothers drive daily. As a result, maternal and fetal injuries from car accidents are on the rise.

Car accidents are the leading cause of trauma related maternal and fetal death, killing on average more than one fetus each day.  To illustrate just how delicate a growing baby is, a fetus is 15 times more likely to die from a car crash, than a person up to 14 years old with a gunshot wound. Most significant injuries to a pregnant mother occur as a result of intense lap belt loading forces against the abdomen in a crash. The Pregnancy Seat Belt® is an innovative design that completely eliminates the dangerous lap belt. Instead, it holds the thighs and pelvis firmly in place. The result is no additional forces to the abdomen, eliminating lap belt loading. Also, a double ""cross your heart"" belt system minimizes chest wall trauma by holding the mother's upperbody firmly in place.

A need for a product of this type was first recognized by co-founder Pete Calderon Jr. who, as a first responder and transportation specialist, personally witnessed severe injury and death to young mothers and their growing child within. Richard D. Fan, a trauma specialist working in a busy southern CA emergency department also recognized the lack of a safe and practical vehicle primary restraint system for pregnant women. The two men shared stories and ideas and took action to develop the Pregnancy Seat Belt®.
The Need for a Product of This Type

There are approximately 6 million pregnancies in the U.S. per year in which 170,000 pregnant women are involved in a traffic collision. Of those, up to 1000 fetuses will die as a result of injuries to the mother, according to the University of Pittsburgh’s Center for Injury Research and Control (CIRCL). Additionally, automobile accidents are the single largest cause of accidental death in pregnant woment. More pregnant women die from car crashes than any other kind of pregnancy complication

What causes maternal and fetal injury in car crashes? The answer lies in blunt force trauma during impact caused the steering wheel and intense seat belt forces against the abdomen, causing tearing or separation of the placenta. Placenta abrupto, causes loss of blood flow and oxygen to the baby, and eventually fetal demise. Other severe injuries can also occur such as massive tearing of organs and abdominal wall and rupture of the bladder.

Over the years, education and aggressive law enforcement has improved seatbelt compliance for drivers, however “proper” wearing of seatbelts, specifically the placement of the lap belt continues to be a problem. Pregnant and obese drivers often complain of poor and uncomfortable fit and of lap belts across the waist. Additionally, lap belts often spontaneous creep up to the abdomen instead of staying in the proper position across the hips, putting both fetus and vital organs in danger of traumatic forces.

Recently, fetal rights and therefore “fetal right to sue for wrongful death” is becoming more commonplace. Courts are increasingly allowing the surviving family to sue on behalf of the fetus during motor vehicle accidents citing that the unborn child is indeed a passenger in the car and should carry the same rights as any other passenger. A few examples of this evolving trend can be seen in the following examples:
2010 Wisconsin 4th District Court of Appeals Shannon Tesar vs. American Family Mutual Insurance Company
2011 Alabama Supreme Court: Mack vs. Carmak 
2012 Senate Bill 674 signed by Governor Bob McDonnell that approves tort cause of action in Virginia for the wrongful death of an unborn child 
2/3 of states have adopted statutory and case law allowing cause of action for wrongful death of the unborn child. 
A seatbelt system designed for pregnant women can significantly reduce the liability of insurance companies, automakers, and many more potential defendants. While data for the exact amounts of losses due to claims and court settlements in this arena is poorly tracked, estimates of savings from claims and damages could be in the hundreds of millions.
What is the solution to the problem of standard equipment seat belts used by auto manufacturers today?

The Pregnancy Seat Belt system is a patent pending device that completely eliminates the lap belt. This eliminates the dangerous compressive forces against the placenta, bladder and gastrointestinal organs. The system features a double cross chest restraint to protect the upper body and double thigh and perineal strap to secure the pelvic girdle in the event of a collision. Best of all, this unique system is designed to retrofit into all automobiles in regular production today.
The Pregnancy Seat Belt is constructed of DOT approved seat belt webbing rated at 5000 pounds shear strength, and industry proven rated standard seat belt buckles.

Existing Competition
The Tummy Shield, an Australian product consisting of a seat cushion with thigh straps that attach between the legs with a stainless steel hook.

Pixie Safety Harness: An England based product consisting of a four point harness that secures the shoulders and chest. You must still use the car’s existing lap belt across the waist. This system does not eliminate the abdominal and fetal load on impact.
There are a few other insignificant seat belt modifiers that reposition the OEM shoulder harness for driver comfort. None of these models eliminate the problem of lap belt loading forces.

Major Research in Pregnancy Crash Technology
Ford Motor Corporation
Volvo Motor Corporation
Honda
Virginia Tech University and Ford Motor Corp
University of Pittsburg Center for Injury Research and Control
www.pregnantcrash.org
And many more…..

Potential Markets
Major Auto Manufacturers
Manufacturers of Infant and Child Car Seats
Department Stores
Auto Accessory Stores
OB-GYN doctors and hospitals
Auto Insurance Companies
OB advocacy groups
Medical insurance group

There is no known successful widely used product of this type on the market today of this type and both the maternity and automotive industries are wide open for an introduction of the Pregnancy Seat Belt®. The Pregnancy Seat Belt® is designed as a retrofit device and is adaptable to most cars, and can be used for drivers and front passengers. Furthermore, this product can be used for protection of the obese vehicle occupant.

CalFanCo has designed and tested 5 variations of the Pregnancy Seat Belt. The final prototype is now in ready for crash testing and a patent pending status has been achievd with Patel and Alumit LLC.  All designs are currently registered with the United States Patent and Trademark Office, and have achieved patent pending status. The final testing of the Pregnancy Seat Belt® is scheduled at this time and the short-term goals of the company are to test the product with an independent government approved crash test facility (Karco in Adelanto,CA). We will then produce the first run of successful Pregnancy Seat Belts® and then license the product to major auto manufacturers and auto accessory manufacturers. The long-term objectives of the company are to dominate the industry in this niche, building a reputation for saving lives and becoming the new standard in vehicle safety for pregnant women. Our continuing long term goal includes point of purchases sales in department and specialty stores, and to continue the development of this product for use by vehicle occupants sitting in any seat of a vehicle.

CalFanCo has already engaged in talks with leading auto manufacturers, including Honda Motors of America, Ford Motor Company, and Volvo. Specifically we have been discussing the development of our product with the safety and research and development teams. There are no solid commitments as of yet, as our product is not yet finished. However, interest is very high including very promising discussions with Laura Kvarnstrand of Volvo, a pioneer in crash safety during pregnancy and developer of the first computer 3D simulated crash test dummy.
With the competition in the automotive industry today, each auto manufacturer is looking for a innovation that will put them ahead of the pack, in terms of value, innovation, and crash safety.

Ultimately, we would like to license this product for use by major auto manufacturers. Alternatively, a corporation with major funding may choose to acquire and further develop this unique product.  Either way, we want to make this product available to ""moms to be"" all over the world.   Please help us save a life and thanks for your support!

Wallets that are smart are on the rise - they make life easier and protect some of your most important and private information. On Kickstarter there has been countless wallet options introduced to the market. Wallets do have one major issue though:

they're not YOUR wallet. You've got a wallet - maybe one you've had for years. It's the right size, it's the right look, you'll never use anything else. LEIF is the solution. LEIF looks like every other card you carry - but it turns your wallet smart.

LEIF is incredibly thin - that means no added bulge to your favorite wallet. Other devices you could use are too thick, and only track. LEIF is undetectable in your wallet, and does so much more. Custom Radius Tracking, Pick-Pocket Theft Alerts, and amazing Pin-Dropping Smart dial recovery. See the details of each specific feature below.
1) C U S T O M   R A D I U S   T R A C K I N G

LEIF is ridiculously smart. Most tracking devices are too attentive at all the wrong times. You might walk to the bathroom, and all the sudden your phone buzzes, telling you you've left something behind, but really it's sitting safely in your kitchen.

LEIF's custom radius tracking allows you to drop pins and set custom ""safe zones"" like your Home, where you don't get buzzed by a wallet simply left on the other side of the house. Drop a pin on your map, then drag the radius to your desired distance. It's that simple. Need to find your wallet in that radius? It's simple - hit find, then the LEIF app counts down the feet till your wallet is secure.
2)  P I C K - P O C K E T   T H E F T   A L E R T S

When you're away from your set Home radius, you're protected. Have your wallet snatched from you or leave it behind at a table? LEIF knows when you and your wallet are separated. Get further than 30 feet apart (default distance) and the LEIF app will let you know.

Retrace your steps, or follow your suspect thief, and LEIF will notify you when your wallet is back in range. Once in range, click find, and the LEIF app will count down the feet until your wallet it secure. Thieves beware, LEIF will find you.
3) P I N   D R O P   S M A R T   D I A L   R E C O V E R Y
What happens if you don't notice the early warning? Maybe LEIF tells you your wallet is out of range, but you didn't hear the warning chime. Don't worry - LEIF has the solution there too.

After the early warning theft/leave behind notification, LEIF does you an amazing favor: it drops a pin at the exact location of your wallet, then harnesses the power of google maps to pull the information of the store/restaurant/event center at which you left your wallet. Up to your screen is pulled the phone number of said location, so you can quickly call them and let them know you're on you're way to pick it up.
Maybe we haven't said it enough: LEIF is incredibly smart.

Below is a shot of the LEIF home screen. Adjust your setting by tapping the menu button, see how far you are from your wallet using the central distance meter, or find your LEIF using the map function.
S P E C I F I C A T I O N S
The LEIF is smart, but simple. Here's a few technical specs you need to know:
2 mm Thin (about 2x standard credit card thickness)

column2: Flex Tech makes it nearly indestructible
flex tech means you'll never have to worry about sitting on your wallet. This truly is a smart device unlike any other - thin &amp
column3: flexible so it works WITH you rather than you having to make it work with your setup.

column1: R E W A R D   L E V E L S

There's really only one reward, and it's well worth the wait. Coming from our last Kickstarter? There's a unique reward level just for you. Looking for a LEIF for you and a friend? We've got you covered with our multi-pack reward levels. See all the offered level on the right, or below.
T I M E L I N E

There's never been a tracking product quite as functional as LEIF - It's the perfect, smartest, thinnest device to pair with your everyday carry. We haven't borrowed tech/software from anyone - LEIF was built from the ground up. Completing the molds and production of LEIF will take time, and we've done our best to predict delivery time for your chose reward here:
As with any brand new product of its kind, it's all about the timing. We want to bring you the best product in a timely manner. LEIF is  in the development phase, with fine tuning still to go.

Delays can be a part of this process, and while we'll do our best to prevent them, we can't promise perfection. We will, however, give all we have to ensure your product is delivered with perfect quality, in a manner which is as timely as possible.

LEIF is incredibly thin - that means no added bulge to your favorite wallet. Other devices you could use are too thick, and only track. LEIF is undetectable in your wallet, and does so much more. Custom Radius Tracking, Pick-Pocket Theft Alerts, and amazing Pin-Dropping Smart dial recovery. See the details of each specific feature below.
1) C U S T O M   R A D I U S   T R A C K I N G

LEIF is ridiculously smart. Most tracking devices are too attentive at all the wrong times. You might walk to the bathroom, and all the sudden your phone buzzes, telling you you've left something behind, but really it's sitting safely in your kitchen.

LEIF's custom radius tracking allows you to drop pins and set custom ""safe zones"" like your Home, where you don't get buzzed by a wallet simply left on the other side of the house. Drop a pin on your map, then drag the radius to your desired distance. It's that simple. Need to find your wallet in that radius? It's simple - hit find, then the LEIF app counts down the feet till your wallet is secure.
2)  P I C K - P O C K E T   T H E F T   A L E R T S

When you're away from your set Home radius, you're protected. Have your wallet snatched from you or leave it behind at a table? LEIF knows when you and your wallet are separated. Get further than 30 feet apart (default distance) and the LEIF app will let you know.

Retrace your steps, or follow your suspect thief, and LEIF will notify you when your wallet is back in range. Once in range, click find, and the LEIF app will count down the feet until your wallet it secure. Thieves beware, LEIF will find you.
3) P I N   D R O P   S M A R T   D I A L   R E C O V E R Y
What happens if you don't notice the early warning? Maybe LEIF tells you your wallet is out of range, but you didn't hear the warning chime. Don't worry - LEIF has the solution there too.

After the early warning theft/leave behind notification, LEIF does you an amazing favor: it drops a pin at the exact location of your wallet, then harnesses the power of google maps to pull the information of the store/restaurant/event center at which you left your wallet. Up to your screen is pulled the phone number of said location, so you can quickly call them and let them know you're on you're way to pick it up.
Maybe we haven't said it enough: LEIF is incredibly smart.

Below is a shot of the LEIF home screen. Adjust your setting by tapping the menu button, see how far you are from your wallet using the central distance meter, or find your LEIF using the map function.
S P E C I F I C A T I O N S
The LEIF is smart, but simple. Here's a few technical specs you need to know:
2 mm Thin (about 2x standard credit card thickness)
Bend & Flex Tech makes it nearly indestructible

Our unique bend & flex tech means you'll never have to worry about sitting on your wallet. This truly is a smart device unlike any other - thin & flexible so it works WITH you rather than you having to make it work with your setup.
R E W A R D   L E V E L S

There's really only one reward, and it's well worth the wait. Coming from our last Kickstarter? There's a unique reward level just for you. Looking for a LEIF for you and a friend? We've got you covered with our multi-pack reward levels. See all the offered level on the right, or below.
T I M E L I N E

There's never been a tracking product quite as functional as LEIF - It's the perfect, smartest, thinnest device to pair with your everyday carry. We haven't borrowed tech/software from anyone - LEIF was built from the ground up. Completing the molds and production of LEIF will take time, and we've done our best to predict delivery time for your chose reward here:
As with any brand new product of its kind, it's all about the timing. We want to bring you the best product in a timely manner. LEIF is  in the development phase, with fine tuning still to go.

Delays can be a part of this process, and while we'll do our best to prevent them, we can't promise perfection. We will, however, give all we have to ensure your product is delivered with perfect quality, in a manner which is as timely as possible.",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

Short Summary

  • The uniqueness of Prophetik begins with the artist himself. Romantic visual artist, pioneer, and unconventional designer Jeff Garner and his sustainable, eco label Prophetik are on a path of transformation, leading the evolution of fashion and changing our perception of luxury. Mr. Garner was just named one of 40 top artists in the US and works were placed into the Smithsonian’s Renwick Gallery July 20th for the 40 under 40 Exhibition.
  • This campaign will help fund the launch of Garner's Sustainable Intimates at London Fashion Week in February 2015. Funding will help cover the costs of the final sample collection, support PR, show production, photography, and models.

column2:
What You Get
  • We are asking for $20,000 to cover the production costs of our final sample collection and the expenses of promoting the collection at LFW. This $20,000 will help fund the show and ensure the efficacy of the launch of the sustainable intimates collection in February.   The goal is to gain consumer awareness of the harmful effects of synthetic fabrics and dyes in everyday under garments and provide a solution and option in the intimates apparel which Prophetik has been doing in formal wear for the last twelve years. 
  • Our awesome perks include the option to pre-order our unique hemp boxers and innovative, eco-conscious acclaimed t-shirt bra fitted by Giselle herself a supporter of Mr. Garner's work. We are also offering a VIP package to experience London Fashion Week for $1,000, which includes a front row seat at London Fashion Week, a meet and greet with designer Jeff Garner on horseback at Hyde Park, and dinner with Garner after the show hosted by shoe designer and friend Jimmy Choo. For $5,000, the Sponsorship package offers the perks of a sponsorship name &
column3: PR promotion at London Fashion Week, 4 front row VIP seats at Fashion week, meet &amp
column4:
greet with Garner horseback at Hyde Park, and dinner with Garner after the show with notable fashion friends. 

The Impact

  • Prophetik is established in the United States and is fast becoming the label synonymous with fashion-led ethical design in the United Kingdom with widespread praise from both ethical and mainstream fashion media. Employing recycled bottles transformed into fleece, herringbone hemp, peace silk, linen and hemp jersey, Jeff injects style and soul into this line. Prophetik's wearable philosophy line also provides health and environmental benefits for our eco-fashion consumers. Mr. Garner speaks at Green Festival in the US and Universities around the world regarding the importance of Sustainable Fashion. 
  • Prophetik's story begins 13 years ago and has evolved from major catwalks to red carpet in addition to a small Etsy store to bring more awareness of sustainable fashion to the general marketplace by giving more basic options to purchase. Prophetik has been offered in many high-end boutiques that carry the line including Fred Segal in Santa Monica, Moda boutique &
column6: Eco Age and My Sugarland in London
column7: and stores in Japan and Switzerland. A press favorite and a prominent voice in the ethical fashion arena, Jeff dresses social influencers such as Esperanza Spalding, Sheryl Crow, Miley Cyrus, Taylor Swift, Kings of Leon, and the Jonas Brothers, and been a consultant to Whole Foods, Southwest airlines, and other private clients.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

  • The health and environmental benefits of Prophetik's Sustainable Lingerie are astounding. Our eco-fashion line of sustainable lingerie offers you a healthier bra, which lacks artificial dyes and harmful metal wiring. We ask that in addition to enjoying our perks that you get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. 
  • The Indiegogo share tools are a great way to spread the word about this eco-fashion line of intimates. Thank you for your time and donations. We look forward to launching this line at London Fashion Week with your help!

I am Allison, and I am the founder and formulator at Rogue Republic Cosmetics. We were conceived in winter 2012, founding in May and finally launching the line in July. We are committed to the mission of creating mineral-based VEGAN cosmetics that keep sensitive skin in mind and can withstand demanding, active lifestyles. Our final product has been compared by some of our customers, makeup artists and everyday women alike, to companies like MAC and Bare Escentuals for their color payoff, blendability, and staying power.

But we need your help to grow. Our line consists of loose powder pigments, at present. We are now working on offering palettes of pressed shadow in coordinated colors, lip glosses, powder foundation and concealer, and lipstick palette/samplers.

Unfortunately, there is a lot of waste in the formulating process. Ingredients are wasted, packaging is ruined and becomes not reusable...the costs add up before the successul product is complete and ready for testing and going to market. We currently have 6 shades we're waiting to release due to this exact issue and the need to purchase enough ingredients to stock the products in our store.

You contribution will allow us to help you feel your best when you use Rogue Republic products. We will not release products we cannot stand behind, which is why our formulating can become a rigorous testing ground for each potential product, and much doesn't make the cut. By participating in our indiegogo campaign you are doing more than simply trying out our products or decorating your home with our art--you are joining a beauty movement and helping me fulfill my dream in a way that is sustainable for the business in the long run.
YOU are becoming an investor. You are the shark tank, and you are the partners we are looking for to expand our cruelty-free, beautiful empire.
We are looking to raise the operational expenses needed to expand our line at the most basic, early stage: our cosmetic kitchen.

• We need at least $300 for raw ingredients. Many ingredients we try to incorporate don't make the cut and that's what can lead to waste. But we need to try all our options in these formulas to get the best, vegan makeup that is as gentle as possible on your skin while still matching up to our existing line.

• Additional funds around $200 are needed for packaging these products, and more beyond that for marketing these new additions. We have been featured in The Petite Alternative for our products and have an ad coming out in Filigree Magazine next quarter--but this is only the beginning.

• Our perks range from ways you can test out our products yourself, to original art you can get to customize your home, office, lair, etc. We are even making a loose pigment that is exclusive to this IndieGoGo campaign's perk. You can even get customized packages of products for your skin tone, eye color, and hair color!

We will of course incur other costs as we grow, such as registering as an LLC and organizing photo shoots to improve our store with more true-to-life images of our pigments. Rest assured every penny raised will be more than appreciated
column2: it will be put to WORK. Whether it's in spreading our message and word of our company, or in creating our next round of new products, it will be used to the fullest to make this company become what I know it can be!

column1: Rogue Republic aims to be the high-end, eco-conscious cosmetics company you dream of at a budget that doesn't break your wallet, and with a mission that doesn't irk your conscience. Our target audience is those men and women in alternative subcultures who seen long lasting, bold makeup that stands up to stage lights, long photo shoots, and all nighters at the club--without sacrificing sensitive skin or resorting to animal cruelty for our own gain.We never test on animals and neither do our suppliers. We are 100% transparent about what goes into our products, and no formulas include any animal products or byproducts. Cruelty-free, gentle, vegan, beautiful.

This is our first go at gaining investors and seeking your help. We already have a lot of people who believe in us, such as the beautiful women (inside and out) at MediaVault/The Petite Alternative and in our adopted Philly home. These are people who HAVE tried our products and truly think it is everything we taut it to be. But what we need now is to grow
column2: to grow we need investors who also believe in what we are doing.

column1: Right now this is a one-woman operation. It's me, Allison Gretsuk. I am a woman who works full time during the day, am a fine artist and artisan by night, and spend every other waking hour at this dream, despite many chronic health problems which I am bound and determined to shove out of my way. We want to grow and absorb the cost of hiring employees and gaining a team of experienced make up artists, advisors, and friends. We want to be your beauty community, whether you're in an alternative scene or not. Our customers so far span gender, age group, occupation, and lifestyle, which is something I never expected as an indie alternative company, and it always puts a smile on my face.

Some people just can’t contribute, and absolutely understand. All we ask is that you share, blog, tweet, or pin this campaign, check out website and store as well as our story, and spread the word about who we are and what we are doing.
Rogue Republic is beauty for a New World Order.
Please don't hesitate to contact us about any of our goals, perks, products in general, etc at join.the.rogue.republic@gmail.com

*images shown are by Hatter Photography, featuring models Alien Baby, Kami, and Julia Campbell Kilduff. MUA for this shoot was Alayna Marie, and everyone was gracious enough to donate their time for a product they believe in. More from this shoot is available in the September Hair and Makeup special issue of The Petite Alternative magazine*

As a mother of a 2 year old I have been very frustrated with the common onesie. There is no way to check my son's diaper without undressing him or trying to peek through the leg of the diaper which can leave your finger a little messy. So I designed the Peek-a-poo onesie to solve this problem! This onesie has a unique design which allows the caregiver the ability to peek into the top of the diaper without taking off shoes, pants or unsnapping the onesie.
I've been working on this design for a year now and it is finally ready for manufacturing!
What your money is going toward... Your pledge will help me purchase my first bulk order of Peek-a-poo onesies! I can offer two sizes 3-6 month and 6-12 month. They will both be in classic white.
Once fully funded I will be able to add more colors, designs, and sizes to the Peek-a-poo collection. These will then be available for future purchase on my website.
The Peek-a-poo pictured is my sample design. The onesies available will be in classic white
If you can't help financially but believe in my product, help me spread the word! Post my link on your facebook page. Tell family and friends about it!

column1: The ORIGINAL Bra Bag and Panty Pak company, BRAG, is delighted to launch our new Travel Collection.   Our new modular bags are Smart, Easy and Luxurious.   From cosmetics and jewelry to fashion accessories and electronics, everything you need for your travel will be safely packed and made to fit perfectly in any carry on luggage.
The new BRAG Travel Collections and Travel Jewelry Case will be available in our three most popular designs:
KATIE - Original Soft Pink with Black Polka Dots and Trim

column4: >Classic Feminine Blue with Brown Polka Dots and Trim

column1: SOPHIA - Sophisticated Black with a Dash of White
BRAG PRODUCT LAUNCH SUPPORT!
With your support, we will have your confidence to order the Minimum Order Quantity required for a successful product launch this 2014 holiday season.

• Our goal is to raise $20,000 to place a first product run!
  • Depending on the level of your support, you receive great pricing and preferred delivery on your orders.

• Every donation of support will receive a small gift.  The bigger your donation, the bigger the gift!
  • Let's think positive to achieve our goal.  All funds will go to support the launch of the best travel accessories available for women, the BRAG Travel Collection.
Our goal at BRAG is to give women the best Travel Collection they need to pack smart and aim for carry-on only:

• No more checked luggage - saves you money!
  • No more line ups - saves you time!
  • Great product design - gives you flexibility to pack how YOU pack!
• Great styles - gives you choice based on your style!

NO RISKS OR CHALLENGES

Our complete BRAG Travel Collection is past the prototype phase.   All we need to do is have enough commitment to order our first production run.   The more product we can order, the better the retail sales price will be for everyone to enjoy.

• Our goal is to have 1,000 units ordered!
  • Help us get there by supporting our campaign today.

BRAG ABOUT IT!

Everyone has a friend or family member that loves to travel.   Our innovative products ensure travel is Smart, Easy and Luxurious... with all of your favourite travel items packed in the perfect bags.

• If you can not participate, be sure to share this opportunity with all of your friends and family that love to travel.
  • Sharing is easy.  Just follow the links below and give others access to a Travel Collection that everyone will be bragging about!

Thank you for your support and making our campaign a success.    We look forward to launching this product, and many more!

Your BRAG Team

I am Francis, owner of a small watch brand called Tangramatic based in Sydney. Back in 2014 I bought a watch to commemorate my stay in Australia which eventually got me into watch designing and engineering. Truly, one of those moments when you found something you really love doing.
After our second model the 39a, we felt that offering a new, clean, and creative design would get people to discover or even renew their love for watches.
The result of that concept is the Nereid, based from the original marine watches used by sailors to navigate the seas long before GPS was invented.

Today, we all live in the age of smart devices. But one thing's for sure, there is still appreciation for the beauty of craftsmanship. A mechanical watch exemplifies this idea more so than most as it can never be fully manufactured by a machine. It will always have a human touch in its making.
With your help, we can get the Nereid be known to existing watch lovers and would-be ones. A very personal item with a technology that does not rely on endless upgrades and downloads.
One that you can actually keep for more than a decade.

Nereid, the Benevolent Mariner

We're offering the Nereid in two versions, the Nereid Pacific and the Nereid Argo. Both share the same specifications except the movement.

What sets the Nereid apart from a common watch is the use of enamel, a type of material created by heating and layering powdered glass on top of a metal base, a process done since the 17th century and is very difficult to make.

What you get for your perk

The Nereid is offered in heavy milanese strap and canvas, either in blue or beige. We now also offer it in brown leather straps.
Shot of the Nereid Pacific (two sub-dials)
Shot of the Nereid Argo (Bauhaus-style with one sub-dial)
The Nereid Argo in beige canvas strap and the Nereid Pacific in blue canvas strap
Casual wrist shot of the Nereid Argo
[Updated] The leather strap is a bit darker and will use brown stitches instead of white as shown below (top one)
The Nereid also comes in a beautiful travel case

Ready to take a Nereid Home?

Simply take your perk and we'll update you through every significant event during production which will happen from March to May. Before you do, please take a look at our policy regarding returns and refunds.
Tangramatic is a young brand and unlike big brands, we don't have the massive marketing reach they have. Like or follow our social media to help us reach customers who might like our works.
If you have any questions, don't hesitate to message me!

I am Francis, owner of a small watch brand called Tangramatic based in Sydney. Back in 2014 I bought a watch to commemorate my stay in Australia which eventually got me into watch designing and engineering. Truly, one of those moments when you found something you really love doing.
After our second model the 39a, we felt that offering a new, clean, and creative design would get people to discover or even renew their love for watches.
The result of that concept is the Nereid, based from the original marine watches used by sailors to navigate the seas long before GPS was invented.

Today, we all live in the age of smart devices. But one thing's for sure, there is still appreciation for the beauty of craftsmanship. A mechanical watch exemplifies this idea more so than most as it can never be fully manufactured by a machine. It will always have a human touch in its making.With your help, we can get the Nereid be known to existing watch lovers and would-be ones. A very personal item with a technology that does not rely on endless upgrades and downloads.One that you can actually keep for more than a decade.
Nereid, the Benevolent Mariner We're offering the Nereid in two versions, the Nereid Pacific and the Nereid Argo. Both share the same specifications except the movement.

What sets the Nereid apart from a common watch is the use of enamel, a type of material created by heating and layering powdered glass on top of a metal base, a process done since the 17th century and is very difficult to make.
What you get for your perkThe Nereid is offered in heavy milanese strap and canvas, either in blue or beige. We now also offer it in brown leather straps.Shot of the Nereid Pacific (two sub-dials)
Shot of the Nereid Argo (Bauhaus-style with one sub-dial)
The Nereid Argo in beige canvas strap and the Nereid Pacific in blue canvas strap
Casual wrist shot of the Nereid Argo
[Updated] The leather strap is a bit darker and will use brown stitches instead of white as shown below (top one)
The Nereid also comes in a beautiful travel case

Ready to take a Nereid Home?Simply take your perk and we'll update you through every significant event during production which will happen from March to May. Before you do, please take a look at our policy regarding returns and refunds.
Tangramatic is a young brand and unlike big brands, we don't have the massive marketing reach they have. Like or follow our social media to help us reach customers who might like our works.
If you have any questions, don't hesitate to message me!",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

Check out the Articulate 2.0. Now Live on Indiegogo!  Click the following link...http://igg.me/at/articulatewallet/x/2754718

Growing up neighbors and competing against each other in sports, we have been best friends since we can remember.  After going our own ways following high school (Kramer currently attends University of California Santa Barbara and Kevin is at The University of Oregon) and learning what we have in school, we have worked diligently the past six months designing this great wallet.  We took all the great features of wallets and money clips and put them into one affordable, stylish,and sleek leather design.

We got annoyed with pulling the same card in and out of our wallets several times a day. During the week we use our debit cards, while on the weekends we mostly use our ID. With this in mind, we integrated a pocket on the back of the wallet which allows the user to easily access their most used card. With the finger slide feature, you can either slide the card out halfway to swipe it, or conveniently remove and replace the card without ever having to open the wallet. You won't want to go back to a conventional wallet after using this feature...we promise.

In search for a sleek, stylish and affordable wallet, all we could find were money clips and credit card holders.  These worked great for holding your cards, but folding and unfolding your cash wasn't efficient and added bulk.  We also explored the option of high-end designer brands due to their great quality, however couldn't rationalize paying $200 for a wallet.  The idea with Articulate Wallets is to cut out the brand inflation of designer wallets, and to offer a high- quality, genuine leather wallet that looks great and does everything you need it too do--all at an affordable price.
• Allows easy access to your cards and cash
• Isn't limited to a fixed number of cards you can carry
• Allows you to slide out a card and never have to take it out
• Can be fully customized to fit the user, not the user fitting the wallet

The Articulate Wallet combines genuine leather with a beautiful design that looks great in his or her pocket. We were tired of cheap fake leather or velcro wallets that we see everywhere. We wanted a wallet that we would be proud to show off to our friends. This is why we came up with the Articulate Wallet.

In order to keep the wallet lightweight, low-profile and simple, we needed to minimize the amount of leather used.  Using an X elastic design, we eliminated unnecessary pockets, making your cards easy to store and easily accessible.

Articulate Wallets are made from 100% Genuine Leather along with a high quality, durable elastic material.  We reviewed several different manufacturers until we found one that produces at a very high quality and  timely fashion.  We have the packaging material designed and ready to go. Now, with your help we can get out the first production run of  Articulate Wallets!  Your pledge will go directly into the production and final assembly costs of the wallets,  allowing us to meet the minimum order quantity. If you have any suggestions on how we can improve the wallet, or would like to give some feedback, we would love to hear it.  Your support is greatly appreciated!!

The challenges of Articulate Wallets will be getting the word out, and convincing backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them.

Badger 360° Designed with safety in mind:

Do you really know if motorists can actually see you at night while you are biking, walking or jogging? A lot of sport apparels have reflective tape but is it really good enough? Reflective tape works by reflecting light back to the original light source only. Therefore, a car’s headlight can only see you if you are in line with the headlight. Why wait for motorist to see you? With Badger 360°, you will be visible from all directions!

During the prototype stage of development, we had to figure out the best way to route the LED strings.  We made our first prototype and went to more than 40 bikes shops and running stores around Los Angeles to ask for their comments and suggestions.  We were glad that we did that because we realized the jacket was lacking lots of key features.
This is our first prototype jacket.
LED strings are embedded in this jacket.  We found a LED string that is low current, waterproof and flexible.
LED strings are embedded inside the seams of the jacket.
After 9 months of Research and Development.  We are happy with our final design!

White Color LED’s were chosen to provide the best possible illumination. The white LED strands are sewn to the seams of the jacket which makes it visible to motorist but the LED will not cause any disruption to your eyes while wearing it. LED lights are placed starting from the back of the jacket, continuing along the neck area, and ending on both sides of the shoulders. Motorists will see where you are from all directions. It is even visible from more than a ¼ mile away.

Weight is a big factor and often hinders athletic performance, therefore we designed the battery pack to be small weight less than 1 oz. (equivalent of 7 pennies) but it is powerful enough to withstand more than 8 hours of use.
The battery also preserves the life of the battery by allowing the battery to turn on only when it is plugged in.
Even though the battery pack is small, it also has integrated one button design. You will be able to turn the LED lights On/Off and choose up to 7 flash sequences.
Charging the battery is so quick and easy. Just use the connection cable provided and plug it into any USB port.
Unlike the prototype mentioned above, the Badger 360° has many great features:
Material:     Polyester Material to help wick away moisture
Mesh Interior Lining:     Help to maximize ventilation

Pockets:     It has 1 front pocket to keep your credit card, cell phone or other     important items for easy access. 2 side pockets, 1 large zippered     compartment in the back pocket, and 1 left chest inner pocket as well.
Hood:     The hood of the Jacket can be tucked away when not in use
Zipper:     2 way zippers are used to make more adjustment for     comfort.
Reflective Strips:  Reflective Stripes are added along the     zipper area just in case your run out of battery.
Washable:     With the exception of the battery, the Badger 360 can be submerged in     water and washed.
Carrying Case:     It can be completely folded within itself when not in use.
Inner Chest Pocket with mesh lining for maximum ventilation
Back View:  Badger 360° with hidden Hood
Front View:  Badger 360° with exposed Hood
Back View:  Badger 360° with exposed Hood
Reflective material along all zipper area.
2 way zipper design for maximum comfort
.*All Badger 360° comes with 1 battery.
*All Badger 360° comes with 1 battery.

We know our LED Technology can be utilized in many different areas. Therefore, the first place where we want implement on are shoelaces.  This is our first time showing this product to the public and thought it will be a great gift for our backers.  This LED shoelace uses the same LED string that is in our Badger 360°.  Now you can run hands free and be seen without the hassle of carrying a flashlight.
• 3 different flash sequences (Steady, Pulse, Fast Pulse)

Minimum Order Quantity  (MOQ):  In order to keep have our jackets made at an affordable price, we will need to place a larger order.  This is where Indiegogo comes in and help fund the first production run.
Patent:  We have filed for Patent Pending already so that our ideas are not compromised.

Local Events and Conventions:  We believe that Social Media will help Badger 360° get this products into new heights but we are more of a people person.  We want to talk to customers just like you (face to face), show you the actual product so you can see it and try it.  Therefore, we want to use some of the funding to participate in local events.
Research and Development:  We are trying to develop more products with our LED Technology.  Therefore, we want to use some of the funding to make new prototypes and bring you more cool products.

Give back to the Crowd Funding Community:  This is our first time using Indiegogo to help make our ideas come into reality and we believe that there other great ideas for safety products as well.  If we do see some great projects in the future, we will also like to support them like what you are doing for us.

Every project comes with its challenges and we know that Murphy is alive as well (Murphy's Law).  We have the experience to deal with potential problems and know how to resolve them quickly.  We have visited our manufacturer facility before and we know that they are reputable company since they have been in business for more than 30 years.
Here are the items that we have to monitor closely :

Quality Control:  We believe that this will be our biggest challenge. Since this is our first full production run, we need to make sure our products are tested at different stages of production.  An inspection check list has been made to ensure every point on the list meet our standards.

Soft Production:  Rather making thousands of jackets at one time.  We are going to have a soft production run of 500 units.  That way, we can adjust the assembly line if necessary.  Also, we can make sure those 500 units are meeting our standards.
Hard Production: Once the 500 units have been tested and passed our inspection, we will continue to make the rest of the units.

Communication: Communication with our manufacturer will be extremely important. We have been working with our manufacturers for more than 12 months now and it has been running pretty smoothly.  We will work hard and continue our effort until the merchandise are ready to ship.

Logistic:  The cost of shipping always change.  We have been communicating with our freight forwarding company to inform us on any change in shipping cost.  We have also been in touch with our customs broker to ensure the duties are correct for import.
Questions? We are here to help!  Write to us at:
There have been a lot of support making this project happen:  Just want to say ""Thanks You"" to the following:
Ron McKiernan: Thanks for letting us film at your shop!

column4: >Help make history! Join us at the Finale Event of the first ever American Hijab Design Contest and Style Contest!

column2: >If you miss the deadline but would still like to contribute, please email support@americanhijabdesign.com
>We are happy to continue to honor the perks.

column3: >facebook.com/americanhijab
column4:
>
twitter.com/shazkaiseruddin

column2:
>We need to unleash our imaginative energies for cultural production, here in this land and in this time.  The American Hijab Design Contest promises to do just that.  And in that Shaz is a pioneer.
-Dr. Sherman Jackson (a top, world-renowned intellectual and scholar)

The American Hijab Design Contest is inviting our nation's most creative minds to interpret hijab in any way they can possibly imagine.
To come up with avant-garde American hijab styles,
so as to help society see that hijab is as American as blue jeans,
and to help make all kinds of covered chic fashion more commonplace so all women, Muslim or not, feel they can be stylish without revealing more than they want to.
We're putting out the call to all designers, established and aspiring—since brilliance can come from anywhere.  And we are seeking true originality. It need not be a scarf that covers the hair.
More and more we're seeing covered chic looks on the streets of New York, Chicago, and LA and on top celebrities including Rihanna, Madonna, &
column3:
Angelina Jolie.
""Hijabi"" has even hit the runways of  New York Fashion Week.
This has the potential to be huge since big designers have said they don't know how to design for the $96 billion Muslim female fashion market.
column4:
>

And that's only one part of the worldwide covered chic market.
In Belgium, even women who are not Muslim have started to accessorize with hijabs.
We're asking everyone, except those planning to compete, to give even just $1—because the sheer number of supporters will make a statement.
My combined background in and passion for fashion and human rights have brought me to this point.
And I've received advice and encouragement from many including project runway winner Jeffrey Sebelia and CFDA winner Alexis Bittar.
This is about the powerful connections between high fashion and the universal acceptance of all.
This is about the idea that no one should feel foreign in their own homeland.
And this is about changing the world and having fun while doing it.
Please support the campaign, spread the word, and contact us to get involved. Thank you so much.

column2: >See what people are saying about American Hijab Design.  View Dr. Rami Nashashibi (A Top Ten Chicago Global Visionary)

column3: >FUNDS WILL GO TOWARDS MAKING THIS HIGH QUALITY, INCLUDING:

column1:
-legal fees for drafting rules of the contest ($2500)
-PR costs related to reaching out to media, fashion editors, and celebrities with the hope of securing partnerships and sponsorships and spreading the word about the contest ($4000 so far)
-entity establishment ($500)
-graphic and web design fees ($300 so far)
-accounting fees ($TBD)
-costs for the annoncement of the winner ($TBD)

*If you plan to compete, please do not contribute, but please do spread the word about this campaign.

column3: >ABOUT THE CREATIVE DIRECTOR: SHAZ KAISERUDDIN

column1: Shaz is a pioneer. -Dr. Sherman Jackson (a top, world-renowned intellectual and scholar)

I have a great love for fashion. And I'm truly humbled by what others have to say about that (below).  I have worked on fashion shows and photo shoots in Chicago and Miami.  I am also a human rights advocate. I worked at Amnesty International on, among other issues, women's rights. I was also the inaugural Leighton Fellow at John Marshall Law School, where I taught and researched prisoners' rights.

In countless social arenas, Shaz has earned admiration as a diva of fashion finesse.   -Sereen Ibraheem

Shaz has a celebrity-like, charismatic aura when she enters any room.  -Amenah Akhtar

Shaz is always a vision.   -Zoona Ali

Edgy and stylish--fashion comes so naturally to Shaz. -Nihad K.

Shaz's fashion intuition sets her apart in a crowd and inspires the many women in her life with diverse taste. I know this, because I am one of them. -Fatima Quadri

Shaz is an elegant diva with a passion for justice. Her contest will revolutionize the state of fashion and the state of our minds. -Mehwish Shaukat

Shaz's signature style is original. -Cima Dairanieh

I'd love to be as stylish as Shaz!   -Aisha A.

Shaz is dazzling. Let the Hijab games begin:) -Ambreen Zuberi

Shaz is fresh, trendy, feminine, and elegant.   -Farah Hatia

Shaz has a truly unique sense of style which is inspiring.   -Farheen Mirza

The American Hijab Design Contest provides the larger American community with an opportunity of seeing Muslim women like most of us know them--as absolutely inspirational, dynamic, and creative.  I am 100% behind our phenomenal, dynamic young leader Shaz Kaiseruddin.-Dr. Rami Nashashibi (A Top Ten Chicago Global Visionary)

The American Hijab contest so perfectly expresses the emancipation of both the educated Muslim woman and the modern Western mind from its outdated assumptions.  -Dr. Kamyar M. Hedayat (internationally published scholar)

Hedayat (internationally published scholar)",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
My story begins 22 years ago at 22 years old.

That is when I first taught myself to make a hat.  My determination and love for hat making has been ongoing since.  I took on having a shop one year into starting to design.  At the time I was very green in the profession, however, I have incredibly strong natural business skills and still to this day, I have people complementing me on hats they bought 20 yrs. ago!  As well, jump ahead two decades and I am now fully skilled and absolutely ready to launch!

I have continued to make hats, stock small boutiques here and there, launch collections at craft fairs and on line via Facebook and my website: www.katherinecarey.com.  HOWEVER, I seem to still be stuck in the phase of not being able to grow due to seed money.

Sure I can make a hat out of practically nothing.  I am actually excellent at that.  But for my business to launch to a level where it is a label globally known for quality and creativity (the actual goal), it requires a different level of design.
I started out creating originals and now I create lines.  Of course there are always originals popping out, but for the larger markets, a consistent line is required and desired.

Millinery tools and materials are not inexpensive.  Hence why handmade quality hats can cost so much.  A savvy shopper I truly am!  Not frivolous or complacent.  I am excellent at stretching my dollars!  And now that I live in New York City, I have access to an abundance of resources to create beautiful consistent hats at the best price points available.

Well, this 22 year journey has taken me from Los Angeles to Maui to New York... all the while I have done my most diligent to maintain and sustain my business and my life.   Sometimes more successfully then other times.
I am not what a bank views as a perfect client for a business loan due to my artist living/hand to mouth existence. I have hit a block.
I can not continue to launch to the level I inspire to with the level of support I currently have.

Equipment!  Proper millinery equipment.  A real hat sewing machine instead of an inexpensive house machine.  A set of real hat blocks instead of blocking from plastic hat inserts and dishes, bowls, and always make-shifting my tools.  A real studio space where I can grow my dream properly instead of squeezing my dream down to the size of the work space.  All time saving needs for a more productive business.

With these needs met, this would open up the opportunity to be able to commit to a very large wholesale order that can sustain my business allowing me the ability to purchase the materials needed until I am paid for the work.
It's really the only way I can grow to the next level.

How I look forward to hiring staff that can grow with me while I help to sustain their lifestyles.  That part comes next.  But what I see launching ALL of this is landing a large order that can give my business a boost to maintain itself.
My goal is reasonable.  We all know that business start ups actually require more.  But with $8000, I can truly get the business to a level to launch itself.
No matter what I will continue to grow...but I so appreciate the nutrients!

My gratitude is overwhelming.  I know we all have places we want to see our hard earned money go.  I thank you for taking the time to read this and for considering participating in the continuation of a life long dream to be an entrepreneur creatively growing my business.
I thank you for considering sharing my campaign.  The way to reach my goal is to get as many people to my campaign as possible.
So I thank you and bless you.

p.s.  Today's launching of this campaign is a classic example as to WHY I truly need funding.  With the computer broken every bit of this has been done via iPhone.  What should have taken a couple hours has sucked up an entire day.  My hat production is the same way.  What should be efficient isn't, making each hat takes so much longer than it should.
I just about didn't launch this campaign today.  The frustration level of working on equipment not equipped to do the job just about got to me, however, just like with my business...I prevail.
But I am due for an UPGRADE!

Hello, my name is Unique Weston. I founded Monroe Threadz at the age of 20yrs old. Growing up as an orphan without a lot of belongings or resources I fell in love with fashion design. All I wanted to do was design beautiful clothes since I was never fortunate enough to own beautiful attire myself. Being a foster child hindered my ability to dream, because at times I felt that I didn't know where I belonged and I didn't know where to begin.

<h3>    I was inspired to pursue my dream of becoming a fashion designer by Marilyn Monroe, a 1950's Model and Movie icon. After reading her biography, I learned that Marilyn had also grown up as an orphan, but still managed to accomplish her goals as an actress without parents, or her family's financial support. I  was motivated to do the same with my big dreams as well. At the age of 18,After being lost for many years, I let go of my insecurities and began making my dreams reality. I began hand-sewing dresses and modeling them in front of a camera. Like Marilyn, my modeling skills took off like a rocket. A year later, the fashion line Monroe Threadz was born
column2: the combination of Marilyn MONROE and Unique's passion for fashion

column1: This is not just another fashion line. It holds a very valuable meaning and message. Monroe Threadz is dedicated to all the girls and boys around the world who have dreamed, believed and perceived their own greatness. For the girls and boys who have dreams that feel unreachable, the purpose of my clothing line is to inspire them to pursue their dreams no matter what they look like, how old they are, or what their current living situation may be. I believe everyone was born with a God given talent and it's our job to live out our dreams for the future! I can not express enough how much any contribution you make will help me achieve my goal of being a successful Fashion Designer, tell my story, and make history.

I took a huge leap of faith and moved from my Mountain top hometown of Denver, Colorado all the way to the Pacific coast of Los Angeles, California with NOTHING but my supportive boyfriend, sewing machine, designs, and faith in my dream. As we all know running your own business is difficult, but starting from the bottom in a new city makes the journey that much more Challenging. The first half of the money Monroe Threadz raises will go towards acquiring a company car, setting up an online boutique, an industrial serger machine, and assembling a new Monroe Team. The second half will be used to pay showroom fees for my Spring 2013 Collection, samples, and production. With the capital that I have already contributed and the money I will raise with your help, I will be able to put together a wonderful California collection that will help Monroe Threadz get off the ground and into closets around the world! Growing up in foster care has taught me that giving is more important than receiving. so to show my gratitude I have many perks to offer. Monroe Threadz T-Shirts, Monroe Threadz swimsuits, Monroe Threadz stickers, shout-outs, an invitation to Spring fashion show, and 2 pieces from my new collection.

<strong>Modeling and designing in denver brought lots of success. Not only have I taken thousands of photos and attended 100's of fashion shows, I've given various women and men (age 2- 42) the confidence, and inspiration, to follow their dreams. I've taught many girls how to model and motivated designers to continue to pursue their dreams. I know that if Monroe Threadz can generate the funds it needs
column2:
it will continue to touch people's lives in a way that a fashion line has never done!
Thoughts become things and if you can believe it, you can most certainly achieve it! I know Monroe Threadz will be a success. Im hoping you believe as well!

column1: I know a lot of us are struggling to make ends meet these days, so I understand if you can't necessarily contribute money. But that doesn't mean that you can't help me succeed. Please help Monroe Threadz get our name out- Help us make noise about our campaign!! Share this campaign link- Tell everyone you know to Like us on fb www.facebook.com/monroethreadz Visit our website: www.kwestonunique.wix.com/monroethreadz
