Introducing the brand new SOLZwatch ""SHINE.""  It’s a sporty diver-style watch made in striking colors of eco-friendly silicone and steel with a rotating bezel.  What sets this watch apart is that is has no hands!  Instead, it uses colorful LED lights to SHINE through the face and show the time, date and day.  The time lights up by pressing the buttons or it can be set to flash the time every 5/10/30 minutes.  This design can be especially attention-grabbing and when you wear yours, people are going to ask about it!  Not just “another pretty face,” it’s what’s inside that SHINES out and gives it its character.  The back is laser-engraved with the SOLZ logo and slogan ""TIME TO SHINE""™.

Our new SOLZwatch “SHINE” is finished and ready for production.  Our manufacturing is all lined up and we have finalized the design and prototypes.  We just need to raise enough funding to meet the minimum order quantity and bring the watches to market.  If we hit our stretch goal, we will have the opportunity to produce additional colors.  With enough help and support, we can launch SOLZ on a national level and truly raise awareness and make a difference.
The brand new SOLZ watch “SHINE”!  You can get yours with our Early Bird Special – just $30.  This watch will retail at $69
column2: so, grab them while you can and save almost 60%!  Remember, the Early Bird Special is available to only the first 100 orders – the price will go up to $39 after that.

column1: Please indicate your color preference of black, white or red.  Additional colors will depend on funds raised.

Here is how we are making a difference.  When asked about your SOLZwatch, you will have a story to tell and a compelling purpose.  That’s because SOLZ is raising awareness and support for educating girls around the world.  For every watch sold, SOLZ donates 10% of the profits to 10x10, an amazing charitable organization we work with.  It is dedicated to educating girls around the world.  So, capture that attention and turn it into awareness!

In its own words, “10x10 is a global action campaign for girls' education, founded by award-winning journalists at The Documentary Group and Paul G. Allen's Vulcan Productions, along with strategic partner, Intel Corporation.  Centered by the new feature film, Girl Rising, 10x10 uses the power of storytelling and the leverage of strategic partnerships to deliver a simple, critical truth:  Educate Girls and you will Change the World.”
“Girl Rising” recently premiered in theaters and on CNN.  We encourage everyone to check out http://10x10act.org/ and watch the Girl Rising movie trailer in our gallery at the tab above or here:

Girls are an integral, influential and escalating part our future.  One of the most effective ways to change the world and make it become a better place is by helping girls everywhere have access to education.  Every girl deserves a chance to shine.  You can take that positive step by joining with SOLZ and 10x10 – it’s your “TIME TO SHINE”™!

The “SHINE” watch box is also a piggy bank!  We encourage you to put a quarter in it every time you get complimented on your watch.  When the box is full (this shouldn’t take long) you will have about $50!  This is enough to pay for schooling for a girl for a whole year.  Donate yourself at
column2: >http://10x10act.org/give/, or buy another SOLZwatch as a gift and SHINE IT FORWARD!  (Send us a pic of your piggy bank and we’ll send you a discount code).  Using change to make change is sexy AND smart.

column1: Our original SOLZwatch “MIRROR” is a true reflection of the SOLZ lifestyle.  It has a clean, sleek design that looks great for men and women alike -- featuring a soft-silicone band in a variety of colors and a stainless steel casing.  The front features a 4cm x 4cm mirror and a subtle SOLZ exclusive ""3 Ray"" logo.  At the press of a button, the numbers SHINE through the mirror like magic and feature a 12/24 hour clock, day/month/year date and digital second timer - all in a bright red LED light display.  The back of the watch is laser-engraved with the SOLZ logo and slogan -- ""TIME TO SHINE""™.  SOLZwatch MIRROR is already in stock and available.  Get one here waaay below retail while supplies last.  http://www.solzshoes.com/products/solzwatch

Also, check out our innovative solar powered backpacks in the perks section.  In this campaign you can also claim this product that made SOLZ famous!  Power your electronics and your lifestyle.  We have released only 10 for this exclusive campaign opportunity.  Take a look at http://www.solzshoes.com/collections/bags.

So, in order to enhance our partnership with 10x10 and realize the objective of raising even more money for its cause, we are offering you “combo packages” with other SOLZ products at a discount.  Remember, for every combo package sold, SOLZ donates 10% of the profits to 10x10.  Together, we are helping to give others the chance to SHINE and improve the world in one of the most important ways we can.  We would love you to contribute, but even more importantly, please SHARE THE SHINE and spread the word about this subject and this project.  Getting noticed will be the easy part, raising awareness and showing others that they too can make a purchase that makes a difference, that one IS ON YOU.  It's SOLZwatch.  It's “TIME TO SHINE”™!

Winner of 2012 ""Designer of the Year"" for shoes and accessories, SOLZ was born from a project in, you guessed it, school.  Education is deeply important to SOLZ’ founder Brad Carrick and he considers it the most important gift he has ever been given.  Dedicated to creating functional fashion products for active lifestyles, SOLZ has already successfully launched a line of innovative foldable shoes, solar-powered backpacks and mirror watches.  We think it’s possible to be fashionable and have fun while making a positive change through SMART solutions using technology and working together.  We have done it all with no outside investment or corporate support.  Only word of mouth and crowd funding from people JUST LIKE YOU.
We can produce SHINE watch in Black, White, Red.
We can produce SHINE watch in Blue &
We can produce SHINE watch in additional colors.  You will get the vote!

If we can raise just 15K we will be able to not only produce the new SOLZwatch SHINE but to market our products nationally and truly start to make a difference for girls around the world!  Be a part of something bigger.  Wear a watch that tells everyone that its TIME TO SHINE.
$5  SOLZ laser-engraved luggage tag.  SOLZ like you are what keep us shining! (While supplies last.)

$20  Our famous SOLZwatch MIRROR.  Early bird special.  This is the original watch with a square mirror face with a digital LED time that shines through at the touch of a button.  Available in 10 colors, subject to availability.  Retailing at $49 this is almost 60% off!  Time to shine!  http://www.solzshoes.com/products/solzwatch (available to the first 100 orders -- $29 after that)

$30  THIS IS IT!  The brand new SOLZ watch SHINE!  Early bird special.  This watch will retail at $69 so grab this while you can and save almost 57%!  Please indicate color preference black/white or red. Additional colors will depend on funds raised.  (available to the first 100 orders -- $39 after that)
$45  One of Each.  SOLZwatch MIRROR and SOLZwatch SHINE!
$90  Menage a SOLZwatch SHINE – 3 watches, one each in black, white and red.  (Substitute colors will depend on funds raised.)
$150  The TRAVELER.  1 SOLZwatch SHINE, 1 of our famous solar powered SOLZbags!  Check them out here.  http://www.solzshoes.com/collections/bags  (Only 10 avail.)

$350 The entrepreneur.  5 SOLZwatch MIRROR, 5 SOLZwatch SHINE.  AND a wholesale code that will allow you to be a SOLZ affiliate and sell SOLZ products yourself.  The sky is truly the limit on this one!

$1000  The named designer.  You pick a pantone color, we produce a SOLZwatch SHINE just for you.  You get 50 watches to sell, give to friends and family or just brag about.  You also pick the name of this special-edition watch going forward!  (e.g. SOLZwatch Brian’s SHINE).

$1500 The business of shine.  Set of 100 mirror watches in your company color.  Impress and thank your employees while making a real difference and raising awareness.  For businesses that shine.  Also great for weddings, or other special events!

Introducing the brand new SOLZwatch ""SHINE.""  It’s a sporty diver-style watch made in striking colors of eco-friendly silicone and steel with a rotating bezel.  What sets this watch apart is that is has no hands!  Instead, it uses colorful LED lights to SHINE through the face and show the time, date and day.  The time lights up by pressing the buttons or it can be set to flash the time every 5/10/30 minutes.  This design can be especially attention-grabbing and when you wear yours, people are going to ask about it!  Not just “another pretty face,” it’s what’s inside that SHINES out and gives it its character.  The back is laser-engraved with the SOLZ logo and slogan ""TIME TO SHINE""™.

Our new SOLZwatch “SHINE” is finished and ready for production.  Our manufacturing is all lined up and we have finalized the design and prototypes.  We just need to raise enough funding to meet the minimum order quantity and bring the watches to market.  If we hit our stretch goal, we will have the opportunity to produce additional colors.  With enough help and support, we can launch SOLZ on a national level and truly raise awareness and make a difference.
The brand new SOLZ watch “SHINE”!  You can get yours with our Early Bird Special – just $30.  This watch will retail at $69
column2: so, grab them while you can and save almost 60%!  Remember, the Early Bird Special is available to only the first 100 orders – the price will go up to $39 after that.

column1: Please indicate your color preference of black, white or red.  Additional colors will depend on funds raised.

Here is how we are making a difference.  When asked about your SOLZwatch, you will have a story to tell and a compelling purpose.  That’s because SOLZ is raising awareness and support for educating girls around the world.  For every watch sold, SOLZ donates 10% of the profits to 10x10, an amazing charitable organization we work with.  It is dedicated to educating girls around the world.  So, capture that attention and turn it into awareness!

In its own words, “10x10 is a global action campaign for girls' education, founded by award-winning journalists at The Documentary Group and Paul G. Allen's Vulcan Productions, along with strategic partner, Intel Corporation.  Centered by the new feature film, Girl Rising, 10x10 uses the power of storytelling and the leverage of strategic partnerships to deliver a simple, critical truth:  Educate Girls and you will Change the World.”
“Girl Rising” recently premiered in theaters and on CNN.  We encourage everyone to check out http://10x10act.org/ and watch the Girl Rising movie trailer in our gallery at the tab above or here:

Girls are an integral, influential and escalating part our future.  One of the most effective ways to change the world and make it become a better place is by helping girls everywhere have access to education.  Every girl deserves a chance to shine.  You can take that positive step by joining with SOLZ and 10x10 – it’s your “TIME TO SHINE”™!

The “SHINE” watch box is also a piggy bank!  We encourage you to put a quarter in it every time you get complimented on your watch.  When the box is full (this shouldn’t take long) you will have about $50!  This is enough to pay for schooling for a girl for a whole year.  Donate yourself at http://10x10act.org/give/, or buy another SOLZwatch as a gift and SHINE IT FORWARD!  (Send us a pic of your piggy bank and we’ll send you a discount code).  Using change to make change is sexy AND smart.

Rhode Island college student starts her own clothing label  despite major drawback designing basic chic fashion pieces making getting dressed a breeze.
Welcome to my Selah by Shenaye Indiegogo!
Big thanks to the Indiegogo community!! We are seeking funding for my newly launched clothing label Selah by Shenaye.

I’ve found that getting dressed can be a huge hassle for us women, and we often dread doing it. We all want to look like the stylish bloggers, but oftentimes don’t end up looking like how we want. That’s where Selah comes in. A line full of basic, staple pieces that are easy to build upon for any outfit. A line that fully enhances a woman's sexy curves, not the lines and flaws we don't want seen.  A line where there's a perfect piece for everyone. A line that makes you feel like the IT girl, because you are.It's about simplicity, sexiness and details. Confidence, quality, and ease.
This is our big chance to make our mark in a growing industry. Dream it Big!

There is plenty of work behind the scenes when creating beautiful imagery for a clothing line. Hair stylists, make-up artists, photographers, art directors, mentors, and friends. Those people that help fill the gap when you fully realize you just can't do alone. We are so grateful. Right now both me and my amazing mentor Priscilla Barroso have spent that past months finalizing the designs for the line from every detail down to the buttons. We need your help to produce a full size run to sell on our website. Your contributions will help Selah by Shenaye with all necessary start up costs including the costs of manufacturing, producing a Spring fashion show, our Spring 2014 Lookbook, and the absolute potential to expand this dream to a full out reality! Our ultimate goal in the future is to be able to take part of our profits and start a charity to help fund designers dreaming to produce their own collection. ""It is not about competition, it is about the community.""

You might ask why $8,000? It is a pretty exact number when calculating funds needed for the launch. The costs of manufacturing a full size run is about 3,000, not including extra sizing going towards rewards :) (and all the extra sweet gifts!) + producing a strong promotional plan (including a fashion show) + creating the “Support Your Local Dreamer” charity. Selah by Shenaye Indiegogo will allow us to gain exposure in the retail world, crucial for sales and growth, and ultimately help other designers to do the same.
A little about me as a designer....From San Antonio to Rhode Island. The story comes full circle. During my time away at school, I study Fashion Merchandising + Retail Marketing at Johnson &
column2:
Wales University. While at school I started a fashion blog and YouTube channel geared to helping young women like myself learn how to style themselves and feel confident. After receiving messages and comments from my viewers saying how much I helped them, I knew I wanted to do more. I knew I had to create a line of clothing that would further push what I taught in my blog posts and videos. I wanted to help women feel as trendy as a blogger without all the hassle and stress in getting dressed. My one drawback is that I’m a horrible sketcher and my sewing still needs a lot of work, however, I had a vision. I refused to let my “drawbacks” stop me. I took this issue and reached out to a designer that I’d been following for three years. This designer, Priscilla Barroso, has been quite successful in her career thus far, and was even on a TV show called NBC Star. I was surprised when she responded in such depth to my questions and even offered to help me create my vision. I am so grateful to Priscilla for being an amazing mentor to me and helping to make my dream a reality!


This label is about taking those classic pieces and adding details like texture, zippers, buttons, keeping the pieces trendy, yet wearable at the same time. Since we are strongly motivated by what people are looking for and just can't find, Selah by Shenaye eliminates that struggle for transforming trends into basic pieces that can be worn more than once (without anyone noticing) and gives room for more creative styling. It is a collection that can be trans-seasonal and worn throughout the year. Mixing up classic pieces that can be styled with what you already own, they are pieces you have in the front of the closet. Anchors.

column1: A little more about the label...from classic French retro to quirky animal prints, founder Shenaye Thomas designed a brand that illustrates her need for a multi-wearable wardrobe. Boldly captivating and easy to wear, these versatile staples provide building blocks for each new season. Selah by Shenaye has a method of crafting designs using intermingling textures, a black and white color scheme, and timeless silhouettes that strongly capture the nature of the brand.   As though that design was made for you, that you were destined to wear it. To own it. Thoughtfully made in the USA.
A dream come true, this is just the beginning. Thank you for being a part of this journey. It really does mean the world to not only myself, but all the 'makers' involved.

Let’s talk about those rewards eh?

The Fabulous LIGHT-UP LIP GLOSS - $25.00 Reward!
column18:
/>

(Colors in order from left to right -- Passion, Champagne, Glitz, Confetti and Glamour -- choose which color you'd like!)


The ""I SUPPORT LOCAL DREAMERS"" TOTE BAG $50.00 + Reward!

column1: This part is super important.  LETS BE FRIENDS! It really takes a lot of effort for any small business to sustain growth. Please share this project with your friends and network. For any questions do not hesitate to contact me directly at shenayecharee@gmail.com. I'm here for you and you alone.
Get updates on the website www.selahbyshenaye.com

Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the project creator directly.

column2: >The Baseball cap reinvented. Contribute and grab one of the awesome perks in the right column. Part of the proceeds will be donated to the Canadian Cancer Society.

column1: TCaps has invented and patented the TCap which is the first and only complete integration of sunglasses into a baseball cap. The advantages and uses are many as is shown in the video and on the web site. The TCap has been blessed with very positive feedback from many different sources and we now need to capitalize upon those reactions to bring the TCap to the next level.
Next level: the company needs to enter into a partnership agreement with a company able to market and distribute the TCaps to a broader audience.

We have received strong interest from a few entities, especially in the promotional world, provided we can supply them with enough stock of sunglasses and in return they will provide the hat part of the TCap in equal quantities, assemble the two parts together, warehouse and market them. One company in particular has already committed to this deal if we create a 20,000 pcs stock of sunglasses.

Their reasoning, validated by our due diligence, is that customers in the promotional world need to receive their orders in a very timely manner and we therefore need to have enough product in stock to satisfy that need.
The promotional world is also very price sensitive. The only way we can bring our pricing down to the required level is to order enough stock to begin with.
Your contribution is crucial to allow TCaps to succeed in accomplishing those two key tasks.

To accomplish our goals to get into this partnership and into the lucrative promotional industry, we have estimated our needs at US$50,000.00 to allow us to produce the sunglasses moulds and necessary stock.

Nascar has also shown interest in the TCap but while they like the current product, they would prefer to have us produce a new sunglasses design. So this is a great opportunity for us to get into that promising market which could open many other doors for us.

Should we fall short of the entire goal, we will just produce as many sunglasses as the funds allow us so that we can at least initiate some form of partnership with one of those promotional companies.
You can be among the first to get your hands on your own TCap by helping us. See more details in the Perks column on the right.
Your contribution will help us to not only break into the huge promotional market

column2: >.... will further help us open the doors to the many other channels available to the TCap, such as:

column1: • Share this campaign with your friends and family. Whether you post a link on Facebook or Twitter, or send an email to your community, we would love for you to help us spread the word.
• Click onto our comments tab to give us your feedback.
• Get your company to participate by ordering some TCaps from us for their promotional needs.

Inspiring women to embrace her inner Wonder Woman as she pedals her bike disguised as... herself. Smile and enjoy the Ride!


What are Wonder Bloomers? 
My Alibi Bloomers are the first of it's kind, ""Bike Underwear"" that has been offering women that extra koosh under all of her cute outfits since 2007.  Women all over the world are pedaling with style thanks to these super cute, comfy, high quality padded shorts. The Wonder Bloomers are the new version available only on pre-sale right here!   3 new colors include the amazing Royal Stars Bloomers.


The Wonder Bloomers Royal Stars available PreSale ONLY!
Connecting women to her inner Wonder Woman!

These super comfy boy cut shorts are made of top of the line French Lycra (Royal Star fabric printed exclusively for My Alibi's Wonder Bloomers).  Designed to fit comfortably under anything from skirts, capri's, shorts, even jeans, these sexy little shorts hold a huge secret.  A high end Italian gel chamois place ergonomically correct to protect your sensitive spots while riding a bike.  My Alibi's no elastic design has influenced many other bike shorts as they flatter the female figure without the dreaded panty lines.  Made in Morocco, supporting an eco-friendly factory that believes paying it's employees fairly is more then just a living wage.  Higher standards, higher quality, longer lasting products that support the bike integrated lifestyle, that is My Alibi.


What We Need &
column2:
What You GetWhy does it cost $30,000 to make the Wonder Bloomers?
At the heart of My Alibi is Abbie Durkee*.  A former professional level MTB racer who gave up racing to empower other women to discover the joy of riding a bike.  To Abbie, the sustainability of the bike integrated lifestyle is motivation to create innovative apparel that supports women pedaling.  This passion for sustainability inspires her to choose carefully how the manufacturing of My Alibi products effects the planet, and the people.  Because of these high standards, the Bloomers are the best quality AND made environmentally and socially responsible in Morocco.  In order to support this sustainable factory, minimum production requirements equal this amount. 

In order to keep this campaign simple I am limiting the offerings here to just Bloomers.  The new version will release at $88 a pair.  Pre-order here to get the discounted price of $70 AND you get to be apart of making it happen! 

You can also choose to get a pair of Chocolate, Pomegranate, or Tangerine
(currently in stock) for a discounted price in the Now &
column4:
If you own a shop there is a special Wholesale Perk with a simple 12 piece order that you can also split between current or pre-order colors.  With 6 colors and 9 sizes this really is a no-brainer deal for any bike shop wanting to support women integrating the bike into her lifestyle (ultimately supporting your shop!)

~Bonus Perk~
column6:
/>Double up on any perk to get a free Tshirt ($38). See more styles at www.myalibiclothing.com

Wholesale Perks doubled will receive a free Jersey (Value $98 limited availability)
column8:
/>

The Impact

I love this part!  All I want to do is have a positive impact, so I could go on for days.  To simplify, here are my top 8 reasons for integrating the bike into our culture through supporting women feeling beautiful on bikes:
1. Women on Bikes means Kids on Bikes.
2. Pedaling a bike is bonus to your physical health. 
~~Even Slow Riding adds to fitness.
3. Riding a bike gets the blood flowing and improves mental health. 
4. Using a bike as transportation increases your human interaction exponentially, shrinks community offering richer interactions. Sharing a Smile is inevitable by bike.
(I could write a book on this one)
5.  As Transportation a bike also multi-tasks errands with exercise, therapy, fresh air, and often play.  How cool is that? (I did contribute to an ebook on this one...
Fitting in Fitness by Abbie Durkee in the (free) Ultimate Health Guide). 
6. Supporting the trend of pedaling in her own style will empower women to continue shaping the communities they live in to thrive.
7. Supporting Sustainable Manufacturing is having a positive influence on the world of apparel.  We are making great strides.  Sometimes made in America is best, and other times there are outsourced alternatives that keep products affordable and give industry to areas with masses of skill that have developed over generations and need our business to survive.  I want them to thrive. 
8. The bike is the answer to a lot of the world's problems.  Pedal it forward!

This campaign runs from Monday March 3rd, International Women's Day to Saturday March 22nd, which is World Water Day. 
Bringing the World together raising awareness.
Join me inspiring the bike integrated lifestyle with your own Wonder Bloomers as your little secret to enjoy the ride!

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that pennies can be tight and this campaign is super short (only 3 weeks total!).  SO if you can't squeeze it into your budget this month, you can still help make it happen! ~Shout it out!
* Share it on FB, Twitter, Pinterest and in real time with your face to face peeps! 
* Tell your local Shop to ""Get On It"".  Many shop owners are busy this time of year with big bike brands and often miss the little cool stuff, they need you to tell them What's Up and Fresh.  (They'll probably even thank you for the tip!) 
* Don't forget the boutique stores where you buy all your cool feminine athletic gear (yoga pants,etc).  These buyers don't really consider carrying ""bike stuff"" but wouldn't you be stoked to find the My Alibi Bloomers there?  Give them a shout out about the Wonder Bloomers! 
* Get involved in local advocacy projects.  Here are a couple of our favorite places to start... CycloFemme, Women Bike.
~~The Pocket Change Perk of $8 includes 20 postcards and 10 stickers so you can help us spread the word in your community.  Pedal it Forward!~

column1:
Abbie Durkee has been passionately committed to supporting women riding bikes at all levels for over a decade.  As a former professional level MTB racer, junior elite girls coach, and even tour guide, she has supported women enjoying the ride with a smile.  Now as owner and designer of My Alibi Clothing she empowers women to integrate the bike into her own lifestyle through innovative apparel, workshops, and ~her favorite~ face to face encounters.  She uses her vast experience as a racer, commuter, mother, and recreational rider to help other women find the most practical bike and accessories to simplify their life by pedaling a bicycle.  You can learn more about Abbie's work by visiting Abbie's Spin, Abigail's Art Gallery, or www.myalibiclothing.com. 

""Smile and Enjoy the Ride!""  ~Abbie Durkee

","Inspiring women to embrace her inner Wonder Woman as she pedals her bike disguised as... herself. The Wonder Bloomers are the new version available only on pre-sale right here!   3 new colors include the amazing Royal Stars Bloomers. The Wonder Bloomers Royal Stars available PreSale ONLY!
Connecting women to her inner Wonder Woman!

Alibi's no elastic design has influenced many other bike shorts as they flatter the female figure without the dreaded panty lines.  Made in Morocco, supporting an eco-friendly factory that believes paying it's employees fairly is more then just a living wage.  Higher standards, higher quality, longer lasting products that support the bike integrated lifestyle, that is My Alibi.What We Need & My passion for timepieces started when I was a young boy. I still remember, as a little 9 year old, saving my money for several months just so I could buy my first watch. After finally saving enough to buy it, you couldn’t get that watch off my wrist.

Many years later, in 2010, now a man with a family, my passion for watches was rekindled after finding some interesting watch forums. On these forums, I followed fascinating discussions on all kinds of different watches, but I was especially fascinated by threads on how to build your own watch. These forums started to change my whole point of view on watches. Everyday my passion grew stronger and before I knew it, I had collected many different watches.

As I got deeper into customizing, modding and building watches for myself, I started thinking to myself ""Why don't I start producing watch parts?"" Not long after that, in 2011, I began selling watch parts for vintage watches.  Things were going well with my watch parts business, but then a new idea started creeping into my mind to the point where I couldn’t ignore it any longer: ""Why don't I start my own watch brand?"" I resolved to myself that before the end of 2014 I would release my own brand of watches. And, like that, “Athaya Vintage” was born.  I chose that name for two reasons: Athaya is my username on watch forums, and, more importantly, Athaya is also my son’s name.
My biggest hope for Athaya Vintage is to enrich everybody's passion for watches by creating timeless timepieces now, tomorrow and forever.

Athaya Vintage Watch specializes in creating watches based on the greatest vintage watch masterpieces ever made. My first project was the AV001 Type B Pilot Watch. It is based on the vintage WW2 Pilot Watch FL23883. This project generated a great deal of interest with vintage watch collectors and has been very successful. This success has laid a strong foundation for me to continue on to my next project: The Athaya Vintage AV002 Lamafa Diver Watch.

This diver watch is based on the legendary 6105-8110 diver watch, considered by many to be one of the best divers ever made. The name ‘Lamafa’ refers to Whalers from the eastern part of my country, Indonesia. I chose this name to honor them and their struggle to keep their traditions alive.

The Movement....
The AV002 Lamafa diver watch is powered by a Seiko NH35A automatic movement that has 24 Jewels, 21,600 Vibrations Per Hour, a Power Reserve 41 hours, and Hacking Feature. This movement is one of Seiko’s best movements and has a proven track record of excellent performance in the watch industry.
The Lamafa will be available in 2 colors with 2 style options per each color, the available combinations are:
• Black insert and Black sunburst dial with Date and Black rubber strap.
• Black insert and Black sunburst dial without Date and Black rubber strap.
• Blue insert and Blue sunburst dial with Date and Blue rubber strap.
• Blue insert and Blue sunburst dial without Date and Blue rubber strap.
Watch will be produce in limited 500pcs only, which will devide 125pcs for each styles.

column2: Blue, will also have their own special caseback engraving.  The black color variant will have an engraving that shows a Lamafa struggling with a Whale.  The Blue color variant will have an engraving of a Lamafa alone, in flight with his spear.

column1:
The Luminova....
Swiss C1 Luminova will be used on dial indices, hands and Bezel 12H pip. Swiss C1 Luminova will give a pure white color in daylight and very bright Luminova color in dark.

Beautiful Rubber Strap to match with the divers passions...

In keeping with the spirit of a pure diver, each Lamafa will come standard with a beautiful rubber diving strap.
Each watch will come with a beautiful Handmade Leather Watch Pouch, which will come in very handy when travelling to exotic diving locations.
• Case Dimension : +/- width 44.30 x Lug to Lug tip 48.00 x Total Thickness including glass 13.50
• Glass : Domed Sapphire with Colorless AR Coating.
• Crown : SS 316L, Screw down Triple o-ring with AV Logo.
• Caseback : SS 316L, Screw down with engraved design and AV Logo.
• Movement : Seiko Instrument Automatic NH35A Hacked second.

column2: Black sunburst with AV Lamafa design

column1: • Luminova : Swiss C1 Superluminova on Dial, Hands and Bezel pip.
2D drawing for the watch dimension :

All photos above are of real prototypes that we have produced. More photos can be accessed here:

https://plus.google.com/photos/117039982553405080472/albums/6100393893706921105
In order to help us make this project reach its goal of introducing our watch to the market, we’ve released a limited number of perks for you to choose, they are:
Pledge US$10 : Your name on our website on our ""Indiegogo Backers"" page.
Pledge US$315-Black-WD: Get a Lamafa Black variant watch With Date Style.
Pledge US$315-Black-ND: Get a Lamafa Black variant watch No Date Style.
Pledge US$315-Blue-WD: Get a Lamafa Blue variant watch With Date Style.
Pledge US$315-Blue-ND: Get a Lamafa Blue variant watch With Date Style.

We will do our best to make this complete this project according to the estimated timeline above, however, there may be unforeseen delays that arise as we progress. In that event our target dates may have to be revised and communicated to our backers accordingly.

Other Ways You Can Help...

Please help us by posting and sharing this watch project on your homepages, Facebook pages, Twitter feeds and all other social media avenues available. We need your help to spread the word about this project!

Most importantly, thank you for taking the time to visit my project.

column2:
>

Here's a link to my website where you can view a sample of my work: www.calderphotography.carbonmade.com

column1: My photographs are highly conceptual: surreal and dreamy visual images

that attempt to provoke deep feelings and emotions in the observer.

The Project I'm asking for help to fund is a series of portraits titled ""Men In Suits, Women In Dresses""

The series will feature extremely conceptual, artistic portraits of men and women.

The photo's of men will be shot on film and in black and white
the women will be shot in color, on digital.

I want to take the classic idea of a portrait to another level. I want to use concepts to explore personalities and ideas, I want to communicate the whimsy and magic I feel we possess as people.

Concept is key. these portraits are about getting a way from the standard head shot, they're about exploring the photographic medium as an art-form.

The funding will cover the cost of film &
column2:
developing and additional equipment needed (lights, stands e.t.c)

My plan once the series is finished it to exhibit the collection, and eventually publish the series as a photo-book.

Eddie will be there with you whenever you need it. Being
so small and wearable you can put it anywhere while travelling, driving and
parking your car. It will keep you updated of your loved ones location with its

GPS tracker. It will look after your home while you are away and keep it safe.

Attach Eddie to your glasses and take great quality
pictures and videos during trips to anywhere around the world. Document
everything and let your family and loved ones see what you see in real time by
Take Eddie to the most extreme locations like high
altitude mountains, sky diving, or under water scuba diving. With its
protective, shock resistant and waterproof cover it will remain with you the

whole time.

Track your journey with the GPS tracker and pin on the

map exactly where each photo and video was taken.

Keep a close eye on where your children are, whether they
are going on a field trip with the class, or shooting hoops in the play ground
with their friends. Always keep them safe with real time updates from the

mobile app.

Record while driving whether it’s the front, or back of
the vehicle. Hook up two devices to your mobile phone to film both at the same
time for your safety. You can set them up to film the most difficult angles to

help you while parking.

column1: Protective bag- Keep all your Eddie accessories
5 USD- A BIG Thank you and updates on how we are doing
19 USD – On the Go Charger + Auto Charger
Get 2 x Eddie 32 GB = 1 Eddie 8 GB for free!

Eddie will be shipped for free within the UK and the USA. If you are ordering an Eddie from another country it is best to add the international perk to your package. When doing so please indicate the postal address, so we can sort out all the deliveries correctly.
- Can I use more than one Eddie on my device?
Yes the app will let you connect to more than one Eddie simultaneously, so that you can see each one on the map and see what each one sees.
Eddie is fully waterproof and can be used 2 meters below water.
-How do I know how much battery life Eddie still has left?
You will be able to see the battery life of Eddie on the mobile app.
-How do I connect Eddie to my device?
Each Eddie will have a unique address which you can introduce in the app and will let you connect to it.
-What if I want to order a different perk?

Just add the perk that you want and contact us to let us know and work out the details. We will also contact everyone 4 weeks before shipping to ask if the postal address hasn't changed. If it has changed we will change the details to make sure that the perk gets delivered to the correct contributor.
A BIG THANK YOU TO EVERYONE INVOLVED!

Eddie will be shipped for free within the UK and the USA. If you are ordering an Eddie from another country it is best to add the international perk to your package. When doing so please indicate the postal address, so we can sort out all the deliveries correctly.
- Can I use more than one Eddie on my device?
Yes the app will let you connect to more than one Eddie simultaneously, so that you can see each one on the map and see what each one sees.
Eddie is fully waterproof and can be used 2 meters below water.

You will be able to see the battery life of Eddie on the mobile app.
-How do I connect Eddie to my device?
Each Eddie will have a unique address which you can introduce in the app and will let you connect to it.
-What if I want to order a different perk?

Just add the perk that you want and contact us to let us know and work out the details. We will also contact everyone 4 weeks before shipping to ask if the postal address hasn't changed. column1:
The ultimate purpose of this line is to embrace the idea of culture. Over the years the major harms, tribulations societies have had to face is from people being inadequately educated on whats going on around them. There are less than 3,000 elephants left in the world. Poaching and enslaving these animals into circuses has been quickly killing the species among other factors. The populations, particularly younger generations, in the regions these animals live lack much knowledge on how precious these animals are to earth. Together the potential bond they can build is destroyed with ideas such as $20000 poaching rewards in South Africa, where they reward people for poaching since it helps clear lands.  By supporting Haati Chai we’re moving one step closer to being proactive .  The ultimate goal of this brand and each collection within the brand is to grow knowledge within the individual. Each piece they purchase comes with a story and when you purchase a piece it becomes apart of your story. This story is pretty grand, and you will be apart of our journey. 
We want to create a sanctuary for elephants and children, particularly orphaned elephants and children, where we raise awareness and  create a safe haven for them. Together the elephants will live with orphaned children of the region where the sanctuary will be located. In third world countries where care for the less fortunate is very rare, an orphaned child faces an unbearable struggle - financially, emotionally, physically.

Terror, rage and stress, unfortunately, are also commonplace in the elephant repertoire of emotions. Terror afflicts baby African elephants who wake up screaming in the middle of the night after they have witnessed their families murdered and poached — a type of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder.

Some researchers suggest a species-wide trauma is taking place in wild elephant populations. They say that elephants are suffering from a form of chronic stress after sustaining decades of killings and habitat loss. The recent surge in cases of wild elephant rage reported by the media is a sad indicator of the kind of stress that wild elephants are undergoing.
column2: >The elephants and orphans will create a bond to serve as an example to the rest of the world, in addition help heal one another.

","THE BRAND

Inspired by East Indian traditions and style, Haati Chai encompasses both bold and simplistic designs.To be worn as an extension of your personality, Haati Chai 一 literally meaning “elephant” and “tea” in Bengali 一 encourages its wearers to think outside the box. Layers, chunky statements, and delicate designs can be combined to make the perfect look for anyone 一 men included. Contemporary meets tribal, Haati Chai is a blend of culture with elegant designs that cannot simply be defined as jewelry.

Haati Chai designer Stella Simona takes inspiration from her East Indian culture, merging tribal influence with contemporary designs. Growing up, Stella’s grandma would return home to India & Bangladesh for the summer or winter and would ask Stella to send a list of what she wanted from her travels. To begin, itwas always little trinkets or jewelry, but as Stella grew older her grandma suggested she should draw the designs she wanted. Their family jewelry smith would then bring the designs to life. From these humble beginnings, eventually, Haati Chai was created.

With the understanding that art and design have a personal effect on our daily lives, Stella Simona creates her pieces to make bold statements of individuality. In her native culture, each piece of jewelry represents something personal and is passed down from generation to generation. Each piece tells a story and marks different moments of your journey throughout life. Every collection designed at Haati Chai has been made with the idea of offering something which can be a part of one’s story 一 YOUR story. Mixing everyday function with a touch of exotic sensuality, the detail in the designs help you escape to different places or moments.

Majoring in communications, Stella gained extensive industry experience with internship opportunities working in sales showrooms, PR, assistant styling, and ultimately landing a position working in artist development where she helped brand and rebrand artists from labels such as Sony and RCA records. Being in different facets of the industry, she was never truly satisfied with the aesthetic of the jewelry used in the projects she worked on. Expressing this to her close friends and family, they pushed her to take matters into her own hands. Shortly after releasing her first set of designs, Stella Simona received great feedback from around the world. Her custom designs began selling out immediately and received features from blogs from the likes of THEY ALL HATE US. Celebrity stylist friends began reaching out as well for placements and within the first month of launching Haati Chai was featured on XfactorUK.

Almost 4 years into its life, Haati Chai continues to rapidly expand as well as gain further global recognition. Celebrities from the likes of Demi Lovato and Ashley Tisdale, to Kylie Jenner, Lana del Rey and Victoria’s Secret models Jasmine Tookes and Candice Swanepoel have all been seen and featured wearing Haati Chai. Jhene Aiko performed at the 2014 BET Awards head-to-toe in custom-made HaatiChai pieces, which won rave reviews from viewers who demanded they be available for sale. Featured in magazines across the world from Cosmopolitan Mexico, Vogue Australia, People Style Watch and sold in retailers such as Free People, AISHTI , and boasting a collection of boutique retailers from U.S. extending to the Middle East and Australia , the designs transcend all barriers 一 cultural and fashion alike

The faster we grow the closer we will be to our ultimate goal -- helping the orphaned children & elephants. column12:
>Lalabu Soothe Shirt

 

A stylish and innovative all-in-one babywearing shirt that’s both a nursing tank for mom and a cozy carrying pouch for baby.

column1: • A breathable mesh tummy panel to keep cool and feel your baby better
• Extra length to cover your postpartum tummy
• Ultra-soft and stretchy bra panels for all-day comfort and sizing flexibility as your postpartum body changes
• An adjustable head support and pouch extender providing more security and longevity for the pouch

column2: >And our best custom-designed fabric: softer, more secure, and longer lasting

>Lalabu Dad Shirt
The first babywearing shirt for dads that lets you wear baby simply. It makes it easy to win as a new dad!

column1: • Stylish v-neck design with slim fit and short sleeves
• Breathable mesh panel to let you feel and bond with baby
• A built-in pouch to calm baby that lies flat when not in use
• An adjustable head support and pouch extender
• Our custom fabric that’s comfortable and secure

column2:
>Lalabu Leggings

Supportive premium leggings with a unique compression panel for postpartum recovery. These are perfect to wear right after your baby arrives and will make you feel great!  Lalabu Leggings fill the gap when your maternity pants are too big and your pre-pregnancy pants are too small. Paired with your Soothe Shirt, it's your complete new mom outfit.

column1: • A gentle compression panel to support your postpartum belly
• Soft, flexible fabric with four-way stretch and sweat-wicking
• Perfect complement to your Soothe Shirt to create an easy, stylish outfit

column30: >Leave a comment - We really want to hear from you!  Leave a kind note or ask a question.  We'll answer your questions within 1 business day.

column2: >Tell Your Friends and Get Credit for It
column3: > - Did you know, if you're logged into Indiegogo, that you have a unique referral link in your URL bar?  If you copy/share that link and someone supports our campaign after clicking through, we get a report that tells us how many people supported us through your link.  Pretty cool huh?

>We’re a husband-wife founded small business in Atlanta, Georgia.  We released our first product in in 2013. Our idea for the Soothe Shirt was born on a trip to visit relatives in Africa. We were impressed with how easily babies integrate into daily life when they’re worn throughout the day, and we wanted to help more parents discover babywearing in a way that’s simple, easy, and convenient.
column8:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Since we founded Lalabu, we’ve donated 2% of all our revenue to women entrepreneurs in Africa through Kiva microloans. We’ve given a total of $28,675 to over 600 women across 23 African countries through our giving model. You can join our giving model in this campaign with the ""50% For Moms"" perk, where 50% of your contribution will go toward our campaign, and 50% will go to moms in Africa.  Regardless of which perk you choose, 2% will be given to moms in Africa.
column9: >Connect With Us For Insider Campaign Updates

column2:
>FAQs
Leave a comment to ask a question.  Here are answers to the top questions we've already received:

column1: How long can I use the Soothe Shirt and Dad Shirt pouch? The pouch is intended for newborns between 7 and 15 lbs.  For most babies that will be from birth up to 6 months. Moms can keep wearing their shirt as a nursing top the entire time they breastfeed.

When will the perks ship?  We're confident that we will ship by the end of October 2016.  If everything goes well, maybe even earlier. You will have the option to upgrade to expedited shipping when choosing your size and color.  We offer 2-day shipping in the USA and DHL Express 3-5 business day shipping internationally.
What sizes will be offered in the Dad Shirt ? The Dad Shirt will come in sizes M-XXL.
What sizes will be offered in the new Soothe Shirt? The new Soothe Shirt will come in sizes XS-XXL.

When will we be able to choose what size and color we want? You will be able to select your size and color later in the campaign when we are closer to shipping out your perks. We will let you know when that is! For now, you can just place a pre-order.
What colors are available? The Soothe Shirt will be available in Pure Black and Simple Gray and the Dad Shirt in Simple Gray.

column3:
>THANK YOU!!!

We genuinely want parents to love spending time with their babies. This is what motivates our team.  We do this through the creation of innovative products and through being a brand that celebrates and appreciates parenthood. Internally, we call it ""working for new lives"".  You can join us in our mission by helping us reach more moms and dads through our crowdfunding campaign.
column5:

","Our Campaign Has Successfully Ended!Visit shop.lalabu.com for the latest news and products.Click here to visit       Lalabu Soothe Shirt A stylish and innovative all-in-one babywearing shirt that’s both a nursing tank for mom and a cozy carrying pouch for baby. New features include:

column1: A breathable mesh tummy panel to keep cool and feel your baby better
Extra length to cover your postpartum tummy
Ultra-soft and stretchy bra panels for all-day comfort and sizing flexibility as your postpartum body changes
An adjustable head support and pouch extender providing more security and longevity for the pouch
And our best custom-designed fabric: softer, more secure, and longer lasting
Lalabu Dad ShirtThe first babywearing shirt for dads that lets you wear baby simply. It makes it easy to win as a new dad!Features include:
Stylish v-neck design with slim fit and short sleeves
Breathable mesh panel to let you feel and bond with baby
A built-in pouch to calm baby that lies flat when not in use
An adjustable head support and pouch extender
Our custom fabric that’s comfortable and secure

Lalabu LeggingsSupportive premium leggings with a unique compression panel for postpartum recovery. These are perfect to wear right after your baby arrives and will make you feel great!  Lalabu Leggings fill the gap when your maternity pants are too big and your pre-pregnancy pants are too small. Paired with your Soothe Shirt, it's your complete new mom outfit. Features include:
A gentle compression panel to support your postpartum belly
Soft, flexible fabric with four-way stretch and sweat-wicking
Perfect complement to your Soothe Shirt to create an easy, stylish outfit

Mom Experience VideosMonica was one of the first Lalabu moms! This is her story of babywearing using the Soothe Shirt with her daughters.Meet Audrey, mom of three.  She first experienced the Soothe Shirt with her son, William, and is now using it again with her daughter Rose.Watch as Kelly and Nicole share how the Lalabu Soothe Shirt makes babywearing and being a new mom easier. How Your Support HelpsWe've spent the last year planning, prototyping, and designing these new products.  Backing our project will enable us to complete the first production run.  With a successful campaign, all perks are expected to ship in October of 2016.    Other Ways to Help!There are a few ways you can greatly help us in addition to getting perks:Click the Follow/Facebook/Twitter buttons next to the ""BACK IT"" button on this page.  Believe it or not, if enough of you do this we could get featured on Indiegogo's homepage!Leave a comment - We really want to hear from you!  Leave a kind note or ask a question.  We'll answer your questions within 1 business day.

Tell Your Friends and Get Credit for It - Did you know, if you're logged into Indiegogo, that you have a unique referral link in your URL bar?  If you copy/share that link and someone supports our campaign after clicking through, we get a report that tells us how many people supported us through your link.  Pretty cool huh?

About Us We’re a husband-wife founded small business in Atlanta, Georgia.  We released our first product in in 2013. Our idea for the Soothe Shirt was born on a trip to visit relatives in Africa. We were impressed with how easily babies integrate into daily life when they’re worn throughout the day, and we wanted to help more parents discover babywearing in a way that’s simple, easy, and convenient. Since we founded Lalabu, we’ve donated 2% of all our revenue to women entrepreneurs in Africa through Kiva microloans. We’ve given a total of $28,675 to over 600 women across 23 African countries through our giving model. You can join our giving model in this campaign with the ""50% For Moms"" perk, where 50% of your contribution will go toward our campaign, and 50% will go to moms in Africa.  Regardless of which perk you choose, 2% will be given to moms in Africa.  Connect With Us For Insider Campaign Updates
FAQsLeave a comment to ask a question.  Here are answers to the top questions we've already received:

How long can I use the Soothe Shirt and Dad Shirt pouch? The pouch is intended for newborns between 7 and 15 lbs.  For most babies that will be from birth up to 6 months. Moms can keep wearing their shirt as a nursing top the entire time they breastfeed.

When will the perks ship?  We're confident that we will ship by the end of October 2016.  If everything goes well, maybe even earlier. You will have the option to upgrade to expedited shipping when choosing your size and color.  We offer 2-day shipping in the USA and DHL Express 3-5 business day shipping internationally.
What sizes will be offered in the Dad Shirt ? The Dad Shirt will come in sizes M-XXL.
What sizes will be offered in the new Soothe Shirt? The new Soothe Shirt will come in sizes XS-XXL.

When will we be able to choose what size and color we want? You will be able to select your size and color later in the campaign when we are closer to shipping out your perks. We will let you know when that is! For now, you can just place a pre-order.
What colors are available? The Soothe Shirt will be available in Pure Black and Simple Gray and the Dad Shirt in Simple Gray.

THANK YOU!!!We genuinely want parents to love spending time with their babies. This is what motivates our team.  We do this through the creation of innovative products and through being a brand that celebrates and appreciates parenthood. Internally, we call it ""working for new lives"".  You can join us in our mission by helping us reach more moms and dads through our crowdfunding campaign.-Team Lalabu",13.0,4,"5 Campaigns

column5: > is the heart of the city and metaphorical bridge across cultures. Since its foundation Venice has been a place for exchange and cultural growth through different traditions meeting in a single space.

column1: The Gondola is, perhaps, the most known symbol of Venice: everything happens around water. The Ferro da Prua, captured in Josa’s bracelet, is traditionally placed on top of gondolas and it represents every part of Venice (its six ""sestieri"", Piazza San Marco, The Grand Canal, and the doge's hat). Thousands of years of history enclosed in one immortal sign.

Palazzo Ducale is the most impressive symbol of Venice: a lagoon facing palace, home of the Doge (Venice’s leader) and of all its most influential governing bodies. Tintoretto, Veronese and all the most influential painters of Venetians‘ history filled its walls. Josa‘s flower is carved on the Palazzo Ducale façade.
Venice is home of endless traditions and priceless works of art that witness the grandiosity of a millenial civilization.

This amazing culture was threatened by the exceptional high tide happened on the 13 th of November 2019, the highest in the last 50 years.
During the night, 187 cm of water submerged the city streets and a 100 km/h sirocco wind pushed boats and water busses over the pier limit. The following week water was consistently higher than average, aggravating the already dramatic situation.

Many works of art, as well as some of the city's most iconic landmarks, were hit by this terrible event. San Marco cathedral's works of art suffered substantial damages (the crypt was completely underwater and risked collapsing), as well as many other well known cultural spots.
We believe in the importance of protecting Venice's artistic heritage - that's why for every Josa bracelet sold, we'll donate a portion of the proceeds to Save Venice's Immediate Response Fund.

At Josa, we believe in speaking through our products and our designs. The way they look, the way they feel - we are commited to achieve the highest quality still keeping our products accessible and democratic.

We are Venice-based and we love our city: and we transformed this into a social commitment. We source locally and we decided to partner with Save Venice, so that the city can benefit from every item we sell.
Josa has been created by the team behind Feelin' Venice and it has been designed by a Venice-native designer, Marco Rumor and a Venice-based practice, F_Z Architecture Design.

Feelin' Venice is a Venice-based brand which manufactures and sells products designed by local, emerging artists. It's currently present with two stores in Venice's city center: Strada Nova and Calle della Mandola.

column3: >Josa benefits Save Venice: a leading American nonprofit organization dedicated to preserving the artistic heritage of Venice, operating since 1971.

column2:
>Did you like Josa? Support us and talk about Josa!
Check out our Press Kit and our Social Media Kit","Josa, Inspired by Venice

column1: JOSA is a new design brand inspired by the beauties of Venice and entirely designed and made in its home city and in the surrounding area, the Veneto region.
Josa‘s collection celebrates the cities‘ past and its present
The bracelet is available in three different variants, in four different platings, including gold and rosè gold.

By pre-ordering your Josa Bracelet, you are supporting a local designers‘ project and, at the same time,  giving important help to one of the most beautiful cities in the world, particularly affected by the exceptional High Tide that happened in November 2019.
Part of the proceeds will be donated to Save Venice's Immediate Response Fund.

Save Venice is the leading American nonprofit organization dedicated to preserving the artistic heritage of Venice, Italy. Since 1971, Save Venice has worked tirelessly to preserve, protect, and promote the art and culture of Venice and has funded the conservation of more than 550 projects comprising over 1,000 individual artworks. As a Venice-based start-up, we are proud of our alliance with Save Venice and we are thankful for their incredible efforts to protect Venice's treasures!If you want to learn more about Save Venice, check out their website.

Josa is available in 3 different designs (Gondola, Rialto, Ducale) and in 4 different platings: Rosè Gold, Gold 18K, Silver and Ruthenium. Don't worry, there is no need to choose now: we'll email you to choose yours later, before shipping your perk!
We need your help to make it happen
The amount we'll raise will fund the first production of Josa's bracelet and a percentage will be donated to Save Venice's Immediate Response Fund.
As a Thank You for supporting Josa since its very first days you'll get Josa's bracelets at an exclusive Launch Offer discount and you'll get, for FREE the Josa Tote Bag!
Josa's Design are all about Venice

Rialto Bridge is the heart of the city and metaphorical bridge across cultures. Since its foundation Venice has been a place for exchange and cultural growth through different traditions meeting in a single space.

The Gondola is, perhaps, the most known symbol of Venice: everything happens around water. The Ferro da Prua, captured in Josa’s bracelet, is traditionally placed on top of gondolas and it represents every part of Venice (its six ""sestieri"", Piazza San Marco, The Grand Canal, and the doge's hat). Thousands of years of history enclosed in one immortal sign.

Palazzo Ducale is the most impressive symbol of Venice: a lagoon facing palace, home of the Doge (Venice’s leader) and of all its most influential governing bodies. Tintoretto, Veronese and all the most influential painters of Venetians‘ history filled its walls. Josa‘s flower is carved on the Palazzo Ducale façade.
Why does Venice need my help?
Venice is home of endless traditions and priceless works of art that witness the grandiosity of a millenial civilization.

This amazing culture was threatened by the exceptional high tide happened on the 13 th of November 2019, the highest in the last 50 years.During the night, 187 cm of water submerged the city streets and a 100 km/h sirocco wind pushed boats and water busses over the pier limit. The following week water was consistently higher than average, aggravating the already dramatic situation.

Many works of art, as well as some of the city's most iconic landmarks, were hit by this terrible event. San Marco cathedral's works of art suffered substantial damages (the crypt was completely underwater and risked collapsing), as well as many other well known cultural spots.
We believe in the importance of protecting Venice's artistic heritage - that's why for every Josa bracelet sold, we'll donate a portion of the proceeds to Save Venice's Immediate Response Fund.

At Josa, we believe in speaking through our products and our designs. The way they look, the way they feel - we are commited to achieve the highest quality still keeping our products accessible and democratic.

We are Venice-based and we love our city: and we transformed this into a social commitment. We source locally and we decided to partner with Save Venice, so that the city can benefit from every item we sell.
Josa has been created by the team behind Feelin' Venice and it has been designed by a Venice-native designer, Marco Rumor and a Venice-based practice, F_Z Architecture Design.

Feelin' Venice is a Venice-based brand which manufactures and sells products designed by local, emerging artists. It's currently present with two stores in Venice's city center: Strada Nova and Calle della Mandola.
Josa benefits Save Venice: a leading American nonprofit organization dedicated to preserving the artistic heritage of Venice, operating since 1971.
Did you like Josa? Support us and talk about Josa!Check out our Press Kit and our Social Media Kit",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

How is it possible that golf gloves have not changed since their first appearance in the 1800s? — the same leather and the same design pattern. 

Disappointed by the uncomfortable and poor performing gloves in the market, we set ourselves on a mission to revolutionize the golf handwear by creating better synergy between the hand and the club.

 

Thanks to the input of hundreds of golfers around the world, and 2 years of research and development, we are thrilled to present our first revolutionary glove combining all the features of comfort and performance in one.
column10:
version=v2.12"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

 

 

 

Differences that make all the difference. We listened to your needs and we delivered! 

 

For starters, we got rid of the inconvenient Velcro strap and replaced it with our patent-pending EziFit™ technology.  The 360° compression mechanism provides better tactility and second-skin comfort, while the double spandex splits make putting on and removing the glove a breeze.

 

Lightweight and breathable materials ensure dryer hands for a more comfortable and enjoyable experience all day long.  In fact, FALKO Airlite is infinitely more breathable than traditional cabretta leather golf gloves.
column14:
> 

ActiGrip™ technology is a unique leather embossing pattern reducing the effort required for a firm grip in dry as well as wet conditions.
column16:
>

Based on our tests, FALKO Airlite requires half the force compared to traditional golf glove made of standard cabretta leather.

 

 

We replaced the traditional cabretta leather with a more robust buffalo leather on the palm which is 2x times more resilient than cabretta of the same thickness.
column17:
>

 
 

The touchscreen hotspot on the thumb allows you to use your phone conveniently while keeping gloves on.

 

Unlike large sportswear brands with complex infrastructure and high overheads, FALKO gloves are brought to you directly from our trusted manufacturer cutting the middleman, which means you get a higher quality product at a better value for money.

 

While we enjoy playing glove, we find a similar joy by giving to the more needy. In association with the homeless centers in Europe and the USA, we donate a pair of cold-isolating gloves with every purchase of a FALKO glove.
column26:
version=v2.12"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

 

 

 

 

To get the best experience out of your glove, it's important that you select the right size. That's why we made a simple-to-use guide to help you find your perfect glove size using a printer or a measuring tape.  Refer to the FALKO Glove Size Guide here:

 



Thanks to the funds raised outside Indiegogo, we have already placed our order with our trusted manufacturer and initiated sourcing the raw materials.  

 




 

Match Your Style!
column35: version=v2.12"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">
column36:
>

A big thank you to Steve Furlonger, a professional golf instructor, for reviewing our glove. Check out his website or his YouTube channel for more golf tips and reviews.
column37: >“The removal of a scratch makes it much easier to take off and put on the glove as often as I do for putting.”
column38: >“Regardless of the weather, I always had a good grip / contact with the golf club. I can highly recommend the FALKO golf glove to all levels of players looking for optimum grip in all kinds of weather.”
column39: >“Feels like you are not wearing a glove”
column40:
>“Finally, a durable glove with a fresh design and cool look. FALKO will be a game changer!”

 

 

 

International Shipping

We will be dispatching all our products internationally from Belgium and by default, backers in EU countries will receive their shipment without going through customs as part of the EU Free Trade Agreement. Which means they will not be subject to any additional import/customs duty, sales tax, VAT, etc.

For backers from all other countries (Rest of the world), we will be declaring the packages as 'samples' with zero value, however, depending on import policies of the respective countries there might be potentially additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

 

Risks and challenges

We have been working hard to refine the design, production process and logistics behind FALKO Airlite. Sourcing the raw material is a crucial component, and we are proud to work with our trusted manufacturer that uses high-quality materials. Each glove is handmade by working with several years of experience. In order to ensure consistency, we have implemented a strict quality control protocol to make sure that each glove meets our design and quality standards. We are aware of the challenges that come with a product very dependant on natural raw materials and made in a manual production process. As such we have estimated conservative timelines to make sure that we provide you with a realistic forecast for delivery times. Unforeseen circumstances could arise, and if they do, we are committed to finding the quickest resolution and providing you with updates along the way.

column1: Here's what others have to say about us:

The Superellipse is a premium automatic watch at an accessible price point. Its unique and unorthodox design is highly provocative and is destined to polarize opinions. Its name is inspired by the superellipse curve, which is the mathematical representation of the iconic cushion shape.
• 41 mm wide, 11.9 mm thick, 50 mm lug-to-lug.
• Custom decorative screw heads for bezel and caseback.
• Super-Luminova C1 on minute and hour hands.
Many watchmakers compromise their design to match available stock components in order to minimize cost and maximize profit.

We know exactly what we want the watch to look like, and we make no compromise. Except for the movement, we have designed and customized every single component in Superellipse to ensure that you will get a truly unique watch.

With deep experience in the advanced manufacturing industry, we uphold high engineering standards when it comes to the engineering of the Superellipse. Every component is modelled on computer, so that our manufacturers know exactly what we want and we know exactly what you are getting.

The heart of the Superellipse is the Seiko NH35A movement. At a fraction of the cost of a Swiss movement, the Seiko NH35A delivers incredible value and durability. With a reliable workhorse powering every tick, the Superellipse will be your trusted companion for many years to come.
• 21,600 vibrations per hour (6 ticks per second).

As mechanical engineers, we make no secret of our love for screws, bolts and nuts. Therefore, rather than pressed-down, the bezel and the caseback are screwed-down to the main body with four screws each. The screws, which have customised screw heads that are beautifully polished, also double as ornamental adornments to the four corners of the bezel and the caseback.

The Superellipse dial features the ‘railway’ minute track, a classic design element. To produce a combination of two colours, the minute track is pad-printed in a 2-step process. This is an extremely precise process that requires perfect alignment of the two prints. When done properly, the result is an exquisite marriage of two colours. The same 2-step process is also applied for pad-printing of the Jubileon logo on the dial.
The hands and applied indices are both painted with Super-Luminova C1, ensuring that you will never miss its ultra-bright luminescence in the dark.

We have successfully struck a partnership with Hadley-Roma to supply premium, custom straps of the finest quality for the Superellipse. Hadley-Roma has been manufacturing and distributing quality watch attachments for more than 100 years.
At Jubileon, we have carefully curated and paired the following style combinations.
Errata: Leather black shown above is with silver dial, rather than pearl. Correct photo is shown below.
For international backers, please note that your pledge is not inclusive of duties that may be charged by your respective countries.

Jubileon is an independent and aspiring watchmaker in sunny Singapore. We are a team of 3 who are crazy about automatic watches. Needless to say, we only design and create watches that we ourselves would be proud to wear.

WHY THE NEED?

When I had my son almost 3 years ago, I found it daunting - not only to become a parent but trying to leave the house. To be fair, I had been pre-warned, ""it will take you 30 min to get out the door"". It did, and I often found myself desperately looking for a bathroom where I could change my son under sanitary conditions. How hard could it be, and why was it my son always managed to get dirty the piece of clothes that I had forgotten?

During my maternity, I found myself with 3 if not 4 different bags of shapes and sizes trying to fit both a place to change my son, a bag for food/drinks and a bag for my belongings, while trying to juggle a child and a Stroller. 

Simultaneously my husband found it less appealing to have to walk with what looked like a women's bag, and the number of times he had my wallet and phone (because they were buried in one of the many bags) are countless. 

I've spent the past 2 years designing the ""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER bag, hoping that I can make life easier not only for me (second time around) but also for many other parents around the world.

""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER Bag - available in 3 amazing colors, Burgundy - Army Green &
column2:
Black.

FROM BIRTH TO TODDLER

The ""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER Bag comes with great adaptability and flexibility. Making it ideal for newborns as well as Toddlers. You receive the following pieces when purchasing one bag:

1 x Changing Station Bag

1 x Stroller Bag

1 x Clutch

1 x Dummy Holder

1 x Organic Removable Mat

1 x Cross Body Strap

2 x Stroller Velcro Straps

1 x Tote Bag

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

With a newborn, you want to ensure you keep your child safe from harm on all fronts. Having a sanitary changing place no matter where you go is one of them. With the main Changing Station Bag, you know no matter where you go (even if there is no changing table) - you'll be able to change your child under the most sanitary conditions - just like home. We have created a soft organic mat, which can easily be removed and washed (via velcro strips on the back) - or folded away if needed. 

The Stroller Bag supports parents by clicking on to the Stroller handlebars via the Velcro Straps (and easy off), ensuring fast and easy access to phone, drinks, wipes and a dummy while on tour with your child.     

 

By 6 months your baby is not only on formula/breast, but also in need of further calories from food.  At this stage, you need both a place to change your child and a bag for all the snacks and drinks you need to bring on an excursion. 

Here the stroller bags adaptability comes in handy. Simply leave the Stroller Velcro Strips on the handlebars, take the Stroller Bag inside with you and fill with Food/Drinks &
column3:
Snacks as needed. You can then either add the Cross Body strap to the Stroller Bag, or re-attach it to your Stroller Velcro clips depending on your needs. 

""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER Bag, fits all components
column4:
Stroller Bag, Removable Changing Mat, Velcro Strips, Dummy holder, Clutch for full flexibility as your child grows.

As your child grows and becomes more independent, your need for backup clothes, food, drinks, etc., becomes less apparent. Your child starts being able to eat ""normal"" foods, less drool, and more regular/frequent bathroom breaks. 

 

At this stage, we recommend transferring the Clutch with parents essentials to the front of the Stroller Bag and add the folded Organic Removable mat inside. With less need for backup clothes and a floor being a safer place to change an ever moving Toddler, you can safely fold away your large changing station for longer/weekend excursions, and transform the Stroller Bag to your everyday bag. 

All in all, the THORSBRENNER Bag allows for full flexibility throughout your child's diaper time.

FUNCTIONAL SCANDINAVIAN DESIGN 

The Design is simplistic and unisex. We don't think Baby products necessarily need to be baby pink or blue. Therefore our Bag comes in Black, Army Green or Burgundy Red. 

EASY NAVIGATION ICONS

We have inserted icons, that not only make it easier to find what you are looking for, but also function as a check-list at home of what to remember to bring when you go out.

 

DUMMY HOLDER

It's always a debated topic whether to give your child a dummy or not. However, to those who choose to give a dummy (or those children who accept a dummy), it's essential to ensure you always have one with you. 

Finding the right dummy can be tough to start with, ensuring it's always clean and within reach is another. The THORSBRENNER Dummy holder easily clips on to both Changing Station, Stroller Bag or even Stroller Velcro Strips or Clutch, ensuring it's always within easy sanitary reach. 

","WHY THE NEED?When I had my son almost 3 years ago, I found it daunting - not only to become a parent but trying to leave the house. To be fair, I had been pre-warned, ""it will take you 30 min to get out the door"". It did, and I often found myself desperately looking for a bathroom where I could change my son under sanitary conditions. How hard could it be, and why was it my son always managed to get dirty the piece of clothes that I had forgotten?During my maternity, I found myself with 3 if not 4 different bags of shapes and sizes trying to fit both a place to change my son, a bag for food/drinks and a bag for my belongings, while trying to juggle a child and a Stroller. Simultaneously my husband found it less appealing to have to walk with what looked like a women's bag, and the number of times he had my wallet and phone (because they were buried in one of the many bags) are countless. I've spent the past 2 years designing the ""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER bag, hoping that I can make life easier not only for me (second time around) but also for many other parents around the world.""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER Bag - available in 3 amazing colors, Burgundy - Army Green & Black.FROM BIRTH TO TODDLERThe ""All-In-One"" THORSBRENNER Bag comes with great adaptability and flexibility.
