column1: We're Aerios. A small tech design start-up from Sydney
Australia, and we'd like you to join us on our journey.
A journey to rid your space of the cheap,
plastic rubbish, and to fill it with nice pieces designed to make a statement,
designed to look beautiful and to be functional alongside those gadgets you use
daily and adore. We don’t want to clutter our homes and offices with cheap, and
Take a look around your desk at work, or around your home.
You try to surround yourself with nice things, things that say something about
you. You want to show them off, and you want people to find them just as
pleasing as you do... and that's the same for your gadgets. We buy gadgets that
matter, that make a statement about you, that make you look at them and admire
the millions (billions?) of dollars in R&
column2: D to make those things pretty..

column1: Now look at the accessories those gadgets are sold
INTRODUCING THE MODUUL LG G WATCH CHARGING DOCK
The Moduul is an accessory for an accessory.
Wait, what? An accessory for an accessory?
Yep, you know that little brick of plastic you got with your
shiny New G Watch? How disappointing... the watch sits on this brick, flat on
the table. Offers no real function while the watch is charging. It. Just. Sits
The Moduul uses the G Watch charger brick to turn something
plastic, into something gorgeous, and a lot more functional.

column2: >The charging brick fits snugly inside the Moduul so you can be assured it won't move around, or come out when you remove your G Watch from the stand.

column1: The Moduul is made with premium materials. The dock combines an anodised aluminium stand in either Silver or Black premium finish, and Walnut timber to compliment the black aluminium or Oak to compliment the silver.
We've also added a micro suction pad on the underside of the Moduul, so it doesn't move around as you use the watch while docked.
Check out our campaign video to see the Moduul and suction pad in action.
I WANT A MODUUL, LET'S MAKE THIS HAPPEN
testing and have already funded a limited production run for our beta testers.
We only need $1,600AUD to tool up the larger machines. But instead
of going to the bank, we’d prefer to give you a Moduul through IndieGoGo.
We’re paying for the materials in this first mass production
run. Depending on the demand, these funds towards tooling will allow us to
meet the demand (big or small) of retailers and consumers. Because we use the
highest quality materials, and personally finish and inspect each Moduul in
Sydney we need help from backers to fund the tools.
Check out our Perks below: you can pledge using the pledge buttons in this campaign.

Below is a rundown of the project timeline so far, and our projection for the next few months. We've added two deviations based on the IndieGoGo campaign. Basically, if we are successfully funded, the docks will be delivered a month earlier because we can start the manufacturing straight away (thanks to you!).
As we progress through the timeline, we'll post new updates to our backers to show images of the Moduul's status.
WHAT IF YOU DON'T REACH THE GOAL?
Don’t worry, we’ll beg, borrow and steal (well not steal)
funds to get the production run happening and the Moduul into your hands.
reach our goal or not, You will get your Moduul before Christmas <i>(probably

testing and have Moduuls being used by our testers around Sydney. We’re

we're a little disconnected from the rest of the world so shipping is generally
higher to get items in your hands.
We’re working closely with our logistics partners (FedEx, Toll, AusPost and
FastWay) to get these costs down as much as possible. As these costs come down,

Even if you’re not going to support us on this campaign,

pieces coming soon. (backers will receive a few sneak peaks of what's coming in the update section)
For now, please share this campaign with as many people as
you can to help spread the word, follow Aerios on Twitter for updates, sign up
to our newsletter through our website for early tips on new Aerios projects.

THEMED HELMETS?  IT'S ABOUT FREAKING TIME!

It's time to bring the 100-year-old motorcycle helmet design into the 21st Century.  With high-pressure injected molding, exotic materials and high-tech components, we'll transform uncomfortable, bland plastic shells into radically Wild, themed-based smart helmets and suits that will capture the world's imagination.

In addition to our original, archetypical themes, we'll also secure blue chip licensing partners to ensure the growth and success of the company... providing you a galaxy of endless choices of some of the most beloved, iconic characters in pop culture history.  And our vision is to expand our patented designs to other sports and age groups -- e.g. cycling, skate &

There are several ""Smart"" helmets currently on the market.  How is yours different from theirs?
Our vision and emphasis has ALWAYS been about iconic designs.  Our patent proves that.  We believe that having a realistic Demon Skull helmet &
column2: suit or an infamous movie villain helmet &amp
column3: suit with 3D contours, shapes, and textures that's DOT/ECE approved would be more popular than anything the market has ever produced.  With or without ""smart"" components like Bluetooth and HUDs.  We will, of course, offer BOTH options in our ever expanding product line for those who wish to have the ""Ultimate 21st Century Riding Gear.""

column1: So you're saying you'll offer Themed helmets without the ""Smart"" component then?

Yes.  Six are currently being offered at the same, low introductory price of $750.  Our chief goal, at Wild Helmets, is to provide you with every conceivable choice that we can possibly think of.  Whether having smart components or not, to bejeweled helmets and/or suits, LED covered helmets (w/different or same color lights) and fiber optic laced suits to show off on night rides, licensed gear and so on... etc., etc.  But we can't possibly think of everything so if we missed something rad, please chime in.  If we use your suggestion(s), you could qualify for royalties for the duration of the product's run!  We want and need your input.  Good or bad.  We welcome it.  After all, we're a community of kickass personalities.  From the 1%ers to the tutu wearing moped cuties.  Brothers &
column2: sisters alike.  All we ask is not to be offensive.  We won't tolerate that.

column1: All new products when launched are expensive.  Especially if
they're revolutionary.  The costs of Research &amp

column2: D) are considerably higher when your product(s) push the

column1: envelope and challenge the status quo.  The perfect example is Apple Computers and their product line.  New methods and materials might have to be employed to guarantee safety without losing our design aesthetics.  Not to mention other ancillary costs such as hiring top notch engineers, conceptual designers, manufacturing facilities for both helmets and suits, creating multiple helmet molds and prototypes of our six helmets for testing.  Once our brand goes mainstream and catches on, we'll produce in bulk... which in turn will lower the unit costs for everyone considered.
What are the horns of your helmets made out of?  And how are they fastened to the helmet?

The horns will be made out of hard, painted rubber and will break away for safety in case of a fall.  They're fastened with pre-sunk 3/8"" screws on the base of each horn and will be screwed in flush into a the helmet's tapped holes.  In the near future, you'll be able to choose different horn sizes, shapes and colors by going onto our website and creating your own unique vision - designing a ""one off"" that'll surely turn heads.

Do you really believe ""The Big Boys"" will grant you their licensing rights to their iconic properties and trademarks?

It might take some convincing but we're confident that they will.  Much will depend on you, our soon-to-be loyal fan base, and how quickly you can turn our brand into a phenomenon.  If they see that we're the new ""it"" company, we're positive they'll immediately partner up with us to bring you your favorite pop culture characters and beyond.  We can't wait to see all of you out there in different gear.  Regardless of whomever your favorite team or character is!  And as previously stated, this gear will also be available for other sports too!  Like junior BMX-ers for example.
How soon can we expect to have licensed gear?

Again, this will solely depend on you.  If you show them your enthusiasm by buying our products in record numbers, they'll see there's a huge market there and it could happen in short order.  We could theoretically launch our licensed branch division simultaneously to our original concept line.  So 2015 if all goes well.
How big will your helmets be compared to the standard helmets currently on the market?

Some of our helmets, like the Demon Skull, will be slightly larger due to thicker layers needed for safety and design aesthetics but should fall between the 4-5 lbs range.  So not much heavier than what's currently out there now.

Yes.  Click our ""Junior's"" perks and place an order, specifying size(s).  We can't wait to see their over-the-top reactions when they open up their gift boxes and find their gear inside.  We hope you, mom or dad, will send us a picture or video of that precious moment so we may post it on our site.
Are you planning on producing other themed helmets for Cruisers and Dirt Bikes?  If so, when?
Yes.  We're currently designing several wicked models (and suits), so standby.  It won't be long and you won't be disappointed.  We promise!
Will you do any Beta Testing?  And if so, how can I become a tester?
We're currently on the fence on that one.  If we do decide on testing, we'll post our criteria on our ""wild-helmets.com"" website, Facebook (wildhelmets) &
column2: Tumblr (wildhelmets.tumblr.com) pages.  So standby hopefuls and make sure to like us on FB and follow us on Tumblr.  You just might get your shot at a free helmet.

column1: Will you offer sponsorships?  And if so, how can I get sponsored by you?
Yes and it'll depend on you.  Like &
column2: Follow us on our various media pages (FB, Tumblr and our site) and send us a letter, include ur pix, telling us who you are and why you believe we should sponsor you.  It'll be a BIG plus if you're an organized competitive racer...regardless if you're a tyke in training wheels or a Semi-Pro.  Our only criteria is that you're a rebel at heart.  Fearless, brave, and always striving for excellence.  Someone who'll do our brand justice.  Someone who always wants to win in the right way and makes it happen.

column1: When can we expect Themed Helmets for other sports like cycling, skate &
so standby.  It won't be long and you won't be disappointed.  We
Is riding visibility diminished due to your ""eye socket"" helmet design?
No.  They are other helmets and goggles currently on the market that utilize the eye-socket design.  If fact, motorcyclists have been using goggles before helmets were invented.
Can I choose my own paint schemes and/or patterns?

Yes, once we've expanded our site, you'll be able to choose to your heart's content.   While you're there, select from a galaxy of accessories like different shaped fangs, horns, bejeweling, full covered LED helmets, color or even prescription colored lens, etc.

Since childhood, Max has been a motorcycle and auto enthusiast. Part of this
obsession involved tinkering with everything
column2:
he always liked to take things apart to
figure out how they worked, and soon developed into a true gearhead. He was raised in the restaurant industry, learning every aspect of the business as part-owner of his family’s establishment. Max eventually set off on his own, worked his way up to restaurant General Manager and oversaw as many as 150 employees in a space that generated nearly $10 million in revenue annually. Now branching out into an exciting new industry, Max has focused his creativity and inventiveness to conceptualize radical, wild designs that will ignite consumers’ imagination and passion.  His concepts are a perfect blend of form and function, melding the latest technology with never-before-seen, visionary designs. As Apple has been to the computer industry, so Max hopes to be in the riding gear trade.

Our vision and emphasis has ALWAYS been about iconic designs.  Our patent proves that.  We believe that having a realistic Demon Skull helmet & suit or an infamous movie villain helmet & suit with 3D contours, shapes, and textures that's DOT/ECE approved would be more popular than anything the market has ever produced.  With or without ""smart"" components like Bluetooth and HUDs.  We will, of course, offer BOTH options in our ever expanding product line for those who wish to have the ""Ultimate 21st Century Riding Gear.""
So you're saying you'll offer Themed helmets without the ""Smart"" component then?

Yes.  Six are currently being offered at the same, low introductory price of $750.  Our chief goal, at Wild Helmets, is to provide you with every conceivable choice that we can possibly think of.  Whether having smart components or not, to bejeweled helmets and/or suits, LED covered helmets (w/different or same color lights) and fiber optic laced suits to show off on night rides, licensed gear and so on... etc., etc.  But we can't possibly think of everything so if we missed something rad, please chime in.  If we use your suggestion(s), you could qualify for royalties for the duration of the product's run!  We want and need your input.  Good or bad.  We welcome it.  After all, we're a community of kickass personalities.  From the 1%ers to the tutu wearing moped cuties.  Brothers & sisters alike.  All we ask is not to be offensive.  We won't tolerate that.
Why are your helmets so expensive?
All new products when launched are expensive.  Especially if
they're revolutionary.  The costs of Research & Development
(R&D) are considerably higher when your product(s) push the

envelope and challenge the status quo.  The perfect example is Apple Computers and their product line.  New methods and materials might have to be employed to guarantee safety without losing our design aesthetics.  Not to mention other ancillary costs such as hiring top notch engineers, conceptual designers, manufacturing facilities for both helmets and suits, creating multiple helmet molds and prototypes of our six helmets for testing.  Once our brand goes mainstream and catches on, we'll produce in bulk... which in turn will lower the unit costs for everyone considered.
What are the horns of your helmets made out of?  And how are they fastened to the helmet?

The horns will be made out of hard, painted rubber and will break away for safety in case of a fall.  They're fastened with pre-sunk 3/8"" screws on the base of each horn and will be screwed in flush into a the helmet's tapped holes.  In the near future, you'll be able to choose different horn sizes, shapes and colors by going onto our website and creating your own unique vision - designing a ""one off"" that'll surely turn heads.

Do you really believe ""The Big Boys"" will grant you their licensing rights to their iconic properties and trademarks? It might take some convincing but we're confident that they will.  Much will depend on you, our soon-to-be loyal fan base, and how quickly you can turn our brand into a phenomenon.  If they see that we're the new ""it"" company, we're positive they'll immediately partner up with us to bring you your favorite pop culture characters and beyond.  We can't wait to see all of you out there in different gear.  Regardless of whomever your favorite team or character is!  And as previously stated, this gear will also be available for other sports too!  Like junior BMX-ers for example.
How soon can we expect to have licensed gear?

Again, this will solely depend on you.  If you show them your enthusiasm by buying our products in record numbers, they'll see there's a huge market there and it could happen in short order.  We could theoretically launch our licensed branch division simultaneously to our original concept line.  So 2015 if all goes well.
How big will your helmets be compared to the standard helmets currently on the market?

Some of our helmets, like the Demon Skull, will be slightly larger due to thicker layers needed for safety and design aesthetics but should fall between the 4-5 lbs range.  So not much heavier than what's currently out there now.
Will you make helmets & suits for kids?

Yes.  Click our ""Junior's"" perks and place an order, specifying size(s).  We can't wait to see their over-the-top reactions when they open up their gift boxes and find their gear inside.  We hope you, mom or dad, will send us a picture or video of that precious moment so we may post it on our site.
Are you planning on producing other themed helmets for Cruisers and Dirt Bikes?  If so, when?
Yes.  We're currently designing several wicked models (and suits), so standby.  It won't be long and you won't be disappointed.  We promise!
Will you do any Beta Testing?  And if so, how can I become a tester?

We're currently on the fence on that one.  If we do decide on testing, we'll post our criteria on our ""wild-helmets.com"" website, Facebook (wildhelmets) & Tumblr (wildhelmets.tumblr.com) pages.  So standby hopefuls and make sure to like us on FB and follow us on Tumblr.  You just might get your shot at a free helmet.
Will you offer sponsorships?  And if so, how can I get sponsored by you?

Yes and it'll depend on you.  Like & Follow us on our various media pages (FB, Tumblr and our site) and send us a letter, include ur pix, telling us who you are and why you believe we should sponsor you.  It'll be a BIG plus if you're an organized competitive racer...regardless if you're a tyke in training wheels or a Semi-Pro.  Our only criteria is that you're a rebel at heart.  Fearless, brave, and always striving for excellence.  Someone who'll do our brand justice.  Someone who always wants to win in the right way and makes it happen.
When can we expect Themed Helmets for other sports like cycling, skate & snowboarding, etc.?
We're currently designing several cool models,
so standby.  It won't be long and you won't be disappointed.  We
Is riding visibility diminished due to your ""eye socket"" helmet design?
No.  They are other helmets and goggles currently on the market that utilize the eye-socket design.  If fact, motorcyclists have been using goggles before helmets were invented.
Can I choose my own paint schemes and/or patterns?

Yes, once we've expanded our site, you'll be able to choose to your heart's content.   While you're there, select from a galaxy of accessories like different shaped fangs, horns, bejeweling, full covered LED helmets, color or even prescription colored lens, etc.
Since childhood, Max has been a motorcycle and auto enthusiast. Part of thisobsession involved tinkering with everything
column2: he always liked to take things apart tofigure out how they worked, and soon developed into a true gearhead. He was raised in the restaurant industry, learning every aspect of the business as part-owner of his family’s establishment. Max eventually set off on his own, worked his way up to restaurant General Manager and oversaw as many as 150 employees in a space that generated nearly $10 million in revenue annually. Now branching out into an exciting new industry, Max has focused his creativity and inventiveness to conceptualize radical, wild designs that will ignite consumers’ imagination and passion.  His concepts are a perfect blend of form and function, melding the latest technology with never-before-seen, visionary designs. As Apple has been to the computer industry, so Max hopes to be in the riding gear trade.",28.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1:
0,"

In Summation

My name is Evan Clayton and I'm a fashion designer based out of Vancouver, British Columbia. In 2011 I graduated from the Blanche MacDonald Center's Fashion Design program, and since then I've gone on to show 3 collections at Vancouver Fashion Week. My last Fall collection ""JENOVA"" has garnered press attention from the likes of the British editions of Vogue and Glamour, as well as making me the first recipient of the Nancy Mak Award. This incredible honor allows me the opportunity to showcase my Spring 2015 collection at MQ Vienna Fashion Week in Vienna, Austria. The magnitude of this opportunity is not lost on me, and I am working extremely hard towards my goal of becoming a presence on the international fashion stage.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get
In order to make this happen I'm looking to raise $4000. This will cover costs such as:

column1: • Airfare to and from Vancouver and Vienna.
• Fabrics to produce the collection, including trims such as buttons, zippers, thread etc.

In return for your generous contribution, I've put together a perk list ranging from a social media shout-out to a custom gown!

The Impact

Your contribution will help support local designers here in Vancouver and help show the global fashion community that the Canadian market is full of talent. I don't like to just show clothing, I like to immerse the ""Evan Clayton"" client in a wondrous world without limits in self expression. It's that kind of positive energy that I want to see more of in the world, and the opportunity to bring that energy to an audience on a global scale is something that I'm truly passionate about.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word! Feel free to share my campaign to your family, friends and colleagues.

We have a new website! Please go to EvieBlender.com

    _______________________________

The Evie Blender ™ Difference
• Doesn't absorb makeup like a blender made from foam, so you use less product and save money.
• Washes off quickly with warm water and soap, rubbing alcohol or just a makeup wipe.
• No more makeup stains stuck on your blender no matter how many times you wash it!
• Textured surface applies makeup just like a traditional sponge blender providing a perfect blended finish.
• Lasts for over a year with proper care.
• Doesn't hold on to makeup residue, which can harbor bacteria and cause breakouts.
• Has a wider base for covering larger areas and a smaller pointed end to get under the eyes and in small areas.
• Eco-friendly compared to foam blenders and sponges. No more throwing sponges out every couple of months!

column2: >

column1: • Apply about half the amount of makeup you normally would use with a foam sponge. The Evie Blender™ is best for liquid, creams, or gel makeup. You can also use it with contour, highlight, or blush powders. You can even use it to apply lipstick. However, we don't recommend using it to apply all over face powders. If you use any primers, please allow your primer to soak in thoroughly.

• Blend the makeup onto your skin by first swiping the product where you want to apply it. Next, bounce Evie Blender™ onto the skin, with a bouncing or tapping motion, to blend for an airbrush quality finish.

• Wash your Evie Blender™ with a makeup remover wipe or warm soap and water. You can also wipe with rubbing alcohol to sanitize it. However, please don't let your Evie Blender™ soak in alcohol or she will get damaged.
• Dry with a cloth or air dry! That's it!

_______________________________

 

FAQ

  • How is it different from other silicone blenders?

The Evie Blender™ has a mix of different skin and pore textures, which gives it a matte look. This patent pending texture is key to giving your face an airbrush look, as they hold on to the product and deposit it evenly onto your skin. P.S. Don't forget to swipe and bounce the product to blend!

  • What is it made of?

The Evie Blender™ is made of hypoallergenic, non-toxic silicone. It's latex free and super durable!

  • What does it feel like?

Applying your makeup with the Evie Blender™ will feel just like skin! The texture applies product just like your fingers would, but without fingerprints or streaks. Swipe makeup on to apply then bounce it in to blend and you will have an airbrush finish.

  • How is it different from foam makeup sponges?

The Evie Blender™ won't absorb any of your makeup! No more losing expensive foundation in your sponges! It also lasts over a year, while the others are meant to be thrown away every 3-4 months. Even after cleaning, foam blenders can look stained, your Evie Blender™ will look brand new each time. You can also sanitize or disinfect your Evie Blender™!

  • How is it different from flat blenders?

The great thing about the Evie Blender's shape is that the round side will offer you broad coverage (cheeks, forehead, chin) while the pointed end allows you to get into the tighter areas on your face (under eyes and nose).

  • How long will it last?

With proper care, your Evie Blender™ will last a year or more!

  • That glitter looks scratchy. Will it hurt me?

No, the glitter is inside the blender with no edges sticking out. You won't get scratched, we promise! Our Evie Blender is soft as skin.

  • How do you clean your Evie Blender™?

Wash your Evie Blender™ with a makeup remover wipe or warm soap and water. You can also sanitize your blender by wiping her clean with rubbing alcohol. Just don't let your Evie Blender™ soak in alcohol or she will get damaged. Dry with a cloth or air dry! That's it!

  • If you need to thoroughly disinfect your Evie Blender, you can also boil it in water for 5-10 minutes.

Disclaimer: Please don't leave the boiling Evie Blender™ unattended, and use caution removing your Evie Blender™ from the pot, as it will be very hot and could cause burns. Remove carefully from the water with tongs or a ladle and place on a towel to dry and cool.

  • Are you affiliated with Silisponge, Beauty Blender, or another existing brand?

No, we are not affiliated with any existing brands. Evie Blender™ was invented by makeup and special FX artist, Angie Y. Johnson. She formed Evie Blender's parent company, Evolution Beauty, LLC, as a beauty tech company with a focus on innovation, social consciousness, and environmental stewardship.

                                  _______________________________

 

THE REVIEWS ARE IN!...

""The makeup sponge that is breaking the internet"" - Marie Claire

 

“Truth be told, after using the Evie Blender™ for a week, my chin zits totally cleared up.” - Elle Magazine (US)

 

Hello Giggles:
column2:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

                                                   

Doniella Davy, Makeup Dep't Head, Moonlight (Golden Globe winner, Best Picture):

""The Evie blender is a revolutionary and thrilling improvement to the popular egg-shaped sponge blenders. Here is why it rules: It's lightly-textured silicone material soaks up 0% of product and therefore doesn't waste a drop, and wipes or rinses clean. When I held this deliciously soft, squishy, and yet firm tool in my hand it felt like an extension of my fingers, which any professional makeup artist knows are really the best tools around for applying makeup! Applying foundation with The Evie Blender was a dream. The product really gets pressed firmly into the skin, making for a longer-lasting look""
column3:
>

                                         _______________________________                           


The Evie Blender™ did better than we ever imagined on Kickstarter, raising almost 300% of our original goal! So we want to pay the love forward!

We're extending pre-orders here to bring you additional products, limited edition colors, and also to raise funds to donate to a special cause. The Evie Blender™ team believes in supporting women!

5% OF ALL NET PROCEEDS RAISED, FROM BOTH THE KICKSTARTER &
column4: INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN, WILL BE DONATED TO THE WOMEN'S MARCH ON WASHINGTON &amp
column5:
WOMEN'S MARCH

                                        _______________________________  

Please follow us on Instagram/ Twitter/Facebook @evieblender

Step 1 - Watch the video.
Step 2 - Choose a perk to pre-order the jackets!
Step 3 - You will be emailed a survey on April 9th, where you will specify the style, color and size that you want, as well as providing us your shipping address.
Step 4 - Enjoy the summer! Your custome jackets will arrive before you know it!

Questions? We're happy to help. Email us!

Our original Adv3nture Hoodie campaign raised $2M in crowdfunding. Now we're back with four new jackets, with 23+ functions and innovations that make traveling easier. The Adv3nture Jackets fold up into full-sized travel pillow, have beverage holders, and other features that you'll wonder how you lived with out.

Here's what others have had to say about our products!
column2:
>

 

 

At Adv3nture, we pride ourselves on making on the BEST garments in the HIGHEST QUALITY. Our products are durable, and are built to make traveling and exploring more enjoyable. But they're so comfortable, you'll want to wear them every day. Indiegogo backers will enjoy discounted jackets + free shipping in the US + jackets before anyone else!
column3:
> 

When traveling, it's tough to be able to pick two or three jackets that will work in any weather you'll experience in your travels. That's why our garments work with each other. When you combine them, you get the benefits of both!
column7:
'>Our garments are meticulously designed and manufactured to ensure that they enhance your journey, whether you're traveling around the corner or around the world. We are dedicated to making premium garments that are durable and comfortable. Your Adv3nture Jackets are perfect for any season, and will be the perfect companion on your trip. But, they are destined to be your go-to jackets for every day use.

 

PILLOW CONVERSION
column8:
>

 

One of our coolest innovations is the pillow conversion. Adv3nture created the first hoodie/jacket to covert into pillows, and we are very excited about our new-and-improved pillow conversion.
column10:
showinfo=0"">

 

All of our hoodie and jackets convert into pillows in the same way-- with a microfleece-lined inside pocket, that turns into a microfleece pillow. Watch this video to see how easy it is to convert our Glacier Parka into a full-sized travel pillow. Imagine using your Adv3nture pillow on a flight, as a passenger in a car, or staring up at the stars! It's SO comfortable!

 

VOYAGEURS HOODIE
column12:
showinfo=0"">

 

Previously known by over 15,000 backers as the Adv3nture Hoodie, the new Voyageurs Hoodie still offers 23+ pockets and features along with our updated quality of fabric, overlock stitching, zippers, pillow conversion, and an updated beverage opener. The Voyageurs Hoodie is the world's most comfortable and versatile hoodie. It easily zips and secures into the Wind Cave Windbreaker and the Glacier Parka.

 

 

BADLANDS FLEECE
column14:
showinfo=0"">
 

Named for Badlands National Park, this is a sophisticated full-zip fleece jacket. With many of the same features of the Voyageurs Hoodie, it zips and secures into the Wind Cave Windbreaker and the Glacier Parka.

The Badlands Fleece offers you a stylish and functional option wherever where your plans take you. Strategically placed quilted patches offer abrasion resistance on shoulders for backpack straps, and elbow for commuting and working at your desk.

 

 

WIND CAVE WINDBREAKER
column16:
showinfo=0"">

 

The Wind Cave Windbreaker is a waterproof shell that had taped seams and waterproof zippers. Either of the inner layers zip and secure into the windbreaker, making it waterproof and warm.

 

 

GLACIER PARKA
column18:
showinfo=0"">
 

The Glacier Parka is a premium winter jacket with 10 pockets and a faux fur collar. It's perfect for winter hikes, walking around the city, and it's durable enough for hitting the slopes. With either of the base layers (Voyageurs Hoodie or Badlands Fleece) zipped in, it is rated to sub-zero temperatures.

 

THE OVER 23 FEATURES

 

Each of our inner and outer layers comes with a bevy of incredible features. The objective was to make something that performs great, where the innovations where seamlessly integrated into the garment, so it also looks great.
column19:
>

 

BOTTLE OPENER

All of our garments come with built-in ""emergency"" bottle openers. They are clipped into the passport pocket, but can also be clipped into the paracord in the side pockets.
column20:
>

 

WE PLANT THREE TREES

With every purchase of an Adv3nture product, we plant three trees. We have created a tree program whereby we plant three indigenous trees in areas of the US that have been affected by forest fires and deforestation. We work with arborists and environmental scientists to ensure that the trees that we're planting are the best for the location that we'll be planting. Every product backed in this campaign will have three trees planted in the US.
column21:
>

 

NATIONAL PARKS

We want to encourage people to get outside, and disconnect from the digital world so they can reconnect with the natural world. We're as passionate about the environment as we are with making the best possible products. So, we have named our garments after US National Parks. Our Voyageur (French for Traveler) Hoodie is named for the national park in northern Minnesota. The Badlands Fleece is in honor of one of South Dakota national parks. The Wind Cave Rainbreaker is named after one of the longest caves in the world, also located in South Dakota. The Glacier Parka is named for Montana's northern most national park where the temperature often dip far below zero.

 

THE A-(Adv3nture)TEAM!
column22:
>

 

ZANE LAMPREY is the founder of Adv3nture. He has spent more than a decade as the host of of travel shows on National Geographic Channel, Travel Channel &
column23: Food Network. He used his design degree to created original garments, beginning with the Drinking Jacket (a hoodie with various features) including the first beverage pocket and bottle opener zipper in 2012. Desiring to create the world’s best traveling companion, he released the Adv3nture Hoodie in 2016, which became the
column26:
page=1"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">most successful fashion Kickstarter ever. With the success of the Kickstarter, Zane formed Adv3nture, LLC and surrounded himself with talented people to help grow the Adv3nture brand.

While traveling the world, Zane saw things that solidified his concern for the world’s natural habitats. Living in California, among extreme droughts, monumental forest fires and occasional deluges of rain, Zane has also become acutely aware of detrimental environment conditions impacting communities. With a deep appreciation for nature and the environment, Zane devised a plan where the Adv3nture brand would produce premium quality garments while also bringing attention to the environment and giving back to the planet with a tree initiative. So, for every Adv3nture product sold, three trees will be planted.
column27:
>

 

MEL LAMPREY was a television producer on one of Zane’s television shows. This unexpected meeting allowed/forced them to travel extensively together throughout the world and to experience the goods and the bads that come with such an opportunity. Mel brought her passion for the outdoors, and for the endangered environment into this relationship. A long-time hiker, world traveler, and National Park lover (self-admitted, obsessive), their marriage combined their mutual enthusiasm for the natural world with their passion to create and inspire. The Adv3nture brand is the result of 8 years of travel and exploration experiences, and their desire to improve the planet’s health. Mel is committed to “fix our shit,” as she all too often, and somewhat inappropriately likes to say. Other passions include
column28: animals, indigenous and domestic rescue, food, and her twin sister.
column29:
>

 

ERICA ELSTRO is a Michigan native who was raised with a natural love for the outdoors and all seasons. After moving to LA, she began working in the apparel industry, specifically concentrating on products and garments known for exceptional quality and function
column30:
and with companies willing to give back to the Earth. The passion and skills she developed there led to a seamless transition towards the Adv3nture brand. Erica is a world traveler, always willing to explore the unknown, and seeking to fulfill her best life with her husband and family while giving back to her community. A secondary passion of hers is doughnuts, which she is no longer allowed to bring to the Adv3nture office, no matter how fancied up they are.

 

SIZE CHARTS

To best way to determine your sizing in Adv3nture apparel, we recommend laying your favorite hoodie, fleece or jacket on a table to compare the measurements with ours. This will help to ensure the best fit. Our inner layers (hoodie &
column31: parka) will zip into the outer layers (windbreaker &amp
column32: parka) of the same size. Below is a chart showing the measurements for our garments and an image to show how to take the same measurements on your garment.
column33:
>

 

TEMPERATURE RANGES

The Adv3nture Jacket System was designed to enable you to get a wide range of coverage from a minimal amount of apparel. So, when you are packing for a weekend getaway or a long voyage, you can pack light, and stay warm and dry.
column34:
>

 

","Step 1 - Watch the video.Step 2 - Choose a perk to pre-order the jackets!Step 3 - You will be emailed a survey on April 9th, where you will specify the style, color and size that you want, as well as providing us your shipping address.Step 4 - Enjoy the summer! Your custome jackets will arrive before you know it!Questions? We're happy to help. Email us!Our original Adv3nture Hoodie campaign raised $2M in crowdfunding. Now we're back with four new jackets, with 23+ functions and innovations that make traveling easier. The Adv3nture Jackets fold up into full-sized travel pillow, have beverage holders, and other features that you'll wonder how you lived with out.Here's what others have had to say about our products!   At Adv3nture, we pride ourselves on making on the BEST garments in the HIGHEST QUALITY. Our products are durable, and are built to make traveling and exploring more enjoyable. But they're so comfortable, you'll want to wear them every day. Indiegogo backers will enjoy discounted jackets + free shipping in the US + jackets before anyone else!  When traveling, it's tough to be able to pick two or three jackets that will work in any weather you'll experience in your travels. That's why our garments work with each other. When you combine them, you get the benefits of both!  Our garments are meticulously designed and manufactured to ensure that they enhance your journey, whether you're traveling around the corner or around the world. We are dedicated to making premium garments that are durable and comfortable. Your Adv3nture Jackets are perfect for any season, and will be the perfect companion on your trip. But, they are destined to be your go-to jackets for every day use. PILLOW CONVERSION One of our coolest innovations is the pillow conversion. Adv3nture created the first hoodie/jacket to covert into pillows, and we are very excited about our new-and-improved pillow conversion.  All of our hoodie and jackets convert into pillows in the same way-- with a microfleece-lined inside pocket, that turns into a microfleece pillow. Watch this video to see how easy it is to convert our Glacier Parka into a full-sized travel pillow. Imagine using your Adv3nture pillow on a flight, as a passenger in a car, or staring up at the stars! It's SO comfortable! VOYAGEURS HOODIE Previously known by over 15,000 backers as the Adv3nture Hoodie, the new Voyageurs Hoodie still offers 23+ pockets and features along with our updated quality of fabric, overlock stitching, zippers, pillow conversion, and an updated beverage opener. The Voyageurs Hoodie is the world's most comfortable and versatile hoodie. It easily zips and secures into the Wind Cave Windbreaker and the Glacier Parka.  BADLANDS FLEECE Named for Badlands National Park, this is a sophisticated full-zip fleece jacket. With many of the same features of the Voyageurs Hoodie, it zips and secures into the Wind Cave Windbreaker and the Glacier Parka.The Badlands Fleece offers you a stylish and functional option wherever where your plans take you. Strategically placed quilted patches offer abrasion resistance on shoulders for backpack straps, and elbow for commuting and working at your desk.  WIND CAVE WINDBREAKER The Wind Cave Windbreaker is a waterproof shell that had taped seams and waterproof zippers. Either of the inner layers zip and secure into the windbreaker, making it waterproof and warm.  GLACIER PARKA The Glacier Parka is a premium winter jacket with 10 pockets and a faux fur collar. It's perfect for winter hikes, walking around the city, and it's durable enough for hitting the slopes. With either of the base layers (Voyageurs Hoodie or Badlands Fleece) zipped in, it is rated to sub-zero temperatures. THE OVER 23 FEATURES Each of our inner and outer layers comes with a bevy of incredible features. The objective was to make something that performs great, where the innovations where seamlessly integrated into the garment, so it also looks great.   BOTTLE OPENERAll of our garments come with built-in ""emergency"" bottle openers. They are clipped into the passport pocket, but can also be clipped into the paracord in the side pockets.  WE PLANT THREE TREESWith every purchase of an Adv3nture product, we plant three trees. We have created a tree program whereby we plant three indigenous trees in areas of the US that have been affected by forest fires and deforestation. We work with arborists and environmental scientists to ensure that the trees that we're planting are the best for the location that we'll be planting. Every product backed in this campaign will have three trees planted in the US.  NATIONAL PARKSWe want to encourage people to get outside, and disconnect from the digital world so they can reconnect with the natural world. We're as passionate about the environment as we are with making the best possible products. So, we have named our garments after US National Parks. Our Voyageur (French for Traveler) Hoodie is named for the national park in northern Minnesota. The Badlands Fleece is in honor of one of South Dakota national parks. The Wind Cave Rainbreaker is named after one of the longest caves in the world, also located in South Dakota. The Glacier Parka is named for Montana's northern most national park where the temperature often dip far below zero. THE A-(Adv3nture)TEAM! ZANE LAMPREY is the founder of Adv3nture. He has spent more than a decade as the host of of travel shows on National Geographic Channel, Travel Channel & Food Network. He used his design degree to created original garments, beginning with the Drinking Jacket (a hoodie with various features) including the first beverage pocket and bottle opener zipper in 2012. Desiring to create the world’s best traveling companion, he released the Adv3nture Hoodie in 2016, which became the most successful fashion Kickstarter ever. With the success of the Kickstarter, Zane formed Adv3nture, LLC and surrounded himself with talented people to help grow the Adv3nture brand.While traveling the world, Zane saw things that solidified his concern for the world’s natural habitats. Living in California, among extreme droughts, monumental forest fires and occasional deluges of rain, Zane has also become acutely aware of detrimental environment conditions impacting communities. With a deep appreciation for nature and the environment, Zane devised a plan where the Adv3nture brand would produce premium quality garments while also bringing attention to the environment and giving back to the planet with a tree initiative. So, for every Adv3nture product sold, three trees will be planted.  MEL LAMPREY was a television producer on one of Zane’s television shows. This unexpected meeting allowed/forced them to travel extensively together throughout the world and to experience the goods and the bads that come with such an opportunity. Mel brought her passion for the outdoors, and for the endangered environment into this relationship. A long-time hiker, world traveler, and National Park lover (self-admitted, obsessive), their marriage combined their mutual enthusiasm for the natural world with their passion to create and inspire. The Adv3nture brand is the result of 8 years of travel and exploration experiences, and their desire to improve the planet’s health. Mel is committed to “fix our shit,” as she all too often, and somewhat inappropriately likes to say. Other passions include
column35: animals, indigenous and domestic rescue, food, and her twin sister.  ERICA ELSTRO is a Michigan native who was raised with a natural love for the outdoors and all seasons. After moving to LA, she began working in the apparel industry, specifically concentrating on products and garments known for exceptional quality and function
column36: and with companies willing to give back to the Earth. The passion and skills she developed there led to a seamless transition towards the Adv3nture brand. Erica is a world traveler, always willing to explore the unknown, and seeking to fulfill her best life with her husband and family while giving back to her community. A secondary passion of hers is doughnuts, which she is no longer allowed to bring to the Adv3nture office, no matter how fancied up they are. SIZE CHARTSTo best way to determine your sizing in Adv3nture apparel, we recommend laying your favorite hoodie, fleece or jacket on a table to compare the measurements with ours. This will help to ensure the best fit. Our inner layers (hoodie & parka) will zip into the outer layers (windbreaker & parka) of the same size. Below is a chart showing the measurements for our garments and an image to show how to take the same measurements on your garment.  TEMPERATURE RANGESThe Adv3nture Jacket System was designed to enable you to get a wide range of coverage from a minimal amount of apparel. So, when you are packing for a weekend getaway or a long voyage, you can pack light, and stay warm and dry.",18.0,5,"3 Campaigns

column1: Despite what you've heard, starting an online business isn't cheap. Here at SpaceFace we desire to share our unique designs with everybody but that takes money, which is why we need your help. We hope to raise $3,000 dollars in order to fund the startup costs of our business. Your dollars will go primarily towards funding the design process, business licenses and other legal fees as well as an initial shipment of shirts and sweatshirts. Every dollar helps!

Let's be honest, without a great perk you would have no motivation to donate to our project. And since we need financial support as much as you want a great reason to support us, we have provided you with a range of rewards that we feel fairly compensate you for your donations and support. See the 'Perks' list for detailed information on what YOU get.

Is there anything more satisfying than seeing a uniquely rad business gain the support needed to launch as well as getting awesome rewards for your help? With your support we can get this project rolling and introduce our clothing line far and wide for all to enjoy.

We understand completely if you are unable to donate. Fortunately, financial support is not the only way you can us! We would immensely appreciate you sharing this campaign page on any social media website as well as directing friends to our campaign.

Hello there Mushlings!

My name is Charmaine, but my friends call me Mush *waves!* and I am the owner of Mushme Latex, which is a small company (well, more like one women band) based way in the Northern Sweden in a place called Vuollerim. 
https://www.facebook.com/MushmeLatexDesign 

Since Mushme Latex started just one month ago, we have had over 850 lovely 'likes' on our facebook page (which is pretty amazing considering I was a complete unknown!). However, this means that the small amount of latex I started off with (less than 10 metres) has now dwindled down to almost nothing! 

Lately I've had to decline quite a few custom orders, as I either haven't had the colours in stock, or haven't had enough latex in stock! With the money from Mushme just about managing to pay the food bills, I haven't been able to afford a new order, and I fear that without your help, I never will, and Mushme might have to close! This is super sad considering how great we've started off!

Any help you can give, even just the smallest pledge will be greatly appreciated, as everything adds up! hopefully if we can all pull together on this, then I will be able to go ahead with the new collection (which I'm super duper excited about!) and Mushme will be able to stay open and fill all your lovely latex needs! 

Your money will go towards buying all the latex (and glue, new blades, zips, buttons, cleaner, eyelets...the list goes on) that I will need for the new collection in 2013. This collection will be in three categories, Lolita, Circus and Victorian all of which should hopefully be a completely new take on latex clothing and accessories! 

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and I thank you in advance for all the help you Mushlings are giving me! I promise you it will be worth your while!  

I Love you guys! Xxx

column2: >Our mission is to establish Iconic Lifestyle Inc. as a sophisticated

column1: brand that represents quality in cosmetics, apparel, home furnishings, and
accessories. We will accomplish this using high quality manufacturing and
research, a creative marketing program, and a comprehensive distribution
network using brick and mortar retail outlets, internet presence, and an online
consumer catalogue.  By utilizing this multi-channel
approach we will be able to reach the niche market for quality personal care &amp
lifestyle products rapidly and efficiently. It will allow us to develop Iconic
Lifestyle Inc. as the brand for quality lifestyle  products within our target market.
Iconic Lifestyle Inc. is a North Carolina corporation. The company is
100% owned by April R. Bush, the founder. April has over 15 years worth of
experience in the retail industry. She has held senior management positions
with major retail fashion companies.  The company's main
office is located in Durham, North Carolina.  <span>Iconic Lifestyle
Inc. is a multi-channel concept, combining a wholesale distribution network with
a retail strategy, e-commerce, and an online consumer catalogue.

About the CEO, April Bush

As the CEO of Iconic Lifestyle Inc. April travels to fashion capitals to explore emerging trends in order to cultivate them into her global lifestyle brand, Iconic Lifestyle Inc. Named one of the 25 most stylish people in Raleigh, NC she is in constant demand as a fashion resource for stylists and fashion publications throughout the country. As a fashion expert she works with fashion designers, and private brands to help them profit from their passion. A lover of all things beautiful, glamorous and chic April is a expert fashion, beauty and lifestyle blogger and author of the ebook, ""Manic Monday Makeover: How To Have a Stylish Work Week""

Her company, Iconic Lifestyle Inc. is a leading lifestyle brand for the modern woman. The brand consists of a chic mosaic of cosmetics, jewelry, handbags, fragrances, apparel, shoes and home furnishings. Currently, available to our brand are: Iconic Cosmetics, Iconic Luxury Nail Colour, Iconic Woman Eau Du Parfum (coming 2014), Flourish Skincare (coming 2014) &

In March 2013 I launch Iconic Cosmetics the first brand of Iconic Lifestyle Inc. Through Iconic Cosmetics I have launched Iconic Luxury Nail Colour with the collection Parisian Socialite.  The collection is a mixture of soft and sexy pastels and bold and brilliant hues. The response has been positive! Women are loving the product (
column3: type=3"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">see here). Now it's time to take the brand to the next level.  I need your investment to help grow. I want the brand to be sold internationally. The investment would be used for production, research and development and to market the new products.

column2: >Colour POP! Collection Collection-Iconic Cosmetics/Iconic Luxury Nail Colour

>Create a Signature Fragrance- Iconic Woman Eau Du Parfume
>Expand the polish selection of Iconic Luxury Nail Colour
>Begin small scale production to sell in major department stores and boutiques accross the county.
>Create print collateral to market to the public and be competitive to be noticed.
>I plan to launch the cosmetics in NYC for Fashion Week (February 2014) This investment will help with the product development for an editor/blogger event to showcase the brand.

>I am seeking $15,000 to expand and grow Iconic Cosmetics.  I have invested thousands of dollars to launch this company. I will continue to invest in my company. Your investment is key to the expansion and growth of Iconic Cosmetics. The perks for investing in the company are all branded so you will have a little piece of Iconic Cosmetics!  I am excited to share a couple of the products with my investors!

>You're not just investing in PRETTY PRODUCTS with a PRETTY PURPOSE! Iconic Lifestyle Inc and all of its subsidiaries are created to empower women.  My vision is to be the ultimate women's empowerment brand.  The products serve as a conduit to provide the means to motivate and inspire women to be ICONIC! Your investment will partially assist me with hiring women, offer products that give back philanthropically,  educate, empower and inspire women.
>I understant that some people just can’t invest, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

>Thank you for you in advance for investing in my dreams!

Thanks to machine translation, cross-language communication is no longer science fiction. Different translation devices spring up like mushrooms, but the common pains of inaccuracy and impracticality leave these translators difficult-to-use. We’re hoping to change that. So we came up with the idea to create a new species, a lifestyle gadget for translation and transcription with a truly affordable price.

That is why we designed ONE Mini, to be handy and all-in-one, for communicating and recording.

When travel abroad, the communication experience is unprecedented improved by combining AI translation technology and live interpreter service. Meanwhile, recording and transcription function makes your life easier than ever for daily use.

We can’t wait to share ONE Mini with you and have you help bring it to life with us. 

 

 

 

 

ONE Mini covers 12 most spoken languages, most visited tourist destinations in the world, as indicated below. For AI translation, ONE Mini integrates cutting-edge Neural Machine Translation, supports two-way voice translation between all 12 languages. 

For live interpreter service, ONE Mini supports two-way interpreter for English to the rest 11 languages and Chinese to the rest 11 languages. As long as you have access to the internet, you can be connected with a professional online interpreter whenever and wherever you are within 30 seconds,  the service fee is around US$2/minute. We are working to expand more languages upon your request!

 

 

 

 

Admit it, your memories are not reliable all the time. Had a ""eureka"" moment but the idea slips away without writing them down? Tortured by taking endless notes and meeting minutes? We’ve all been there. ONE Mini makes it super easy. With speech-to-text feature, ONE Mini records the speech and converts to multilingual text in real-time. Just copy and paste, say goodbye to humdrum typewriting.

 

 

Powered by AI, ONE Mini is capable of translating speech to speech in two-way between 12 languages in real-time. Integrated with advanced Neural Machine Translation, Automatic Speech Recognition, and Text-to-speech technology, ONE Mini translates with high accuracy, making the conversation natural and comfy as it should be. Forget about language barriers, engage in communication!   

 

Machine translation is enough for simple and short conversations, but what about long， complex and professional situations? ONE Mini is the first on the market to provide premium live interpreter service 24/7. Just on button away, ONE Mini saves you from all types of language-barrier emergencies, giving you unparalleled communication experience.

 

Equipped with advanced Bluetooth 5.0 chip and a headphone jack, ONE Mini is also your own wireless playback device. Allowing you to have immersive music listening experience and take calls hands-free while driving, thanks to its lightweight and clip design.

 

 

ONE Mini is made with aluminum alloy, which is a combination of aesthetics, strength, durability, and flawless finish. Available in 5 trendsetting colors including Space Gray, Meteorite Black, Apple Green, Retro Dark Green and Cherry Red. 

 

 

Designed with a clip on the back, ONE Mini is easy to be clipped onto sleeves, collars, pocket or belts, anywhere you want. Completely hands-free for all occasions, perfectly matches your personal style.

 

As a unique symbol of ONE Mini, the breathing light is flashing like a halo when functioning, as a pleasant decoration to accompany you wherever you go.

 

 

 

 

With ONE Mini APP, you can easily set the source language and the target language for translation in advance. Once set up, you can use one Mini as an independent device without taking out your phone. After recording, you can also check, copy and paste the transcription and share it with a single tap.

column2: >Notice that these are the demos of ONE Mini working samples, the breathing light and speaker are under hardware optimization for a better experience.

Over the years we (Nam and Phil) have always discussed wanting to launch a clothing brand. Last year, we finally found a supplier who produces the quality and workmanship we were looking for, with experience with major labels in Australia and New Zealand. After extensive research, factory trips overseas, and perfecting samples, we discovered the perfect fabrics and worked out our final designs for our opening collection.

We designed every item to fit together as a balanced silhouette. Our pants have a ""carrot"" fit with a relaxed rise, and our T-shirts, sweaters and coats are slightly elongated to meet mid way on the pant zipper to balance the upper and lower body. A carrot fit means that the upper legs until just past the knees are slightly baggier than the traditional slim jean, going slim from the knee to the ankle. The relaxed rise slightly lowers the crotch of the pants to meet perfectly with the length of our t's and sweaters. 

The fabric is just as important as the fit as we want our pieces to not only be comfortable - we want them to last.

We hope that with this campaign we give you some quality staples, as well as help fund our Spring/Summer ‘19 line.  This includes our website, photography, and sampling costs. 

To start we are offering a package with a crew neck, hoodie and 2 t's - details of each are below.

Hoodie - We chose a brushed 100% cotton for the hoodie. Brushing the cotton during the processing stage, before weaving, removes the short strands of cotton. This process mitigates balling of the material and ensures the sweater will maintain a soft feel. The sweater wears slightly elongated with a hidden front pocket design. Currently offered in black, navy and grey.

Crew Neck - For the crew neck we chose a lighter weight brushed 100% cotton. Similarly, we elongated the sweater to fit slightly longer than a traditional crew neck. Currently offered in black, navy and green.

T- Shirts - We chose a double weaved brushed 100% cotton. A double weaved cotton created a tighter and softer finish to the fabric while maintaining the feel of a traditional cotton. The brushed jersey cotton creates a softer cotton with a slight natural stretch.   

More details on all clothing and the rest of our products will be up on our website, which we hope to have up and running in the next few months. Chinos, jeans and jackets will be available soon.

Many thanks to all who participate. We look forward to sharing our full line soon.

Because the products are being manufactured - need to be shipped to us - then shipped to you, they will be delivered in 5 - 6 weeks.

Phil and Nam

ALL FUTURE ORDERS CAN BE PLACED AT
We have come up with an innovative sylish and stealth way of carrying a tobacco pipe.

Through months of design, redesign, and testing we have developed our final prototype. The Buckle Puffer is machined from solid blocks of 6061 Aluminum, and then nickel plated in an FDA approved facility. The industrial hard Nickel plating gives the Buckle Puffer a bright shine, long lasting durability, and provides safety when smoking out of. The Buckle Puffer was designed with functionality and style in mind.  Two precisely offset Neodymium magnets (the strongest magnets on the market) are used to create a constant pull on the pipe producing a tight rattle free seal. In addition to the pull of these magnets, we've designed a latching system that operates off of these same magnetic fields. The pipe can only be ejected when the magnetic powered release button is pressed. Unlike latches powered by unreliable springs, the magnetically powered latch is designed to last a lifetime.
• Prevents emission of any noticeable odor due to extremely precise fit.

The Buckle Puffer is precision cut from solid blocks of 6061 Aluminum. Not die cast. This method produces a stronger better quality more consistent product than casting Aluminum into various shapes. After precision machining, an industrial hard Nickel plating is applied using the electroless nickel plating process.  This process is performed by an FDA approved facility. The nickel plating gives the Buckle Puffer a smooth sliding feel, a bright cosmetic look, and superior corrosive protection that will last a lifetime.

Each Buckle Puffer is hand finished to ensure quality. It will not rust or corrode. Strategic areas are hand polished to a mirror finish, then secured to a quality genuine leather belt for a style that will make you smile.

This is a Pre-Order. Reach our goal or not, everyone whom supports us will recieve a Buckle Puffer. Buckle Puffer LTD has purchased all necessary equiptment and is ready to go to production. Funds will be used to purchase raw materials for our first production run. Those who pledge will receive a Buckle Puffer a few months after the campaighn, allowing time for manufacturing. Please help spread the word!
We will contact you via your supplied email address about sizing and color.
Must be 18 years or older to pledge.  For Tobacco Use Only.
$85 = EARLY BIRD: Buckle Puffer Belt + Puffer Tee (American Apparel)
$170 = BUDDY DEAL: TWO Buckle Puffer + TWO Puffer Tees (American Apparel)
We are working tiredlessly to prep our shop for production. We are excited to recieve our CNC machine early next week! Thanks for your support!!
